Àbu ayê, kò àka yê leꞋ à ghɨ̀ à tsì èntɨ̧ɨ̧ wê ane Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà, a lo ngwa. A bɔ̂ŋ nê bɔ àbu yeamɔꞋ kò àka yeamɔꞋ leꞋ, mbɔ̀ mèmpème kàlìà, tè ntsè ndɨ àa bɔ èbu bê nè èka bè ègème bɔɔ màꞋà wê a èbem èwet Satàn wu kà wu li lema la.
Èghɨ lê e ghɨ̀ à tsì èntɨ̧ɨ̧ wê ane Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà a tsɔꞋ ngwaꞋ. A bɔ̂ŋ nê bɔ èghɨ lemɔꞋ mbɔ̀ mèmpème kàlìà tè ntsè ndɨ àa bɔ àghɨ yebe bɔɔ màꞋà wê a èbem èwet Satàn la.
“Bɨ̀ ko mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɨ me waa waã kǒ ane bɔtechɨɨle bàa, tsiꞋ è shua wɨ̧ nê, bɔntu̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà bɔb aa ntsèka nta mènəè mɔb a mbì Tǎt am a ègwet àfɨ̀Ꞌ àgème.
[Waã Wòt li ngua nkɨ̀Ꞌa mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ etsǐ bòt bɔ nyɔ la a èbem kàbɔ̀ŋ e ghɨ̌ bɔɔ peme.]
“Bɨ̀a mɨ̀ɨ̀tà nàà? Tè wòt bɔa njɨ̀tsə ènkɨ̀, yemɔ̀Ꞌ nyɔ̂ ko tà ka saame tu èghem yebəèꞋa ntsɔ̀b tebəꞋa la a ègwet èghem e ghǎ me kɨ yu yemɔ̀Ꞌ e nyɔ la à?
TsiꞋ è shu awɨ̧ ane nkûŋ nê, tà kɨ ale ndzea ko taa wùꞋtè àvi ane ànəa ye ngaa yemɔ̀Ꞌ è yaã nyɔ̂ la te tsě ane tu èghem yebəèꞋa ntsɔ̀b tebəꞋa te yaã tè ka nyɔ̂ la.
Ale, wu wuê a èlɨ mbɔŋ Tǎt am wu a ègwet la nàa ka kɨ nê, waã kǒ ane ebe techɨɨle bàa nyɔ la.
“Wanyɨ wè fà̧ ànəê abua yê à tɔ atò bɨ tò e gha a ntsèm, à shu atò ànəa tà fà̧ la, à shu ale, tà bɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀ne nê ye fà̧, à ko nê yê mê mbɔ atò mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ wanyɨ wè.
Mbə à shu ale, tà bakà bɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀ne nê ye fà̧, à mè nɨ wòt kǒ wemɔ̀Ꞌ kò babe leꞋ nkwèꞋne ane yê ka bɨ ghà mè ndaꞋa abua tò mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bòt bàa aa zə emě ko shu ànəa àgème bɔ zə la.

Bɨ làꞋ ale tà bakà mè mbɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀ne, bɨ ghà shu ànəa àgème abua chɔsì, tà bakà mè njùte ànəa chɔsì è shu abua tò la, bɨ tsì àwɨ̧ ane tò mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɨ̀a ntsìà ane wòt tàa nɨa èkab taksì nè wòt kà ko a Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la.
“Ane nkûŋ, tsiꞋ è shua wɨ̧ nê bɨ tsia ànəê a sitsǎꞋ ko bɔɔ tsia yùà a ègwet, ntsɔ̀Ꞌɔ ànəê a sitsǎꞋ ko bɔɔ tsɔꞋɔ yùà a ègwet mɨ̧̂.
TsiꞋ è mèe shua wɨ̧ nê, bòt babe e wu ane ètsəê wemɔꞋ ane ànəê a sitsǎꞋ ŋàa, mbììte Tǎt am wu a ègwet la ko taa ghɨ̌.
Bɨ̀ ko nê bòt babe, kò batat leꞋ e bu̧u̧te àdziꞋ ane èlen laã, ko maa wu a kètsìà wɔb.”
ÀfɨꞋa mbɔŋ Pità kɨꞋɨ̀ mbììte a Yesò nê “Tê, wanɔ̧ me tseka fà̧ ànəê a mbì laã e me waꞋa a kàbɔ̀ŋ tò wuê waꞋa tè ngà ngu a ka fɨ̀Ꞌà? Tè nga ndzə ane ngò̧ tesà̧à̧mbe?”
Yesò bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê “È ntsě wuê ndàꞋ ngò̧ tesà̧à̧mbe, wu ngò̧ èghem yesà̧à̧mbe èdziꞋ besà̧à̧mbe.
“È wu ale, betsiꞋa bɔ fɨ̀Ꞌnè a kèfɔ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà ane ànəa fɔ̧̀ kǒ tà li ngua kɨ ekwàꞋtè èkatè ekabe bòt ètsə fàꞋ bi la.
ÀfɨꞋa tà buêꞋ me kwàꞋtè la, bɔ nɨ wekǒ èkab tò aa bua ŋut kwàꞋ ànyaꞋne la nɨŋ nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ a mbì tò.
Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ tà kɨꞋɨ tà kà bɔ èkab wu evəâ la, fɔ̧̀ wu nê bɔ baãaã tò bɔ̂ vi tò nè bɔ̧ tò fɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀nè ane èbùꞋ, fɔ̀ɔ̀le nè èghɨ ègème tà bɔ la mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ ètsə njû yu.
“Tà shu ale, wòt àtsəa fàꞋ wu teme tènjûŋ ti a si a mbì atò shù̧ù̧ta tò nê, ‘Tê, ŋa am àfɨ̀Ꞌ, maa kɨꞋɨ vəèəè èkab mbɔŋ ègème’.
Fɔ̧̀ wu zə ale, nkù tèsȩte wafàꞋ wu, sà njû yu abua tò, ngɨ̀ tà me ghǎ.
“Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ tàà ngà la, tà kwene ane wafàꞋ fɔ̧̀ ko àdziꞋ èkab tò nàa abua tò la, ndzì àbu azi a nkɨ̌ àmî tò nê ‘Bê ntsə njû yaã yu a èbem le la.’
“Shu̧ tò wafàꞋ wu teme tènjûŋ ti a si shù̧ù̧te atò nê, ‘Ŋa am àfɨ̀Ꞌ maa tsə njû yu.’
“Tà shu̧u̧te atò ale tà tu̧, nɨa tò nɨŋ nga maꞋa lob tèfȩ nê tà ghɨ̀ mbakà tsə njû yu tà kà dzəê.
ÀfɨꞋa èbeko nè bɔfàꞋ fɔ̧̀ e ye àghɨa wòt àtsəa àfàꞋ wu ghɨ̀ ne wɔ̀fàꞋ ko wàa la, a taꞋa saa wɔb, bɔ ghà shua fɔ̧̀ wu ànəa a tsè la.
“Fɔ̧̀ wu zə ale, ntɔ atò shu abua tò nê ‘À wu kwàꞋ wɔ̀fàꞋ kàbɔ̀ŋ; mâ yaã nkù tèsȩ tê sà njû yaã yu a èbem lê la, ndɨ̀ wu à yaã shù̧ù̧te am la,
ale à ghɨ yu a ghɨ̀ ka à kà ku tèsȩte wanyɨ wè wafàꞋ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ mâ yaã nku tê la wu ghà à?’
Fɔ̧̀ wu ghɨ̀ ale, mbê nɨ ntsǒtsə ntsà atò nê bɔ ghǎ maꞋa tò a lob tèfȩ tè tà ghɨa tà tsə njû yu ka tà bɔ̂ ndzəè.
“Yesò ghɨ̀ ale, ndìà nê, eyaa wu èlɨ Tǎt am a ègwet nàa ghɨ̌ ane wòt ègème ane yɨ̧, na tà bakà waꞋa a kàbɔ̀ŋ wanyɨ vi nè èntɨ̧ɨ̧ vi ègème la.”
Yesò pàa a màndaꞋa mèngà̧ maa, sa Galìlî me ghǎ àbâ àlaꞋ a Jùdià yu à agua èdzî Jodàn la.
TaꞋà ènɔ̧̂ bòt e kùŋe atò ngà tà bəè bòt àghɔ̧ a kètsìà wɔb.
Bèfalèsiì ko e kɨꞋɨ me kɨ enyɔ̀Ꞌte a Yesò, mbììte atò nê “Tè mbɨ̧ ta te bɨ̧ɨ̧nè nê, ànəa ko aà və betsiꞋa a ghɨ̀ tè wòt tû̧ vi vi mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ tà kɔ̀ŋkè la à?”
Yesò bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê, “Bɨ bakà tɔ àdziꞋ yu a èbem àkata Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà a laꞋnê ngɔ̀ŋ li me bùꞋu, Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà ghɨ̀ mbâ̧ nè àvi la à?
Tà bɔ̂ shuê nê, mbâ̧ bɔ ndɨ tàa sa tǎt vi bɔ̂ nyɨ̌ vi, bɔ̂ vi vi aa fɔte e tsiꞋi àghɨ yeamɔꞋ la.
Ale, bɔ ka tsi ngu mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bòt tsa tsa, bɔ tsiꞋi àghɨ yeamɔꞋ.” È wu ale, àghɨa Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà tsəꞋne la, wɔ̀bȩ̂ ka sàbtè.
Bèfalèsiì bu e mè mbììte atò nê, “Ale, tè Musì li ngɨ̀ na ka shuê nê wòt me kɨ etu̧ vi vi tà ŋǎ tò kèba àkatè enɨ nyɨꞋte nê ye tu̧ atò, ka mbɔ̂ fəa tò tà me gha à?”
Yesò bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê, “Musì li me bɨ̧ɨ̧ne nê, betsiꞋa wòt tu̧ vi vi, ale, ngu ndɨ̀ wu mèntɨ̧ɨ̧ mɨ̧ nàa nkwèèla la. Mbɔ̂ ngɔ̀ŋ li me bùꞋu à ka lem ngu a èlɨ mbɔŋ.
TsiꞋ è shua wɨ̧ nê, wòt tà tu̧ vi vi ane ànəa ko tsa, kà wu laꞋ nê, àvi wu nɔ̀ŋkè bɔ̂ wòt tsa, ngà ndzɔ̀Ꞌɔ àvi kǒ tsa la, ŋut ko nê ye wua njɨ̀a àbȩ.”
ÀfɨꞋa mbɔŋ, bɔkatè Yesò e shuê abua tò nê, “A wu ewu anè a kètsìà mbâ̧ bɔ̂ vi vi, ko a bɔ̂ŋ nê wòt tseke avi kà lem ndzɔꞋ.”
Ka Yesò shuê abua yɔb nê “È nka laꞋà èngà̧ waa abua wàa, wàa; e ndàꞋa wuê abua bòt bu Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà ghɨ bɔ bɨ̧ɨ̧ne èngǎ̧ mbɔŋ la.

Ane bòt bu kà yɔꞋ la èbeko àa ngɨ̀ bɔ me lɔ̀Ꞌɔ a si bɔ̀ ka bɔ ntɨ̀ a màndzɔꞋɔ, èbeko e me bakà yɔꞋ è ghɨ̀à bɔbȩ, ka nê èbe bɔ gha ambo kèfɔ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà ntû̧ eyɔꞋɔ la. Wòt tàa ko ebɨ̧ɨ̧ne èngà̧ waa la tà bɨ̧ɨ̧ne.”
Bòt ko e nɨ bɔtechɨɨle nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ Yesò naa nɔ̀ŋe èbu bi a ègwet lɔb etsàꞋte Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà àtsəa yɔb. Bɔkatè tò e ŋȩte bòt mbɔŋ.
Yesò shuê nê, “Bɨ tsiꞋ bɔ̧ bu è kɨꞋɨ abua am; bɨ̀ ka nkàlè àwɔb nkàà nê, kèfɔ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà wu abua bòt mbɨꞋɨ̀ bɔ̀ɔ̀ba wàà.”
Tà ghɨ̀ ale, nɔ̀ŋè èbu bi a ègwet bɔ̧ bu ndɔ̀ɔ̀le àwɔb mbɔ̂ me ghǎ.
Wòt kǒ li nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ abua Yesò nê, “NyɨꞋtà, ànəa ntsɔ̧̀a betsiꞋa e ngɨ̀ tè mbɔ̀ mèmpème kàlìà la wu ghà à?”
Yesò bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê, “À ghɨ̀ na ka me tɔ am ane wòt ntsɔ̧̀ à? Wòt nàà ndàꞋ wemɔ̀Ꞌ tà wu wòt ntsɔ̧̀ la. À me kɨ ebɔ mèmpème kàlìà, à me nɔ̀ŋe mbɨ̧te Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà.”
Tà mè mbììte a Yesò nê, “Mbɨ̧te ŋaà?” Yesò bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê, “À ka mbùŋè wɔ̀bȩ̂, à ka njɨ̀ àbȩ, à ka ntsɔŋ, à ka mbɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀ne ànəa àfɨte àtsəa wòt.
Me zəa tǎt wè bɔ̂ nyɨ̌ wè, mè me kɔ̀ŋkè wanyɨ wè mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀, àwɔ̀ mbɔŋ.”
Wakèsà wu bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê “Mâ nɔ̀ŋe mbɨ̧ tàa à shua la tègème, kò àghɨa ko a belè à?”
Yesò shu abua tò nê, “À lâ me kɨ kùꞋu a mbì Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà, à ghà fɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀nè èghɨ bê ègème, ŋà èkab èghɨ mbɔŋ abua bòt mbuŋ, mbɔ̂ nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ nkùŋè am, ko aa li jandèlè a ègwet.”
Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ wakèsà wu zə ànəê yaa la, tà lɔ̀Ꞌɔ me ghǎ ane tèsȩ, nkàà nê tà li ntaꞋa bɔ èghɨ nyaŋ.
Yesò shu abua bɔkatè bi nê, “TsiꞋ è shua wɨ̧ ane nkûŋ nê, a taꞋa wua nkwèèla abua wòt èkab taa nyi a Kèfɔ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà.
TsiꞋ è mě shua wɨ̧ nê, aà njùa anyà̧ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ loà naa tɔɔ a èbem èləꞋə sàꞋa, tè ntsè ndɨ wòt èkab nàa nyi a kèfɔ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la.”
Bɔkatè Yesò è zə èngà̧ waa, a taꞋa tsè àwɔb, bɔ tsiꞋi biite nê, “Tè a wu anè, ko betsiꞋa wàà bɔ mèmpème à?”
Yesò bê ndɔ̀kè àvi ndzè àwɔb shu nê, “Aà nkwèèla abua bɔbȩ, ka è wu nè Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà, ko àghɨ àgème aà njùa.”
Pità bɨ̀ɨ̀le nê, “Ye ndɨ baa sa èghɨ ègème nkùŋe awê la. Àbȩ̀ aya nàa li wu ghàà?”

Yesò shu abua yɔb nê, “Ane nkûŋ, tsiꞋ è shua wɨ̧ nê, naa li ngu àfɨꞋa Waã Wòt tseke a ègwet àtɨ̧ a kèfɔ̧̀ yu Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà tsia ane ngɔ̀ŋ fi la, bɨ̀a wu ntsɔ̀b babe bɨ̀a nkùŋe am la e tsekè a ègwet ètɨ̧ kèfɔ̧̀ èghem ntsɔ̀b bebe, e me saꞋa èndǎ̧ bòt Izəèlȩê bu èghem ntsɔ̀b bebe la.

Wòt ègème tà waꞋa lob ti, nè bɔnyɨ bi, (mbâ̧ nè àvi), nè tǎt vi, nè nyɨ̌ vi, nè vi vi, nè bɔ̧ bi kò tèbaꞋa ti ambo yaã la, nàa bɔ èghɨ ngaa èdziꞋ ènkɨ̀, te tsě ndɨ e li nguê la, fɔ̀ɔ̀le nè mèmpème kàlìà.
Ka bòt nyaŋ, bɔ̀ wua mbì àfɨ̀Ꞌ yaa la, bɔɔ li tsiꞋa akwèn, èbe bɔ̀ wua akwèn la e tsiꞋa a mbì.”
Yesò ghɨ̀ ale, mè nê “Kèfɔ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà wu mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ ànəa wòt kǒ, tà li ndzəè nga àbȩ a ntɔtetsɔ̌Ꞌ ekɨ bòt bɔ̀ɔ faꞋa a mbȩ zi la.
Tà ghǎ ale ndàŋkè bɔ̂ bɔfàꞋ bu nê yea ŋa wɔb àkwȩkab yeamɔꞋ ane àliabȩ mbɔ̂ ntsà àwɔb a mbȩ zi.
“È lɔꞋɔ me wu ane nyèm tebəèꞋa a ntɔtetsɔ̌Ꞌ, tà mè ndzəè ngà àsà̧aã èwen ndzě bòt ko bɔ tɨ̧ɨ̧te ka wua ngɨ̀à àghɨ la,
shu abua yɔb nê ‘Bɨ̀ ghǎ a mbȩ me faꞋa mɨ̧̂ ko maa ŋa wɨ̧ àghɨa a kuꞋu ane àfàꞋ àyɨ̧ la.’ Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ tà làꞋ ale la bɔ bê ndɔ̀Ꞌ me ghǎ.
È tseke tè me wu ane nyèm èghem ntsɔ̀b tebe nè nyèm tetat nèngû̧, tà mè ndzəè ngà ngɨ̀ wuê a èlɨ mbɔŋ.

È tseke tè mè me wu mbɔŋe ane nyèm tetà̧â̧ àfɨꞋa nyèmtèsi, tà mè ndzəè nga àsà̧aã èwen ndzě bòt ko bɔ̀ bele abot bɔ tɨ̧ɨ̧te la, mbììte awɔb nê ‘Bɨ̀ ghɨa gha àdziꞋ yaa mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ ètsəꞋ e li ntsi la kà ye àghɨa bɨ wua ngɨ̀à la à?’
“Bɔ bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê, ‘Wu ndɨ wòt tà kɨa waa eŋa awa àfàꞋ la è ntsě la. Tà tsiꞋi shu abua yɔb nê:
“ ‘Bɨ̀ ghà yɨ̧ a mbȩ me faꞋa mɨ̧̂.’

“Nyèm tseke te fen, tǎt mbȩ yu tɔ àtsəa bɔfàꞋ yu shu abua tò nê tà tɔ bɔfàꞋ bu ŋà èkab àfàꞋ wɔb. Nê taa me ŋa, tà buꞋu ane bòt bɔ ghɨ̂ nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ akwèn la ngà ndìà ane e bu be ghɨ̂ nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ a mbì la.
“Ale, tà ghɨ a èlɨ mbɔŋ ŋà àkwȩkab yeamɔꞋ, yeamɔꞋ abua bòt bu bɔ ghɨ̂ mbùꞋu àfàꞋ mbɔŋe ane nyèm tetà̧â̧ àfɨꞋa nyèmtèsi la.
Bòt bu bɔ ghɨ̂ mbùꞋù àfàꞋ a mbì la e kɨꞋɨ me mɨ̀ɨ̀tè nê bɔɔ ŋa wɔb èkab nyaŋ, me ye bɔ ŋa wɔb wuê àkwȩkab yeamɔꞋ, yeamɔꞋ.
Bɔ nɨ ale, mbùꞋ me lèmte tǎt mbȩ wu

shua nê ‘Bòt baa bɔ tsiꞋi nɨa wɔb akwèn la e faꞋa wuê ane kètem àfɨ̀Ꞌ. Bàa wu ba yaã ŋeꞋe àfaꞋ mbùŋè àwa a èten nyèm kèkweelè mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ ètsəꞋ e li ntsi la e bɔ wuê àkwȩkab yeamɔꞋ, yeamɔꞋ mɨ̧̂.’
“Tǎt mbȩ wu shu abua wòt kǒ wemɔ̀Ꞌ ane yɔb nê ‘Shu̧, ànəa kàbɔ̀ŋ ko mâ ghɨa ane yê la a tsě. Ka ba nè e yaã ndàŋkè nê maa lɔꞋɔ eŋa wê àkwȩkab ane àfaꞋ àliabȩ à?
È wu ale, nɨ àghɨa è wuê ayê la nɨŋ me ghǎ. E ŋa wòt waa mâ tsiꞋi nɨa tò akwèn la àghɨa mâ ŋa abua yê la ane mènkɔ̀ŋke mɔ̧.
Tè e mbakà bɔ mètàŋ e nɨ èkab am e ghɨ̀ àghɨa mâ kɔ̀ŋkè la à? Mâ ghaꞋa àbu am abua bòt baa ale, a ghɨ̀ na ka me saa àwê à?’ ”
Yesò ghɨ̀ ale, ndìà èngà̧ waa nê “Wu wuê a èlɨ mbɔŋ bòt bɔ̀ɔ ndzea wɔb nê bɔ wu a mbì àfɨ̀Ꞌ yaa la àa li tsiꞋi akwèn, èbe bɔ̀ wu akwèn la e tsiꞋi a mbì la.”
Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ Yesò nàa nkɔ̀Ꞌɔ ngà a Jèlusalèm la, tà tɔ bɔkatè bi bu ntsɔ̀b babe la, bɔ səèꞋtè àwɔb tà shu abua yɔb nê

“Bɨ̀ zə, ba wua nkɔꞋɔ ngà a Jèlusalèm, àdziꞋa bɔ̀ɔ baãaã Waã Wòt, ezǐ atò a tèkitebu bètǎt bèntsìà mèpɨ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nè bènyɨꞋtà mbɨ̧te Musì, bɔɔ saꞋa tò e ghɨ̌ bɔɔ bùŋe atò la.
E bɔ ghɨ̀ ale, e zǐ atò a tèkitebu bòt kà wu Bèjuê, bɔɔ wȩ̀ȩ̀te atò, eshu̧u̧ atò e lɔ̀Ꞌɔ wu̧u̧te atò a mbɨ̧̀ mbasa taa pfə, mbɔ̂ naa me wu ane èlibȩ betat taa yu̧u̧me.”
ÀfɨꞋa mbɔŋ nyɨ̌ bɔmbâ̧ Zebèdiì bu babe la kɨꞋɨ abua Yesò, ŋɔꞋne a si a mbì tò nê tà ghɨ̀ àghɨa ko abua zi.

Yesò bììte nê “À kɨa nê è ngɨ̀ ghàà?” Tà bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê “Bɨ̧ɨ̧ne nê yea ghɨ̌ bɔbɔ̧ baa babe la aa li tseke bɨ tò ba a èbem kèfɔ̧̀ wê wekǒ àbâ àbualu̧ a yê nè wekǒ àbâ àbuantoŋ ayê.”
Yesò bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê “Bɔ̧ bè e bakà ko àghɨa bɔ biità la. Tè betsiꞋa bɨ nu ndɔŋ ngoꞋ yaa maà nu la à?”
Bɔ nê “Baa ko nu.”
Yesò mè shu nê “Wu nkûŋ nê bɨa li ko enu ndɔŋ yaã, ka e tseke àbâ àbualu̧ am kò a yea ntɔŋ leꞋ è ntse mmɔ̌ màa ghɨ̀ la. ÈdziꞋ baa e wu abua bòt bu Tǎt am taŋkè nê bɔ̀ tseke abot la.”
ÀfɨꞋa bɔkatè ko bu èghem e zə ànəê yaa la, bɔ taꞋa tsoo ane bɔnyɨ bu babe la.
Ale, Yesò tɔ awɔb bàgème àdziꞋ yeamɔꞋ shu abua yɔb nê “Bɨ̀ ko nê bèfɔ̧̀ bòt kà ko a Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà àa ngɨ̀ bɔ me ghɨɨle bòt bɔb, bèkěm bɔb, e mè me tseke àtsəa bòt bɔb.
À bakà bɔ ndɨ àa wu anè a kètsìà wɨ̧ la, ka wòt me kɨ ewu wɔ̀jûŋ ayɔɔ yɨ̧ tà bɔ ndɨ tàa wu mbɨꞋɨ̀ wafàꞋ abua ebeko la,
è we tàa nkɨ e wu a mbì ane yɨ̧ la, è bɔ ndɨ tàa wu mbɨꞋɨ̀ àbùꞋ abua ebeko la.
A bê ngu wuê mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ àa ane Waã Wòt la. Tà lè kaꞋa wua nkɨ̀Ꞌa e ghɨ̌ bòt aa me fàꞋa abua tò. Tà li ngua nkɨ̀Ꞌa e me fàꞋa abua bòt, e lɔ̀Ꞌɔ e ŋà àtsə azi mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bòt nyaŋ aa peme.”
Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɔ dzə a Jèlikò la, taꞋà ènɔ̧̂ bòt e kùŋe a Yesò.
Bòt àghɨ àleme ko babe bɔ wu a ngèt alu̧ bɔ tseke la, e zə nê Yesò nàà ntsèà mbê mbùꞋ me ŋȩ shua nê “Waã fɔ̧̀ Dàbid, ku tèsȩ ta.”
Ènɔ̧̂ bòt bu e ŋȩ awɔb nê bɔ̀ buŋ. Ka bɔ paà ŋȩ nê “Waã fɔ̧̀ Dàbid, ku tèsȩ ta.”
Yesò tɨ̧ ntɔ awɔb nê “Bɨ̀a nkɨa nê è ngɨ gha abua yɨ̧ à?”
Bɔ shu abua tò nê “Tê, ghɨa àghɨ aya à ghaꞋte.”
Yesò kù tèsȩ tɔb, mbà̧à̧te àghɨ ayɔb, àghɨ ayɔb a bê ngàꞋte bɔ kùŋe atò.
È li ngu àfɨꞋa Yesò bɔ̂ bɔkatè bi e kɨꞋɨ tê ngua a ngèt Jèlusalèm, a Befagè, a ègwet èbȩ Olìf la, tà tsɔ̀Ꞌɔ bɔkatè bi ko babe
shu abua yɔb nê “Bɨ̀ gha àpfəè zia a mbì lɨ̧ la ko bɨa bê ye a jàkâ ko bɔ sèlè la bɔ̂ waã vi. Bɨ yà nɨŋ nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ abua am.
Wòt è bììte awɨ̧ ànəê, bɨ nê ‘Lefɨ̀Ꞌ nàa nkɨà bùà.’ Ko taa bê sǎ bɨa nɨ ekɨꞋɨ.”
Mènəè maà li ntsè ane mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ e ghɨ̌ ànəa ndàꞋàtɔŋ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà li shu la aa wu nkûŋ. Tà li nê,
Bɨ̀ shu bòt Zayɔ̀n nê
“Bɨ̀ ye; Fɔ̧̀ wɨ̧ nàà nkɨ̀Ꞌa abua yɨ̧,
Tà nɨa vi a si tè ntsèke nè ègwet jàkâ.
Wu waã anyà̧ nàa ŋèꞋa àbòꞋà la.”
Bɔkatè tò bu e ghà ngɨ̀ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ tà shu la.
Bɔ nɨ a jàkâ wu nè waã wu nɨŋ nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ ale maꞋa ndǐ tɔb a ègwet lɔb, Yesò kɔꞋ ntsèke a ègwet.
TaꞋà ènɔ̧̂ bòt e sàŋkè ndǐ tɔb a alu̧, èbeko e loote ètsə èyɨt nɨŋ sàŋkè alu̧.
Bòt bu nga a mbì tò la nè è bu akwèn la e bùꞋ me ŋȩa shua nê
“MèngùꞋte wu abua waã Fɔ̧̀ Dàbid;
TsiꞋ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà lɔ̀ɔ̀le a wòt wu
nkɨ̀Ꞌa ane èlen tò la;
MèngùꞋte wu abua Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà wu a ègwet la.”
Yesò ghà tê tà nyi a Jèlusalèm, àpfəa nɨ̧a mbɔŋ a nyìꞋnè tè bòt e tsiꞋa mbììta nê “Eyaa wu wàà?”
Ènɔ̧̂ bòt bu e nê “Eyaa wu ndàꞋàtɔŋ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà wu èlen tò wu Yesò, tà dzəa Nazàlet àbâ àlaꞋ a Galìlî la.”

Yesò nyi a èbem lob nɨ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà fəè bòt bu bàgème fɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀nà mè nju̧a èghɨ a èbèm la. Mè mpààtè mèkɔꞋ bòt bu bɔ wua nkùbta mèkab nkɨà àbȩ̀ la, nè batɨ̧ bòt bu bɔ wua fɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀nà banɨ̧̌ ndɨk la.
Tà ghɨ̀ ale, shu abua yɔb nê “Àkate a Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà a laꞋ ne, ‘Lob yaã wu lob bɔ̀ɔ me tsàꞋtè am a èbèm la’, ka bɨ nɨŋ ngɨ̀ è tsìꞋi àdziꞋa bètsɔŋ aa nkɨ̀Ꞌa ndɔ̧̀ɔ̧̀tà la.”
ÀfɨꞋa mbɔŋ bòt àghɨ àleme nè bòt èka bɔb e ŋɔꞋte la, e kɨꞋɨ abua tò a èbem lob nɨ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà yu, tà bəè àwɔb.

Bètǎt bèntsìà mèpɨ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nè bènyɨꞋtà mbɨ̧te Musì e ye tèwuute ènəê kà ye àfəa tu tà ghɨ̀ la, mè nè ndɨ bɔtechɨɨle àa ŋȩ a èbem lob nɨ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà shua nê “MèngùꞋte wu ane Waã Fɔ̧̀ Dàbid la”, a taꞋa saa awɔb.
Ale, bɔ biite atò nê “Tè à bakà zə ànəa bɔ̀ɔ shua la à?” Tà bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê, “Naa, ma zə, ka la, tè bɨ bakà tɔ èngà̧ waa a èbem Àkata Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà à? Nê,
‘À ghɨ̂ bɔtechɨɨle nè bɔkefi
e ŋa ngule mèngùꞋte abua yê’.”
Yesò làꞋ ale sà àwɔb ndzəè a èbem àpfəèà nɨ̧ yu ngà ndi a Betanì.
Tà lɔ̀Ꞌɔ a ntɔtetsɔ̌Ꞌ tà me kua akwèn nkɨ̀Ꞌa àpfəa nɨ̧ yu ndzìtsə te baãaã atò.
Tà ye àyɨt a fik
Bɔkatè tò e ye ale, a bê ntsè àwɔb tè bɔ tsiꞋi biite nê “Àyɨt yàa a ghɨ̀ na ka mbê njù̧ anè à?”

Yesò bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê “Ane nkûŋ, tsiꞋ è shu awɨ̧ nê bɨ zìà èntɨ̧ɨ̧ wɨ̧ ane Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà tè mbakà wua màkà, ko betsiꞋa bɨ ghɨ̀ àghɨa mâ ghɨ ane àyɨt a fik yaa la. È ntsě wuê ndàꞋà yùà, bɨ màà shu wuê abua èbȩ la nê ‘ŊeꞋe awê ndebe a èbem *èdzî,’ ko aa ŋeꞋe avi.
Bɨ mè me biite àghɨ abua Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà bɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀ne a mèntɨ̧ɨ̧ mɨ̧ nê tàa ŋa, ko bɨa bɔ yùà.”

Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ Yesò mee nyi a èbem lob nɨ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà tè me nyɨꞋte mènəè la, bètǎt bèntsìà mèpɨ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nè bɔɔjuŋ Bèjuê e kɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ mbììte atò nê “Àa nɨa àtɔŋ nè ŋa ka ngɨ̀à èghɨ baà? Waa ka tà ŋa awê àtɔŋ ngaa la à?”
Yesò bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê “TsiꞋ è mbììte awɨ̧ èngà̧ waa mɨ̧̂. Bɨ bɨ̀ɨ̀là ntsɔ̧̀, ko maa shua wɨ̧ àdziꞋa mâ nɨ àtɔŋ ka me ghɨ̌ èghɨ baà la.
Wàa ka tà li ntsà a Jɔ̌n nê tà me zǐ bòt a èdzî la à? È li ngu Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà kò wuê bɔbȩ à?”
Bɔ zə ale, mbùꞋ me kààne a kètsìà wɔb shua nê “Bàa laꞋ nê ghàà? Ba wu anè nê ‘Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà’, ko taa biite awa nê, ‘a wu ale ghǎ a ghɨ̀ ka bà ka bɨ̧ɨ̧ne èngǎ̧ tò à?’
Ka bà nê abua bɔbȩ, ko baa mbɔ̀a àghɨa ènɔ̧̂ bòt baa àa ghɨ̀ la, nkàà nê bɔ bɨ̧ɨ̧ne bàgème nê Jɔ̌n li ngu ndàꞋàtɔŋ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà.”
Ale, bɔ tsɔꞋɔ èngǎ̧ Yesò nê “ChaꞋ, baa bakà ko.” Tà shu abua yɔb nê “Ale betsiꞋa è nka shua wɨ̧ àdziꞋa mâ nɨ àtɔŋ ka me ghɨ̌ èghɨ bàa la.”
Yesò ghɨ̀ ale, mè nê “Bɨ kwàꞋte ànəê yaa bà zə; wòt kǒ li ndɔ̀Ꞌ mbɔ̀ bɔ̧ bi babe, ngà abua ewe mbì shu nê ‘Waã am, ghǎ faꞋa mbȩ laane’.
“Waã wu bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê ‘È nka ghàa’, ka àfɨ̀Ꞌ a me wu tà kùbte èntɨ̧ɨ̧ vi ngà
ŋut ghɨ̀ ale, mè nga abua ewe kwèn, shu abua tò nê tà ghà zi a mbȩ mɨ̧̂. Waã wu bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê ‘Oo Tè, maa ghǎ’, ka ngɨ̀ ale tà kà ghâ.
“Yesò làꞋ ale mbɔ̂ mbììte nê ane bɔ̧ bàa babe la wàa li ngɨ̀ àghɨa tǎt tò li ngua nkɨà nê tà ghɨa la à?”
Bɔ bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê “Èwe mbì.” Ale, Yesò shu abua yɔb nê “Ane nkûŋ tsiꞋ è shua wɨ̧ nê, bèfetà èkab taksì nè bèghȩ̀ȩ̀nè ghȩ̀ȩ̀ne aa pààtè àwɨ̧ wàa e nyi a Kèfɔ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà.

A me wu ale ngu nê Jɔ̌n ndzìà èdzî li nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ nyɨ̀Ꞌte awɨ̧ alu̧ ndɨ bɨ̀a me ghɨ̀ àghɨa Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nàa nkɨà la, ka bɨ tu̧u̧ ebɨ̧ɨ̧ne ànəa tà li ngua shua la. Bèfetà èkab taksì, nè bèghȩ̀ȩ̀ne ghȩȩne e bɔ̂ mbɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀ne. Ka bɨ ye ale, ntsiꞋi akwèn bɨ̀ ka lem kùbte mèntɨ̧ɨ̧ mɨ̧, ebɨ̧ɨ̧ne ànəa tà shua la.”

Yesò shu abua yɔb nê “Bɨ̀ mèe ndzəè è waa nè èngà̧teme. Wòt kǒ li ndɔ̀Ꞌ ndìꞋi èyɨt vȩn a mbȩ zi, nkùùlè àkaã nɨŋ ngààle mbȩ yu, ntu àdziꞋa màngɨa mèlùꞋ mu, mbɔ̧̀ àdziꞋa bɔ̀ɔ me tɨ̧ɨ̧ a ègwet mbààba èbaꞋ lu la. Mbɔ̂ ŋǎ abua bòt bɔ me faꞋa, tà ndzəè ngà àvi àlaꞋ a ko tsa.
ÀfɨꞋa mànkaaba tètaãaãte vȩn tu a tseke te nkùꞋ, tà tsà bɔfàꞋ bi nê bɔ̀ gha ngɨ̀ bèlentà bu è ŋa evi ne èghàb ane èghɨ bɔ fùꞋù la.
“BɔfàꞋ tò bu e ghà, bèlentà bu e baãaã wɔb, ndène wekǒ, mbùŋè wekǒ, ndɔ̀Ꞌ nɨa àti ŋèꞋnè wekǒ.
Tà mè ntsà bɔfàꞋ bi ko be tsè èbe mbì bu la, bɔ mè ngɨ̀ wuê a èlɨ mbɔŋ ane yɔb.
A me lìa tà tsà waã vi abua yɔb, mɨ̀ɨ̀tè nê bɔɔ kà̧aã me bɔa tò.
“Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɔ ye atò la bɔ nê ‘Ye njɨlob mbê wu, bɨ̀ kɨꞋɨ bà bùŋa tò mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ ejɨ èbaꞋa tǎt tò.’
Ale, bɔ baãaã atò a èbem mbȩ yu mii àbȩ, mbɔ̂ bùŋè atò.”
Yesò bɔ̂ mbììte awɔb nê “Tǎt mbȩ me ghɨ̀ tê nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ ko tàa ghɨ̀ na nè bòt ba à?”
Bɔ bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê “Ko taa bùŋe bòt kàbɔ̀ŋ mbɔŋ kà ku tèsȩ, ebɔ ŋa mbȩ mbɔŋ abua bòt tsa bɔɔ me faꞋa ŋa èwe tò nè èghàb àfɨꞋa ntsɔ̧̀.”
Yesò bììte awɔb nê “Tè bɨ bakà li me tɔ èngà̧ waa a èbem Àkata Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà ezə?
‘Èti lu bèmbɔ̧ɔ̧ lob e li ngwaꞋ nê wu èti kàbɔ̀ŋ la,
wu lùà ka è tsìꞋi ngule èti tɔ̀Ꞌɔ̀ lob
Eyaa wu àghɨa Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà ghɨ̀ la, a ghe àa mbɔ̀ la.’
“Ale, Yesò mè nê ‘TsiꞋ è shua wɨ̧ nê bɔɔ nɨ àdziꞋ yu Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà ŋa abua yɨ̧ a èbem Kèfɔ̧̀ vi la eŋa abua bòt bɔɔ ghɨ̌ àghɨa Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nàa nkɨà la.’ ”
Wòt tà kwene a ègwet èti làa la, tàa bəꞋte atem atem, ka èti ngaa è kwene a ègwet wòt, ko aa ŋèꞋne atò.
Bètǎt bèntsìà mèpɨ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nè Bèfalèsiì e zə èngà̧teme wàa ale nko nê tà wua ndàꞋà ŋǎ abua yɔb.
Ale, bɔ nyɔ̀Ꞌtè nê bɔ kɨ ebaãaã tò ka me bɔɔ bòt bu nkàà nê bɔ̀ɔgème e li ngua nɨ̀a tò mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ ndàꞋàtɔŋ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà.
Yesò mè me làꞋa abua bòt bu wuê ane mèngà̧teme, nê
“Kèfɔ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà wu mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ fɔ̧̀ ko, tà li nkaꞋa èpà̧ ane ndzɔꞋɔ waã vi la.
Tà li ntsà bètsoêꞋ bi nê bɔ gha ntɔ bòt bu bɔ yaã nkàꞋà wɔb a èpǎ̧ wu la, bɔ tu̧ ekɨꞋɨ.

“Tà mè ntsà bètsoêꞋ ko tsa nê bɔ̀ gha shu abua bòt bu bɔ yaã nkàꞋà wɔb a èpà̧ wu la nê ye taŋkè èghɨ ègème tè ndɔ̀Ꞌ, nê ye wààle èdzaꞋa mpɔ̀ŋtsə nè ngule bɔ̧ mpɔ̀ŋ, tè àghɨa àgème a me wu anè nko laꞋ nê a kuêꞋ, nê bɔ̀ kɨꞋɨ a èpǎ̧ ndzɔꞋɔ yu!
“Ka bègɨ̧̀ bu efəənè, ndzəè ngà me ghɨ̀ mènəè mɔb, wòt kǒ baãaã èlu̧ mbȩ zi, wekǒ baãaã èlu̧ èwen li,
èbeko nè bòt e baãaã bètsoêꞋ tò bu, ndènè àwɔb, mbɔ̂ mbùŋè àwɔb.
Fɔ̧̀ wu ye ale a saa tò kwàꞋ ànyaꞋne tè tà tsà bèshujà bɔ ghà bùŋè bòt mbɔŋ mbɔ̂ ntò̧ àpfəè ayɔb.
“Tà tɔ̂ bètsoêꞋ bi shu abua yɔb nê, ‘Mâ taŋke èpǎ̧ ndzɔꞋɔ wu tè e kùꞋ, ka bòt bu bɔ yaã nkàꞋà wɔb la, e kà lem nkùꞋù èwuu bòt bɔ ghɨ̂ ngu èkaꞋà la.
È wu ale, bɨ gha a tebùꞋte èlu̧ ènɨ̧, nkàꞋà wòt ègème bɨ ye la a èpǎ̧ ndzɔꞋɔ’
BètsoêꞋ tò bu e ndzəè nga a tebùꞋte èlu̧ fète bòt bàgème bɔ ye la, èbe ntsɔ̧̀ nè èbe kàbɔ̀ŋ, tè lob èpǎ̧ ndzɔꞋɔ yu lu̧ ne bègɨ̧̀.
“Fɔ̧̀ wu tseke tê nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ elàꞋ nê bègɨ̧̀ bu, ndzě wòt kǒ kà kwaãaã ndìte ndzɔꞋɔ, mbììte atò nê,
‘Shu̧, à ntsè ne ŋa ka nyi a lob ŋaà kà kwaãaã ndìte ndzɔꞋɔ à?’ Ŋut zə ale, èngà̧ e tsea tò.
“Ale, fɔ̧̀ wu shu abua bètsoêꞋ bi nê, ‘Bɨ̀ kuule èbu tò nè èka tò, maꞋa tò àbȩ a èbem kèbìꞋà, àdziꞋa bòt àa me dɨ̀a nkwèla àsɔŋ yɔb ane ntso la.’
“Yesò ghɨ̀ ale, ndià nê, ‘Bɨ̀ ko nê bɔ̀ɔ ngɨ̀ bɔ tɔ bòt nyaŋ, ka mbɔ̂ ndàà wu èbe mpiꞋa nɨŋ.’ ”
ÀfɨꞋa mbɔŋ Bèfalèsiì ko e ghà taŋke ndɨ bɔ̀ɔ baãaã Yesò ane èngǎ̧ tò la.

Ale, bɔ tsà bɔkatè bɔb nè bòt bu bɔ̀ɔ nkuŋa Elɔ̀d la abua Yesò, bɔ kɨꞋɨ̀ mbììte atò nê, “NyɨꞋtà, baa ko nê àà ndàꞋà wuê nkûŋ, mè nyɨ̀Ꞌta mènəè Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà wuê mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ nàa la, kà wua njùta ànəa bòt àa ndàꞋà la. Nkàà nê àà kà nɨ àghɨa wòt wu yùà la mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ àghɨa ko.
Ale, shua wa, tè mbɨ̧ ta tê bɨ̧ɨ̧nè nê bà me ŋa èkab taksì abua Sisà kò wu nê bà ka ŋa à? Àa mɨ̀ɨ̀tà naa?”
Yesò ko mèmɨ̀ɨ̀te kàbɔ̀ŋ mɔb nê, “Bɨ̀a wu bɨ̀a shua nê bɨ wu àghɨa kà wu yùà la, bɨ ghɨ̀ na ka me taãaãte am à?
Bɨ̀ nyɨꞋte am àkwȩkab yu bɨ̀a ŋǎ ane èkab taksì la.”
Bɔ nɨ àkwȩkab yu nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ ŋǎ abua tò.
Tà bììte awɔb nê “Àtsə yàa nè èlen làa adù̧ la wu ayea wàà?”
Bɔ bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê “Àtsəa Sisà.”
Ale, Yesò shu abua yɔb nê “Bɨ̀ ŋa àghɨa è wu àyea Sisà la abua tò, ŋà àghɨa è wù àyea Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la abua Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà.”
Bɔ zə ale, a taꞋa tsèa wɔb bɔ lɔꞋɔ abot ntsiꞋi me ghà gha.
È li ngu ane àlia mbɔŋ Bèsadùsiì, bòt bu bɔ̀ɔ shua nê betsiꞋa wòt kà pfə mè njù̧ù̧me la, e kɨꞋɨ ndze a Yesò mbììte atò
nê, “NyɨꞋtà, Musì li shu nê, ‘Wòt pfəa kà bi bɔ̧, wanyɨ tò bɔ ndɨ tàa nɨ vi tò mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bi bɔ̧ abua wanyɨ vi wu tà pfə la.’
Bòt ko basà̧à̧mbe e li ngu bɔ̧ wòt wemɔ̀Ꞌ a kètsìà wa. We mbì yɔ̀Ꞌɔ̀ vi vi mpfəè ka bɔ bɔ̧, ngwaꞋa àvi wu abua wanyɨ vi,
we kwèn wu nɨ ale, mè mpfəè àzi mɨ̧̂ wu a èlɨ̀, tè bɔ̀ɔ sà̧à̧mbe e pfəꞋte bàgème.
Bɔ pfəꞋte ale, àvi wu tseke tè mè mpfəè àzi mɨ̧̂.
Naa li ngu ane àli bèmpfəà be yu̧u̧me la, àvi mbɔŋ wu vi wa ane yɔb wu basà̧à̧mbe la à? Bɔ̀ɔgème e li ndzɔ̀Ꞌɔ atò.”
Yesò bɨ̀ɨ̀lè èngǎ̧ wɔb nê, “Bɨ fâ̧, nkàà nê bɨ bakà ko èngǎ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà, bɨ̀ ka mě ko mètàŋ tò.
Naa li ngu àfɨꞋa bèmpfəà be yu̧u̧me la, bɔ tsiꞋi mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɔntu̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà, mbâ̧ nè àvi ka tsi ngua ndzɔ̀Ꞌa.
È me wu ane ànəa bèmpfəà mànju̧u̧ma, ko bɨ bakà tɔ te zə ànəa Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà shu abua yɨ̧ la nê,
‘E ngu Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà Abàlàghâm, ndɔ̀Ꞌ ngu Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà Asàk nè Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà Jàkɔ̂b?’ Tà wu Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà bòt yu̧, tà ntsě Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà bèmpfəà.”
Ènɔ̧̂ bòt bu è zə èngà̧ waa ale, a taꞋa tsè àwɔb ane mèngǎ̧ tà nyɨ̀Ꞌta la.
Bèfalèsiì e zə nê Yesò laꞋa èngà̧ nɨŋ ndììme mètsəê Bèsadùsiì ale, bɔ bu̧u̧te adzìꞋ yeamɔꞋ,
wòt kǒ ane yɔb è wu nyɨꞋtà mbɨ̧tsə la, biite Yesò èngà̧ enɨ taãaãte tò nê,
“NyɨꞋtà, mbɨ̧ è tɨ̧ɨ̧ a mbì ane mbɨ̧tsə tègème la wu ye ŋa à?”
Tà bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê, “ ‘Me kɔ̀ŋke Tǎt wè Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nè èntɨ̧ɨ̧ wê ègème, ŋà wê nènkèm abua tò, mè me mɨ̀ɨ̀tè wuê atò.’
Eyaa wu mbɨ̧ mbì, mè ngu mbɨ̧ è tse mbɨ̧ tègème la.
Mbɨ̧ è kɨꞋɨ akwèn la nàà mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ yùà, ‘Me kɔ̀ŋke wanyɨ wê mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ àwɔ̀ mbɔŋ.’
Mènəè ègème mbɨ̧te Musì nè bèndàꞋàtɔŋ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà àa shua la, e dzə a èbem mbɨ̧ tàa tebe la.”
Bèfalèsiì ko e fete adzìꞋ yeamɔꞋ, Yesò bììte awɔb nê,
“Bɨ̀a mɨ̀ɨ̀tà na ane ànəa Fɔ̧̀ wu Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà li ndzɔꞋ etsàà la à? Tà wù waã wàà?”
Bɔ bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê, “Tà wu waã Fɔ̧̀ Dàbid.”
Tà mè mbììte awɔb nê, “Ale, ghǎ li ngɨ̀ ka Fo Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà ghɨ̀ Fɔ̧̀ Dàbid me tɔ tò ane tǎt vi à? Dàbid li nê,
‘Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà Lefɨ̀Ꞌ shu abua Lefɨ̀Ꞌ am nê,
Tseke àbâ àbualu̧ am
tè e ŋà èlu̧ à tsite èka bê a ègwet bɔmbù̧ bê.’
Fɔ̧̀ Dàbid wu tɔ atò ane tǎt vi, tà ghɨ̀ na ka ntsiꞋi waã Dàbid à?”
Wòt li tà kà wuê tàa ko etsɔꞋɔ èngǎ̧ tò la. E bùꞋu ane àlia mbɔŋ me ghà ne mbì, wòt kà tsi mè nyɔ̀Ꞌtè ebiite atò èngà̧.
Yesò ghɨ̀ ale, shu abua ènɔ̧̂ bòt bu nè bɔkatè bi nê
“BènyɨꞋtà mbɨ̧te Musì nè Bèfalèsiì wu bòt bɔ tsià wɔb nê bɔ̀ me yààte mbɨ̧te Musì shua bòt la.
È wu ale, bɨ̀ me zə awɔb mè ngɨ̀à àghɨa bɔ̀ɔ shua la, ka bɨ̀ ka me ghɨ̀ àghɨa bɔ̀ɔ ngɨ̀à la, nkàà nê bɔɔ kà ghɨ àghɨa bɔ̀ɔ shua la.
Bɔ̀ɔ ngɨ̀ bɔ zì àbòꞋà leled kà wòt wu ko ŋeꞋe, a kwen wòt, ka wòt ane yɔb ka wu lɔ̀kè àbu azi etɨŋe wòt mbɔŋ.

“Bɔ̀ɔ ngɨ̀ bɔ̀ me ghɨ àghɨ àgème, bɔ wua nkɨ̀a wuê mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bòt aa me ye awɔb. Ye ndɨ è bɔb ne bakɔ̂b bu bɔ̀ɔ ndzìà èngǎ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nkùùla a mèsi mɔb la, bèa fàŋka la. Mè ndzì ndɨ bandǐ bu bɔ̀ɔ maꞋa àmî bɔb ntsàꞋte a Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la bèa sààtà la.
Bɔ taꞋa wua nkɔ̀ŋkà èdziꞋi nɨ̧ a èdziꞋi mèpà̧ nè ètɨ̧ ntsɔ̧̀ à lobte Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà tɔb.
Mè taꞋa wua nkɔ̀ŋkà bòt aa me nèèta ntsàꞋtè àwɔb àsà̧aã èwen e mě me tɔ awɔb ane bènyɨꞋtà.
“Ka è me wu awɨ̧, bɨ̀ ka mbɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀ne bòt e me tɔ awɨ̧ ane bènyɨꞋtà, nkàà nê bɨ̀agème bɨ wu bɔnyɨ, mè mbɔ nyɨꞋtà wuê wemɔ̀Ꞌ.
Bɨ ka ntɔ wòt kǒ a sitsǎꞋ ane tǎt wɨ̧, nkàà nê bɨ bɔ a tǎt wuê wemɔ̀Ꞌ, wu tǎt wɨ̧ wu a ègwet la.
Bɨ̀ ka mè mbɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀ne bɔ tɔ awɨ̧ ane tàt, nkàà nè bɨ bɔ wuê wòt wemɔ̀Ꞌ bɨ̀a tɔ atò ane tàt la. Wu Fɔ̧̀ wu Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà li ndzɔꞋ ntsà la.
Wòt tà tsè awɨ̧ bàgème la bɔ ndɨ tàa wu wafàꞋ wɨ̧ la.
Wòt ŋèꞋe avi a ègwet ko bɔɔ shuke tò a si, wòt tà shuke avi a si la bɔɔ ŋeꞋe tò a ègwet.

“Aa li bɨa wɨ̧, bɨ̀a bènyɨꞋtà mbɨ̧te Musì nè Bèfalèsiì, bɨ̀a wu bɨ̀a shua nê bɨ wu àghɨa kà wu yùà la, nkàà nê bɨa nkèla bòt mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɔ nyi a Kèfɔ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà. Bɨ̀a mbɔŋ aà kà kɨ nyi, mbɔ̂ nkèle bòt nkɨ enyi la, mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɔ nyi. [

Aa li bɨ̀a wɨ̧ bɨ̀a bènyɨꞋtà mbɨ̧te Musì nè Bèfalèsiì, bɨ̀a wu bɨ̀a shua nê bɨ wu àghɨa kà wu yùà la. Bɨ̀a ngɨ̀ bɨ fɨte bènempfə njɨ̀ lob tɔb mbɔ̂ ndɔ̀Ꞌ me tsàꞋta Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà ndà̧à̧nà mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ enɨ evəèəèlè àghɨ a bòt. Bɨ̀a li bɔ ngoꞋ è tsě ye bòt bàgème la.]

“Aa li bɨa wɨ̧, bɨ̀a bènyɨꞋtà mbɨ̧te Musì nè Bèfalèsiì, bɨ̀a wu bɨ̀a shua nê bɨ̀ wu àghɨa kà wu yùà la! Bɨ̀a ngɨ̀ bɨ ntu̧ mèdzî, ntsè èlaꞋ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɨ̀ wuê e ghɨ̌ ka wuê wòt wemɔ̀Ꞌ naa kùŋe a Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà ane wɨ̧ ne alu̧. Bɨ̀ bɔ bɨ̀ ghɨ̀ ale, bɨ tsoke a ŋut kwat tè tà mè mbɨɨ tê ntsiꞋi èwe tàa bɨ̌ nyi a èwet Satàn a mbì lɨ̧ la.

“Aa li bɨa wɨ̧, bɨ̀a bòt àghɨ àleme bu bɨ baãaã èbu beko me nyɨꞋte awɔb èlu̧ mè shua nê ‘wòt zìa nkà̧ ane lob nɨ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà ko è ntsě ànəê, mbə tà zì nkà̧ ane èghɨ bu bɔ nɨ̀a goêl nɨŋ ngɨ̀ nɔ̀ŋe a èbem lob Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la, tà ko nê nkà̧ mbɔŋ kuule vi.’
Ye èkèghɨ̧̀ àghɨ àleme ko! À yea a tsè àyea ko la wu a yea ŋaà? Wu èghɨ bu bɔ ghɨ̂ ane goêl la, kò wuê lob mbɔŋ yu è ghɨ̂ èghɨ mbɔŋ bu e tsiꞋì èbe Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la à?
Bɨà nyɨ̀Ꞌta nê, wòt zìà nkà̧ àdziꞋa bɔ̀ɔ ŋǎ èghɨ abua Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la, àghɨ à ka ghɨ̌, ka tà zǐ nkà̧ àghɨa bɔ nɔ̀ŋe a ègwet àdzìꞋa mbɔŋ la, tà ko nê nkà̧ mbɔŋ kuule avi.
Bɨ̀a bòt àghɨ àleme! À yea ŋa a tsè a yea ko à? Wu àghɨ yu bɔ ŋa abua Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la, kò wuê àdziꞋ yu bɔ nɔ̀ŋè àghɨa abot, à tsiꞋi àyea Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la à?
È wu ale, wòt zìà nkà̧ àdziꞋa bɔ̀ɔ ŋǎ èghɨ abua Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la, tà ko nê ye wua nkà̧ àdziꞋa mbɔŋ nè èghɨ ègème bɔ nɔ̀ŋe a ègwet la.
Èwe tà zǐ nkà̧ lob nɨ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la, tà ko nê ye wua nkà̧ lob mbɔŋ mè ngua nkà̧ a Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà wu tàa ntsèka a èbèm la.
Wòt tà kà̧ ègwet la ko nê ye wua kaãaã àtɨ̧a Kèfɔ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà mè ngua nkà̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà wu tà tseke a ègwet àtɨ̧ mbɔŋ la.

“Aa li bɨa wɨ̧ bɨ̀a bènyɨꞋtà mbɨ̧te Musì nè Bèfalèsiì, bɨ̀a wu bɨ̀a shua nê bɨ wu àghɨa kà wu yùà la! Bɨ̀a ngɨ̀ bɨ ghàbtè èghɨ mbȩ bɨ̧ ane èdzìꞋ èghem eghǎ wu ka wuê ane tèfɔbtsə ŋǎ èghab Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà,

Bɨ̀a bòt àghɨ àleme bu bɨ baãaã èbu beko me nyɨꞋte awɔb èlu̧ la, bɨ̀a ngɨ̀ bɨ̀ ye kèdzǐ a èbem ndɔŋ mèlùꞋ yɨ̧, bɨ nɨ àfɨ̀Ꞌ nkàŋkè ntsì, ka mbɔ̂ ngu emɨ̀ɨ̀lè anyà̧ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ loà kà koê.

“Àa li bɨa wɨ̧ bɨ̀a bènyɨꞋtà mbɨ̧te Musì nè Bèfalèsiì, Bɨ̀a wu bɨ̀a shua nê bɨ wu àghɨa kà wu yùà la! Bɨ̀a ngɨ̀ bɨ shùù kwènte bapfəèꞋ nè ndɔŋ tɨ̧, ka tèbemtsə te lu̧ ne èghɨ bɨ ghòꞋne bòt ngɨ̀ɨ̀la awɔb nɨŋ la.
Bɨ̀a Bèfalèsiì, bɨ lâ ngu bòt àghɨ àleme! Bɨ̀ bɨa shùù tèbemte ndɔŋ tɨ̧ nè tèbemte bapfəèꞋ bɨ̧ ko kwèntsə teà nga me fəəte mɨ̧̂.

“Àa li bɨa wɨ̧, bɨ̀a bènyɨꞋtà mbɨ̧te Musì nè Bèfalèsiì, bɨ̀a wu bɨ̀a shua nê bɨ wu àghɨa kà wu yùà la! Bɨ wu mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ ètsəsì bɔ bɔ̧ ndɔ̀ɔ̀be nè ètsaꞋa kèfə e me bɔ̌ àbȩ la, ka tèbèmtsə te bɔ̂ ndù̧ ne èkwȩ bèmpfəà nè èfi bɔbȩ.
Wu wuê a èlɨ mbɔŋ bɨ̀a ngɨ̀ bɨ ghɨ̂ bòt e me ye awɨ̧ àbȩ nê bɨ tɨ̧ɨ̧ ndɨŋndɨ̀ŋ e mbì Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà, ka mèntɨ̧ɨ̧ mɨ̧ bɔ̂ ndù̧ ne kàbɔ̀ŋ, bɨ̀ ka meè ngu àghɨa bɨ̀a shua nê bɨ wu yùà la.

“Aa li bɨa wɨ̧ bɨ̀a bènyɨꞋtà mbɨ̧te Musì nè Bèfalèsiì, bɨ̀a wu bɨ̀a shua nê bɨ wu àghɨa kà wu yùà la! Bɨ̀a ngɨ̀ bɨ nèète ètsəsì bèndàꞋàtɔŋ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nè bòt bu bɔ li ntɨ̧ɨ̧ ndɨŋndɨ̀ŋ e mbì Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la mbɔ̧ ndɔ̀Ꞌ ndɔ̀ɔ̀be.
Bɨ̀ me ghɨ̀ ale, bɨ me shu nê bɨ li ngɨ̀ ale ngu àlia bètǎt nyaꞋ bɨ̧ ko bɨ̀ le kaꞋa ghɨ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɔ̀ɔ̀ba èbùŋè bèndàꞋàtɔŋ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà.
Ale, bɨ lâ mbɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀ne nê bɨ wu bɔ̧ bòt bu bɔ li bùŋè bèndàꞋàtɔŋ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la.
È wu ale, bɨ bê mpàa àfaꞋa bètǎt nyaꞋ bɨ̧ ngɨ̀.
“Bɨ̀a nyà̧tekàbɔ̀ŋ, nè bɔ̧ nyà̧tekàbɔ̀ŋ! Bɨ̀a ghɨ̀ na te lùùla te bɔɔ bakà maꞋa wɨ̧ a èbem èwet Satàn à?

È wu ale, tsiꞋ è shua wɨ̧ nê maa tsàà bèndàꞋàtɔŋ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà a kètsìà wɨ̧ nè bòt èyì, nè bènyɨꞋtà mènəè Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà, bɨa bùŋè beko, ewu̧u̧te ebeko a mbɨ̧̀ mbasa, e shu̧ beko a èbem lobte Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà, e mě me nkùŋè àwɔb àpfəè èpfəè, nkɨà àtsəa yɔb enɨ.

A èlɨ̀ waa, ànyem a bòt bu bàgème bɔ li mbùŋè àwɔb a sitsǎꞋ kà bɔ ko ànəê la aa li nɔ̀ŋke akedû̧tsə fɨ̧. Ànyem a mbɔŋ aa li buꞋu ane ànəa Abèl wòt mènəè ntsɔ̧̀ eghǎ wu ane Zàkàleyà waã Bàlachìà wu bɨ li mbuŋe tò a kètsìà lob nɨ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nè àdzìꞋ yu bɔ̀ɔ ŋa èghɨ abua Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la.
TsiꞋ è shu awɨ̧ ane nkûŋ nê, ànyem bòt baa bàgème aa li nɔ̀ŋke akedû̧tsə bòt laane wàa.

“Àfɨ̀Ꞌ àko a tseke tè me wu, Yesò bùꞋ me ŋȩa shua nê, ‘Bòt Jèlusalèm, bòt Jèlusalèm leꞋ! Bɨà mbùŋà bèndàꞋàtɔŋ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà ndɔ̀Ꞌ ŋèꞋnà bɔntu̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà tà tsàà abua yɨ̧ la, ane àti. Mâ nyɔ̀Ꞌtè a ngo̧ a ngò̧ nê e nkɨ enɨ èbu bɔ̧ efete awɨ̧ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ nkɔ̀Ꞌ nàa ngɨ̀ tà fète bɔ̧ bi ndzì a èten tèbààbè ti la, ka bɨ̀ ka bɨ̧ɨ̧ne!’
Bɨ̀ zə! Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà tsì èsi vi ane àpfəa yɨ̧ tè ndɔ̀Ꞌ tè wòt kà tsi ngua ntsèka a èbèm.
TsiꞋ è shua wɨ̧ nê e bùꞋu àfɨ̀Ꞌ yaa nɨ ghà ne mbì bɨ̀ ka tsi ye am a, tè àli yu bɨ̀a li lete èngùŋ nê ‘TsiꞋ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà lɔ̀ɔ̀le a wòt wu nkɨ̀Ꞌa ane èlen tò la a kùꞋ.’ ”
Yesò li sà lob nɨ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà me ghǎ, bɔkatè tò e kɨꞋɨ̀ me laꞋa ànəa lob mbɔŋ.

Tà shu abua yɔb nê, “Bɨ̀ lɨ̀ŋkè lob tàa a èbem àpfəè ŋaà la tègème ndze. TsiꞋ è shua wɨ̧ ane nkûŋ nê, bɔɔ li bùù lob te mbɔŋ tègème tè wòt kɨꞋɨ abot tà kà tsi ndzè ka wuê èti lemɔꞋ ane àtetsi.”

Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ Yesò tseke a ègwet èbȩ Olìf la, bɔkatè tò e kɨꞋɨ shu abua tò a ntsèm nê, “Shu awa àfɨꞋa mènəè maa ègème nàa li ghɨ̀ la, mè nè àghɨa àa nyɨ̀Ꞌtâ nê à bèle yàŋe ekɨꞋɨ, ngɔ̀ŋ mè ngu lìà la.”
Yesò bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê, bɨ̀ me ko awɨ̧ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ wòt kǒ fɨte awɨ̧,
nkàà nê bòt nyaŋ aa li kɨꞋɨ nɨ èlen laã e me shu nê bɔ wu Fɔ̧̀ wu Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà yɔꞋ ntsà la, efɨte bòt nyaŋ.
Bɨ mè ngu zə ndɨ bɔ nùà mèbet a ngèt yɨ̧ la, nè è me endɨ̌. Ka bɨ̀ kâ mbèntê, wu èghɨ e bɔ ndɨ àa ghɨ̀ la, ka è ka wua nyɨ̀Ꞌta nê mèndìa è kɨꞋɨ tê ndɔ̀Ꞌ.
ÈlaꞋ aa li me nù beko, bèfɔ̧̀ be mè ngu me nù beko. Èchɨɨ aa li lu̧ àbȩ, sitsǎꞋ mè ngu me nyìꞋna nkwèà nyɨŋa bòt a èdzìꞋ ègème.
Mènəè màà ègème naa li wua nyɨ̀Ꞌta wu ntseit, wuê mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ àvi nàa ngɨ̀ tà me kɨ ebi waã tà bùꞋ me lu̧u̧te la.
Bɔɔ li baãaã wɨ̧ àfɨꞋa mbɔŋ e ŋa bɔɔ zì àwɨ̧ a ngoꞋ ebɔ bùŋè àwɨ̧. Bòt èlaꞋ ègème aa li me pààbè awɨ̧ ambo yaã.
Bòt nyaŋ aa li lùùlà am àfɨꞋa mbɔŋ, e mě me jɨ mènàŋ a ègwet bɔnyɨ bɔb, mè mpààbà àwɔb.
Bòt nyaŋ aa li lɔ̀Ꞌte a si àfɨꞋa mbɔŋ e me fɨta shua nê bɔ wu bèndàꞋàtɔŋ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà, ngɨ̀à bòt e fà̧à̧tà èka bɔb.
Kàbɔ̀ŋ naa li ghe, te e ghɨ̌ èkɔŋ bòt nyaŋ ane Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà aa yu,
ka wòt tàa li baãaã èntɨ̧ɨ̧ vi te ghǎ ewu a ndìa la, naa li bɔ mèmpème.
Bɔɔ li tsɔ̀te Ntu̧ Ntsɔ̧̀ kèfɔ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà yaa a èlaꞋ ègème a sitsǎꞋ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ waa waa naa zə, ka ngɔ̀ŋ naa lìa.
“Naa li ngu àfɨꞋa mbɔŋ bɨ ye àbɨꞋte àghɨ yu Danià ndàꞋàtɔŋ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà li shuê la, a tɨ̧ɨ̧ a èbem lob nɨ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la. (Wòt wu ntɔ èngà̧ waa la nyɔꞋta nko ànəa èngǎ̧ mbɔŋ e shua la.)
“ÀfɨꞋa mbɔŋ bòt bu a Jùdià la, è luula nkɔꞋ ngà a ègwet tèbȩtsə.
Wòt tà wu a kɔ̧̀ lob la è ka tsi nchu a si enɨ èghɨ a èbem lob zi.
Wòt tà wu àbȩ la ka tsi nkua akwèn abàꞋa èmǎ̧ vi.
Aa li bɨɨ àbâ bèzi bu bɔ kɔte la, nè è bu bɔ̀ɔ nyɔ̀ŋa bɔ̧ la àfɨꞋa mbɔŋ.
Bɨ̀ tsàꞋte a Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nê, àlia mànduula yàà à ka ndi ngu a kètsìà àbɨ̂ŋ kò àliapfəèa Bèjuê leꞋ,
nkàà nê ngoꞋ kèkweelè naa li wu àfɨꞋa mbɔŋ. Èwuu ngoꞋ mbɔŋ wu ye kà bɔ li tè mè ye mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ ngɔ̀ŋ li mbùꞋ ekɨꞋɨ dzəâ àfɨ̀Ꞌ yaa la. Bòt è ka meè ngu li eye yùà ka ngɔ̀ŋ naa lìa.
È kà chɨɨme ngu na Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà lo̧o̧ne èli mbɔŋ tè ndɔ̀Ꞌ la, ko wòt kǒ tàa li peme la ntsě, ka tàà ghǎ ambo bòt bu tà làa ane bi la elo̧o̧ne èli mbɔŋ.
ÀfɨꞋa mbɔŋ wòt shu abua yɨ̧ nê, ‘Bɨ̀ ye a Fɔ̧̀ wu Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà yɔꞋ ntsà la àdziꞋ yaa ko àdziꞋ zià leꞋ’ bɨ̀ ka mbɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀ne ànəa tà shua la.

Bòt aa li lɔ̀Ꞌte a si me fɨta shua nê bɔ wu Fɔ̧̀ mbɔŋ e mě me fɨta shua nê, bɔ wu bèndàꞋàtɔŋ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà. Bɔɔ li ghɨ̀ èghɨ a nyɨ̀Ꞌta mètàŋ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la, e mě lute tèkaŋtsə mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ efɨte banɔ̧̀, te e me nyɔ̀Ꞌte a màfɨta bòt Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà na èlu̧ e wuà la.
Bɨ̀ zə na mâ shua wɨ̧ àfɨꞋa ntsɔ̧̀ tè ndɔ̀Ꞌ la.
“È wu ale, bɔ shua wɨ̧ nê, tà wu àbâ àlaꞋ àyuube, bɨ̀ ka ngà, kò wuê nê tà wu a èbem àtsəa lob leꞋ, bɨ̀ ka mbɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀ne ànəa bɔ shua la,
nkàà nê, Waã Wòt naa li kɨꞋɨ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ èfaŋ àa ngɨ̀ e kaꞋa ègwelebuule ebuꞋu àbâ yaa eghǎ wu àzia la.
A bê ngu wuê mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ àpfəꞋte nyà̧ àa ngɨ̀ à nɔ̀ŋke adzìꞋ àgème, tè tèdzǐtsə te wu abot la.
“NgoꞋ kèkweelè yu ane èli mbɔŋ la naa li ntsè, me lɔꞋɔ,
‘Àtaãnyèm a fen,
èŋu è ka tsi fə,
těnto̧tsə a ègwet te kwente a si,
Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà mè nyìꞋì èghɨ ègème àa ègwet la.’

“ÀfɨꞋa mbɔŋ, àghɨa àa nyɨꞋte nê, Waã Wòt kɨꞋɨ la, a saꞋ a ègwet, bòt èndà̧ ègème a sitsǎꞋ e bùù mèdɨ̀, mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɔ ye Waã Wòt nkɨ̀Ꞌa ègwelebuule a èbem mbàꞋ, nè mètàŋ bɔ̂ mèngùꞋte ènɨ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la.
Bɔɔ li ntɔ taꞋà èsɔndɨk, tà tsàà bɔntu̧ bi bu a ègwet la àbȩ a bètɔ̀Ꞌa sitsǎꞋ bu bakwì la, bɔɔ ghǎ fete bòt bu tà làa ane ebi la, ebùꞋu àbâ ngɔ̀ŋ ko e ghǎ dzə ayea ko.
“Bɨ̀ nɨ nkɨà ane àyɨt a fik yaa. Nàa ngɨ̀ è wu àfɨꞋa mèntaãaã tò fen, tà bùꞋ me kɔke tèfəꞋte fi la, bɨ ko nê mènkwenà nàà nkɨ̀Ꞌa.
Wu wuê èlɨ bɨ yea èghɨ bàà ègème, bɨ ko nê, Waã Wòt kɨꞋɨ tê ntsiꞋa ètsələèꞋ la.
Ane nkûŋ, tsiꞋ è shua wɨ̧ nê, bòt ngɔ̀ŋ àfɨ̀Ꞌ yaa aa me laꞋ nê bɔɔ ndèma, èghɨ bàagème e ghɨ̌.
SitsǎꞋ bɔ̂ ègwet naa li lɔ̀Ꞌɔ lìa, ka àghɨ à ka wuê li ekubte ane èngǎ̧ am.
“Ka wòt kǒ ntsě tà ko àlia èghɨ bàà àa ghɨ̀ la, ka wuê bɔntu̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà bu a ègwet la, kò Waã Wòt leꞋ. Wu ndàꞋ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà ka tà ko la.
Èlɨ mènəè li ngɨ̀ àfɨꞋa Noà la, wu ndɨ nàa li ghɨ̌ àfɨꞋa Waã Wòt nàa nkɨ ekɨꞋɨ la.

È li ngu àfɨꞋa mbɔŋ, mèleb mu è li ndû̧ èdziꞋ ègème nkùŋe èghɨ la, me laꞋ nê yea nkɨ̀Ꞌa, bòt e wua jɨ̀a mè nua, mbâ̧tsə nè bèzi e me yɔꞋɔ awɔb tè ngà dzəè àfɨ̀Ꞌ yu Noà li nyi a èbem ànkànuꞋ yu la.
Bɔ li bɔ̀ ka ko àghɨa nga e ghɨ̀ la, tè mèleb mu kɨꞋɨ̀ ntuꞋu awɔb bàgème. Eyaa wu ndɨ Waã Wòt nàa li kɨꞋɨ la.
ÀfɨꞋa mbɔŋ, bòt babe aa li ngua mbȩ, bɔ nɨ wemɔ̀Ꞌ, ntɔ̀ɔ wekǒ.
Bèzi babe e wua èti ngɔ̀Ꞌɔ̀ ntsəètsə, bɔ nɨ wemɔ̀Ꞌ ntɔ̀ɔ wekǒ.
“È wu ale, bɨ̀ ghaꞋte àghɨ ayɨ̧ ntsɔ̧̀ nkàà nê, bɨ bakà ko àlia tǎt wɨ̧ nàa kɨꞋɨ la.
Bɨ̀ ko nê tǎt lob ko àfɨꞋa tsɔŋ nàa kɨꞋɨ ètsəꞋ la, kèlɔ kè ka nyi a èghɨ tò mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɔ gha ghɨ̌ nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ mbəèꞋəè lob tò.
È wu ale, bɨ̀ ye nê, bɨ taŋke awɨ̧ ntsɔ̧̀, nkàà nê Waã Wòt naa kɨꞋɨ àfɨꞋa kà bɨ ko nê tàà nkɨ̀Ꞌâ.
“WafàꞋ ntsɔ̧̀ tà bɔ èyì la wu we ŋaà? Wu wu tǎt àfàꞋ tò zi atò àtsəa beko nê tà me ŋa wɔb èghɨjɨ àfɨꞋa ntsɔ̧̀ la.
WafàꞋ ngaa naa taꞋa wùꞋtè àvi, na tǎt àfàꞋ tò me kɨꞋɨ àpfəè ndze atò fàꞋà la.
Ane nkûŋ, tsiꞋ è shua wɨ̧ nê, ko tǎt àfàꞋ wu naa zǐ atò àtsəa èghɨ bi ègème.
Ka wafàꞋ mbɔŋ wu we kàbɔ̀ŋ, ko taa shu abua zi zìambɔŋ nê, ‘Tǎt àfàꞋ am tseke nyaŋ,’
ale tà bùꞋ me lene bɔfàꞋ ko bu, mè jɨa nùa bɔ̂ èbaala mèlùꞋ.
Ale, ko tǎt àfàꞋ tò naa kɨꞋɨ ane àlia tà ghɨ̂ tà kà wua nchɨꞋa tò la, nè àfɨꞋa kà tà koê.
Mbɔ̂ ngu saãaãte atò màꞋa a si, e tsàà atò àdziꞋa bòt bu bɔ̀ɔ shua nê bɔ wu àghɨa kà wu yùà la, è wu la, àdziꞋa bɔ̀ɔ me dɨ̀a nkwèla àsɔŋ yɔb la.
“Àlia mbɔŋ aa li nkùꞋ, ànəa kèfɔ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà a wu mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ àyea bɔɔ̀zi ko èghem bɔ li nɨ mèkàꞋà mɔb nga esèè lu̧ ndzà la.
Bɔɔ̀zi batà̧â̧ ane yɔb li ngu bòt kà bɔ èyì, èbeko batà̧â̧ wu bòt bɔ èyì la.
È bu ka bɔ èyì la e me nɨ mèkàꞋà mɔb nɨa ngà bɔ̀ ka nɨ mèleb èkaꞋà a èbem èghɨ ko tsa,
ka è bu bɔ bɔ èyì la enɨ mèkàꞋà mɔb mbɔ̂ mbèa àbəꞋa mèleb a èbem èghɨ ko tsa.
Bɔ gha ale lu̧ ndzà yu ka yaŋe nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂, ale, kèlɔ ke baãaã wɔb bàgème bɔ nɔ̀ŋkè me li.
“È tseke tè me wu a èntɨ̧ɨ̧ ètsəꞋ, wòt kǒ letè èngùŋ nê ‘Lu̧ ndzà yu kɨꞋɨ̀; Bɨ̀ dzəa àbȩ sèè atò.’
“Bɔɔ̀zi bu e lɔ̀Ꞌtè a si bàgème nèètè mèkàꞋà mɔb nkɔ̀ktê.
È bu kà bɔ èyì la e shu abua ebe èyì bu nê ‘Bɨ̀ ŋa adziꞋ mèleb èkaꞋà mɨ̧ kǒ abua ya, è ma nê mèkàꞋà tsiꞋa ndèma lema.’ ”
Bɔ bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê, “ ‘Mèleb èkaꞋà ma ka kuꞋu abua ya ba nɨ̧̀ baa, è wu ale bɨ ghǎ abua bòt bu bɔ̀ɔ fɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀nà la njû̧ mɨ̧.’
“Bɔ me ghà ale, lu̧ ndzà yu kɨꞋɨ, è bu be yaã ntàŋke tè ndɔ̀Ꞌ la e nyi a lob a èpǎ̧ ndzɔꞋa yu bɔ̂ tò ba, ngèbà ètsələèꞋ.
“Bɔɔ̀zi ko bu e tseke tê nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ nê ‘Tê, Tê, tsɔꞋɔ lob abua ya.’
“Lu̧ ndzà yu bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê ‘Ane nkûŋ, tsiꞋ è shua wɨ̧ nê e mbakà ko awɨ̧.’
“Yesò lìà nê, bɨ̀ tseke me lȩ̂ ntsɔ̧̀ nkàà nê bɨ bakà ko àlia, kò àfɨꞋa màa mě kɨꞋɨ la.
“Ànəê yaa a wu mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ wòt kǒ tà li me dzəa nga à lèghȩ̀ȩ̀nè ntɔ bɔfàꞋ bi ndzì èghɨ bi abua yɔb la.
Tà li ŋà bètɔsì batà̧â̧ abua wekǒ, ŋà bètɔsì babe abua wekǒ, mè ŋà tɔsì wemɔ̀Ꞌ abua wekǒ, mbɔ̂ ŋa ndɨ mètàŋ wòt ègème ane yɔb nyɨꞋte la. Mbɔ̂ ndzəè ngà à lèghȩ̀ȩ̀nè wu.
WafàꞋ wu bɔ yaã ŋà bètɔsì batà̧â̧ abua tò la, ghà ndzì ane èwen, bètɔsì batà̧â̧ e mè nyî a ègwet.
È wu nè wòt nè bètɔsì babe la ghà ndzì è vi ane èwen mɨ̧̂, àbȩ̀ a nyî a ègwet ane bètɔsì babe.
Ka wu bɔ yaã ŋǎ atò tɔsì wemɔ̀Ꞌ la, ghà ntu si ndò̧ èkab tǎt àfàꞋ vi wu.
“Àfɨ̀Ꞌ a tseke tè me wu tǎt bɔfàꞋ bu kua nê bɔ̂ tò ba è tseke a si nkwàꞋtè èkab wu.
WafàꞋ wu bɔ yaã ŋǎ tò bètɔsì batà̧â̧ la kɨꞋɨ nè beko batà̧â̧ be kwèꞋne a ègwet la nê, ‘Tê, à li ŋà bètɔsì batà̧â̧ abua am, mâ ta èwen tè beko batà̧â̧ be nyi a ègwet.’

“Tǎt àfàꞋ wu shu abua tò nê ‘E wu la, à wu ngule wafàꞋ àa ngɨ̀à àfàꞋ àyê ntsɔ̧̀ la. Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ à baãaãte àdziꞋ èkab wàa ntsɔ̧̀ la, maa tsia wê àtsəa èghɨ nyaŋ. Nyi a lob ba nè è fɔte ngùꞋtè àwa.’
“È wu bɔ yaã ŋǎ atò bètɔsì babe la kɨꞋɨ nê ‘Tê, à li ŋà bètɔsì babe abua am, mâ ta èwen tè beko babe be nyi a ègwet.’

“Tǎt àfàꞋ wu shu abua tò nê ‘E wu la, à wu ngule wafàꞋ àa ngɨ̀à àfàꞋ àyê ntsɔ̧̀ la. Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ à baãaãte àdziꞋ èkab wàa ntsɔ̧̀ la maa tsia wê àtsəa èghɨ nyaŋ. Nyi a lob ba nè efɔte ngùꞋtè àwa.’
“È wu bɔ yaã ŋǎ tò tɔsì wemɔ̀Ꞌ la kɨꞋɨ̀ nê ‘Tê, mâ ko nê àbu àyê a kweelè nge, à mè me fùꞋu àdziꞋa kà liꞋ, mè nɨa àdziꞋa kà nɔ̀ŋè.
Ale, e ndi ngà ntu si ndò̧ èkab wê, maà mbɔ̀a wê la. Ye èkab wê mbɔŋ ye wu.’
“Tǎt àfàꞋ tò wu bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê, ‘Ye àlȩȩta wafàꞋ kǒ kà ye àtsə ànəê àzi. À li nko nê maa fuꞋa àdziꞋa kà liꞋ, mè nɨ̀a àdziꞋa kà nɔ̀ŋè,
à kà wu nɨ èkab am e ghǎ nɔ̀ŋe a lob èkab? Ko mâ kua ale nɨ èkab am wu nè àbȩ̀ a ègwet.
“ ‘Ale, bɨ̀ nɨ tɔsì wu abua tò la ŋa abua wòt wu nè bètɔsì èghem la.
Nkàà nê wòt tà bɔ àbȩ̀ nyaŋ la, bɔɔ kwèꞋne aa taꞋa yaãaã, ka è me wu wu kà bɔ àghɨ la, ko bɔɔ paa kàyaã wu tà bɔ la enɨ.
È me wu wafàꞋ wu kà ye àtsəa ànəê àzi la ko bɨ̀ baãaã atò maꞋa àbȩ a èbem kèbìꞋà, àdziꞋa tàa me dɨ̀a mè nkwèla àsɔŋ zi la.’
“Naa li ngu àfɨꞋa Waã Wòt kɨꞋɨ ane ènɨ̧ tǎt vi, nè bɔntu̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà bàgème la, tà tseke a ègwet àtɨ̧a Kèfɔ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà.
ÀfɨꞋa mbɔŋ bòt èlaꞋ ègème a sitsǎꞋ e bù̧ù̧te a mbì tò tà ghàbtè àwɔb mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ mbaabà njɨ̀ nàa ngɨ̀ tà ghàbtè njɨ̀tsə ntsi ane dzətsə la,
mbɔ̂ ntsà njɨ̀ tu àbâ àbualu̧ zi, ntsà dzə tu àbâ àbuantoŋ zi.
“ÀfɨꞋa mbɔŋ ko fɔ̧̀ wu naa shu abua bòt bu àbâ àbualu̧ zi la nê ‘Bɨ̀ kɨꞋɨ, bɨ̀a wu Tǎt am èlɔ̀ɔ̀lè àwɨ̧ la, njɨ̀a kèfɔ̧̀ wu bɔ li ntàŋke abua yɨ̧ a me mbùꞋu ngɔ̀ŋ la.
Bɨ jɨ̀ nkàà nê ndzìtsə te li me ku am, bɨ ŋa èghɨjɨ e njɨ, àtɔŋ am a yu̧, bɨ ŋa mèleb e nu, e nkɨꞋɨ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ gɨ̧̀ bɨ sèe am,
e me ghȩȩne mbɨ̧̀ fəâ, bɨ ŋa ndǐ e nkwaã, me ghɔ̧̀ɔ̧̀ne, bɨ kɨꞋɨ̀ ntsàꞋtè am, bɔ zi am a lob tèfȩ, bɨ kɨꞋɨ̀ ndȩ̀ am.’

“ÀfɨꞋa mbɔŋ ko bòt ntsɔ̧̀ baa aa biite atò nê ‘Tê, ba li nchɨɨmè ndzè àwê nè ŋǎ ndzìtsə tèa nkua wê la, ŋǎ èghɨjɨ à jɨ, kò ndzè àwê nè ŋǎ àtɔŋ yê a yu̧u̧ la ŋà mèleb à nu à?
Ba li ndzè àwê nè ŋǎ à wu gɨ̧̀ la sèe wê kò ngȩ̀ȩ̀nà kà kwaãaã ndǐ la ŋǎ ndǐ à kwaãaã à?
Ba li mè ndzè àwê nè ŋǎ ngò̧ò̧nà kò a lob tèfȩ leꞋ nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ ntsàꞋtè àwê à?’
“Bɔ biite ale ko fɔ̧̀ wu naa bɨ̀ɨ̀le èngǎ̧ wɔb laꞋnê ‘Ane nkûŋ, tsiꞋ è shua wɨ̧ nê mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɨ li ngɨ̀ ane we tà lìa à kwèn ane bɔnyɨ bɔ̧ baa la, bɨ li ngua ngɨ̀à abua am’.

“Taa shu ale, e gheble avi è shu abua bòt bu àbâ àbuantoŋ zi la nê ‘Bɨ̀ lɔꞋɔ a ngèt yaã, bɨ̀a wu Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà zi ndɔ̀ àtsəa yɨ̧ la ngà a èbem èwet kà wu li elìa Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà taŋke abua Satàn bɔ̂ bɔntu̧ bi la.
Bɨ̀ gha nkàà nê ndzìtsə te li me ku am, bɨ̀ ka ŋa èghɨjɨ maa jɨ, àtɔŋ am a yu̧, bɨ̀ ka ŋa mèleb maa nu,
e nkɨꞋɨ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ gɨ̧̀, bɨ̀ ka sèe am, e me ghȩ̀ȩ̀nè ka kwaãaã ndǐ, bɨ̀ ka ŋa ndǐ maa kwaãaã, e me ghɔ̧̀ɔ̧̀ne bɔ mè ndzì am a lob tèfȩ, bɨ̀ ka kɨꞋɨ e lȩ̀ am.’

“Ko bɔɔ biite atò mɨ̧̂ nê, ‘Tê, bà li ndzè àwê a ka àfɨꞋa ndzìtsə tèa nku àwê, kò àtɔŋ yê a yu̧ la, kò à wu gɨ̧̀ la, kò àa ngȩ̀ȩ̀nà kà kwaãaã ndǐ, kò ngò̧ò̧nà, kò a lob tèfȩ la bà ka tɨŋe àwê à?’
“Ko tàa bɨ̀ɨ̀le nê ‘Ane nkûŋ, tsiꞋ è shua wɨ̧ nê mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɨ li kaꞋa ghɨ̌ ane we tà lìa a kwèn ane bɔnyɨ bɔ̧ baa la, a wu nê bɨ li kaꞋa wua ngɨa abua am.’
“ÀfɨꞋa mbɔŋ ko bòt kàbɔ̀ŋ bu aa gha àdziꞋa kà ngoꞋ wu li elìa, èbe ntsɔ̧̀ bu e egha àdziꞋa mèmpème kàlìà.”
È li ngu àfɨꞋa Yesò nyɨ̀Ꞌte mèngà̧ maa tè mpàa la, tà shu abua bɔkatè bi nê,
“Bɨ̀ ko nê, è tsìꞋi èlibȩ bebe, èpǎ̧ Màntsea a ègwet e kɨꞋɨ̀, è wù àlia bɔ̀ɔ baãaã Waã Wòt ezǐ a tèkitebu bòt, bɔ̀ɔ wu̧u̧te atò a mbɨ̧̀ mbasa la.”
ÀfɨꞋa mbɔŋ bètǎt bèntsìà mèpɨ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nè bɔɔjuŋ Bèjuê e bù̧ù̧tè a ntɔꞋɔ àtsəa bèntsìà mèpɨ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà wu bɔ̀ɔ ntɔ atò ane Kefàs la,
ndàŋkè ndɨ bɔ̀ɔ yɨ̧ɨ̧me ebaãaã Yesò e bùŋe atò la.
Ka mbɔ̂ ngɨ̀ ale nê, bɔ ka baãaã atò àfɨꞋa èpà̧ wu, mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ ka banɔ̧̀ e bùꞋ ndèm.
ÀfɨꞋa Yesò wu a Betanì, a lob wòt àghɔ̧atsɔꞋɔ kǒ bɔ̀ɔ ntɔ tò ane Simùn la,
àvi kǒ kɨꞋɨ nè mèwet yɔ̀Ꞌɔ kǒ è tsoo nge la, a èbem atǒꞋ kǒ bɔ ghɨ ane èti ko bɔ̀ɔ ntɔ nê àlàbastà la ntsəètè àtsəa Yesò mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ tà wu a si tà tsekè me jɨ èghɨjɨ la.
ÀfɨꞋa bɔkatè tò e ye la, a taꞋa saa wɔb, tè bɔ biitè nê, “Àvi waà chɨɨma ntsòkà mèwet màa ane ka ànəa à?
Eyaa wu mèwet bɔ wu fɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀ne ane taꞋà èkab eŋa abua bòt mbuŋ la.”
Bɔɔ̀ ndàꞋà ale, Yesò ko ànəa bɔ shua la, mbììte awɔb nê, “Bɨ̀ ŋa àvi wàa ngoꞋ ne ghà à? Tà ghɨ kwàꞋ ngule ànəa ntsɔ̧̀ abua am.
Bɨa me bɔ̂ bòt mbuŋ bɨ tò ba àfɨ̀Ꞌ àgème, ka è nka wu ewu ba nɨ̧̀ ba àfɨ̀Ꞌ àgème.
Tà yɔꞋɔ am nè mèwet màa ale, nko nê ye taŋke am àfɨ̀Ꞌ yaa ane ndɨ bɔ̀ɔ tu am la, ka àlia mbɔŋ aa li kùꞋu.
Ane nkûŋ, tsiꞋ è shua wɨ̧ nê, àdziꞋ àgème a sitsǎꞋ ŋaà bɔ̀ɔ me tsɔ̀te Ntu̧ Ntsɔ̧̀ kèfɔ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà yaa la, bɔɔ me làꞋa ànəa àvi wàa ghɨ la nɨa nkù̧ù̧ta tò.”
Wakatè Yesò ko bɔ li ngua ntɔ tò ane Judàs Iskaliòt la, gha abua bètǎt bèntsìà mèpɨ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà,
mbììte awɔb nê, “E fɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀ne a Yesò abua yɨ̧ ko bɨ̀a ŋa ghà abua am à?” Tà biite ale, bɔ ŋa tò èkwȩkab èghem yetat.
EbuꞋu àfɨꞋa ngaa me ghà ne mbì, Judàs tsìꞋa nkɨà èlu̧ tàa zi a Yesò a tèkitebu tɔb la.
Àlia mbì a èpǎ̧ bled wu nàa ka kɔꞋ la a li nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂, bɔkatè Yesò e kɨꞋɨ̀ mbììte atò nê, “Àa nkɨà nê, bà taŋke àdziꞋa àa jɨ èghɨjɨ èpǎ̧ Màntsea a ègwet la, nèŋàà?”

Tà bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê, “Bɨ̀ ghǎ a èbem àpfəèà nɨ̧, ko bɨa ye wòt kǒ. Bɨ̀ ye, bɨ shu abua tò nê, ‘NyɨꞋtà laꞋnê, èli bɔ̧ e tsiꞋi ètentem, maà nkɨa nê, bâ bɔkatè bɔ̧ è kɨꞋɨ njɨ̀ èghɨjɨ èpǎ̧ Màntsea a ègwet a lob yê.’ ”
Bɔkatè tò e ghà ngɨ̀ wuê mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ tà shu la, ntàŋke èghɨjɨ èpǎ̧ Màntsea a ègwet wu.
Nyèm è fen, Yesò bɔ̂ bɔkatè bi bu ntsɔ̀b babe la e tseke a si me jɨ èghɨjɨ.
Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɔ̀ɔ njɨ̀a la, tà nê, “TsiꞋ è shua wɨ̧ ane nkûŋ nê, wòt kǒ ane yɨ̧ nàa fɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀nè am.”
Bɔkatè tò bu e bùꞋ me biite atò wemɔ̀Ꞌ wemɔ̀Ꞌ, “Tê, wu mmɔ̌?”
Yesò bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê, “Wòt wu tà zì àbu azi a èbem apfəèꞋ ba tò la.
Waã Wòt naa pfə wuê mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɔ shɨ a èbem àkata Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la, ka aa li bɨɨ àbâ wòt wu tàa fɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀ne atò la. A li mbɔ̀ŋ ko bɔ li bɔ̀ kà lem mbia ŋut.”
Judàs wu tà li fɨ̧ɨ̧ne atò la biite nê, “NyɨꞋtà, wu mmɔ̌?” Yesò bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê, “À shu àwɔ̀ mbɔŋ.”
Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɔ̀ɔ njɨ̀a èghɨjɨ la, Yesò nɨ kètaã bled ŋà mènkɔ̀ŋke abua Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà, mbɔ̂ mboꞋ ŋǎ abua bɔkatè bi nê, “Eyaa wu mbɨ̧̀ ènyit yaã, bɨ̀ nɨŋ nkwet.”
Tà mè nɨ ndɔŋ ŋà mènkɔ̀ŋke abua Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà, mbɔ̂ ŋǎ abua yɔb shu nê “Bɨ̀agème bɨ̀ nu.
Eyaa wu àlo̧ am, Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà wua nɨa nkùùla mènkàꞋa kèkweelè mi la. Àlo̧ am yàa a tsəète a si, mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà naa waꞋa bèkàbɔ̀ŋ bòt nyaŋ.
Maa shua wɨ̧ nê, è nka li tsi nu mèlùꞋ màa bɔ ghɨ ane tètaãaãte vȩn la a, tè àli yu màa nu mèlùꞋ fi a kèfɔ̧̀ Tǎt am la a kùꞋ.”
Bɔ nkɔ̧̂ ètsəkù̧ nɨŋ ngùꞋtè a Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà, mbɔ̂ ndzəè nkɔꞋ ngà a ègwet èbȩ Olìf.
Yesò shu abua bɔkatè bi nê, “Bɨa lùùla am bàgème kwaꞋa nyèmtèsi wàa, nkàà nê Àkata Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà a shu nê,
‘Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà naa bùŋe a mbaabà njɨ̀,
njɨ̀ tu tea taate’,
ka àfɨꞋa mâ yu̧u̧me la, maa ghǎ a mbì lɨ̧ a Galìlî.”
Pità shu abua Yesò nê, “Bɔ màà ndùùlà wê bàgème, ko e nka lùùlà a.”
Yesò shu abua tò nê, “Ane nkûŋ, tsiꞋ è shua wê nê, lu̧nkɔ̀Ꞌ naa me laꞋ nê yeà ntɔ a ètsəꞋ wàà, aa tu̧ ngò̧ tetat nê ye bakà ko am.”
Pità nê, “È màà ntsìꞋi wuê àyea màa pfə ba nè la, ko e nka tu̧ laꞋ nê e mbakà ko àwê a!” Bɔkatè ko bu e mè shu wuê a èlɨ mbɔŋ.
Yesò bɔ̂ bɔkatè bi e ghà adzìꞋ ako bɔ̀ɔ ntɔ nê Gèsemanè la, tà shu abua yɔb nê, “Bɨ̀ tseke adzìꞋ yaa, è ngà nè mbì ntsàꞋtè a Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà.”
Tà bɔ̂ nɨa Pità nè bɔ̧ Zebèdiì bu babe la. Tà bùꞋ me ghɔ̧̀ɔ̧̀ne a èntɨ̧ɨ̧ vi, ènyit tò e me bɨɨ.
Ale, tà shu abua yɔb nê, “Èntɨ̧ɨ̧ am aà ngò̧ò̧nà kwàꞋ ànyaꞋne, tè betsiꞋa e bùŋè am. Bɨ̀ tseke adzìꞋ yaa àtatsi me tsàꞋte a Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nè nà̧.”
Tà mè nyaꞋa ngà nè mbì, nchùŋe àtsə azi a si, ntsàꞋtè a Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nê, “Tê, èlu̧ e wua à nɨ ndɔŋ ngoꞋ yàa àbu am la, ka à ka ngɨ̀ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ e nkɨa la, ghɨ̀ wuê mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ àa nkɨà la.”
Tà ghɨ̀ ale, nkua akwèn me kɨꞋɨ bɔkatè tò bu batat la e wua ndìa, tà bììte a Pità nê, “BetsiꞋa bɨ̀ ka tsekè àtatsi nè nà̧ ka wuê ane kètem àfɨ̀Ꞌ?
Bɨ̀ tseke àtatsi me tsàꞋte a Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɨ kwen a èbem ètaãaãte mènəè. Èntɨ̧ɨ̧ aà ndâ nkɔ̀ŋkà e ghɨ̌ àghɨ, ka mbɨ̧̀ ènyit ka wua nkɨà.”
Tà mè nkua akwèn ngà ntsàꞋtè a Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nê, “Tê, à bakà wu enɨ ndɔŋ ngoꞋ yaa kà e nu yùà, a tsiꞋ a wu mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ àa nkɨà la.”
Tà mè me kɨꞋɨ bɔkatè tò bu e me li, nkàà nê kèlɔ ke li mbà̧aã àwɔb bàgème.
Yesò mè sà wɔb ngà ane ngò̧ tetat ntsàꞋtè Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà wu a èlɨ̀.
Mbɔ̂ mè nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ abua bɔkatè bi bu mbììte awɔb nê “Bɨ bele a si bɨ nɔ̀ŋkè me li mè ndzètà wɨ̧ la kè naà? Bɨ̀ ye! ÀfɨꞋa bɔ̀ɔ baãaã Waã Wòt ezǐ a tèkitebu bòt kàbɔ̀ŋ la a kuêꞋ,
Bɨ̀ lɔ̀Ꞌte a si bàa lɔꞋɔ, bɨ̀ ye, wòt wu tà fɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀nè am la tsiꞋa nkɨ̀Ꞌa!”

Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ Yesò bela ndàꞋà la, Judàs wakatè kǒ ane bɔkatè tò bu ntsɔ̀b babe la kɨꞋɨ̀, nè taꞋà ènɔ̧̂ bòt bɔ bèà nyitsə nè mbuꞋtsə la. Bètǎt bèntsìà mèpɨ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nè bɔɔjuŋ Bèjuê ka bɔ li ntsàà àwɔb la.
Lɨ̧̀ wu ko nê ye làŋkè bɔ̂ tò ba nê, “Wòt màa ghǎ etaꞋa atò la, bɨ ko nê wu ŋut, mbà̧aã tò.”
Judàs bê ngà abua Yesò nê, “NyɨꞋtà, àlàŋkè à wu ne nè!” Mbɔ̂ ntaꞋa atò.
Yesò shu abua tò nê, “Shu̧, ghɨ̀ àghɨa à kɨꞋa ghɨ̀ la.”
Bòt bu e bê nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ ndzì èbu ane Yesò, mbà̧aã tò.
ÀfɨꞋa mbɔŋ wòt kǒ ane bòt bu bɔ̂ Yesò ba la, sɔ̀ nyi zi mii ane àbùꞋ a àtsəa bèntsìà mèpɨ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà ndòo àtû̧ atò.
Yesò shu abua tò nê, “Vəè nyi yê a èbem baꞋ zi, nkàà nê, wòt tà nɨ nyi mbùŋè wòt la, wu ndɨ bɔ̀ɔ li bùŋe atò nè nyi la.
À bakà ko laꞋ nê betsiꞋa e ntɔ Tǎt am a ègwet, tà bê ntsàà èlaã bèshujà e tsè èghem ntsɔ̀b bebe, è wu bɔntu̧ tò bu a ègwet la à?
Ka a wu anè, ko ànəa bɔ shɨ a èbem Àkata Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la, àa ghɨ̀ na ka wu nkûŋ à?”

ÀfɨꞋa mbɔŋ Yesò bììte ènɔ̧̂ bòt bu nê, “Bɨ ghɨ̀ na me kɨꞋɨ ebaãaã am ndzəè mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɨ kɨꞋa baãaã tsɔŋ nè nyitsə bɔ̂ mbuꞋtsə à? Maa wua nyɨ̀Ꞌta bòt a èbem lob nɨ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà àlia àgème ka bɨ̀ ka baãaã am,
ka èghɨ bàagème e tsè ane mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ e ghɨ̌ àghɨa bèndàꞋàtɔŋ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà e li shɨŋ a èbem Àkata tò la aa wu nkûŋ.” ÀfɨꞋa mbɔŋ bɔkatè tò bàgème e sa tò ndùùlà.
Bòt bu bɔ li mbà̧aã Yesò la, e li nɨ̀a tò ngà a lob Kefàs wu tà li ngu àtsəa bèntsìà mèpɨ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la, àdziꞋa bènyɨꞋtà mbɨ̧te Musì nè bɔɔjuŋ Bèjuê e li mbù̧ù̧tè la.
Pità me nyaꞋa nkùŋà wɔb akwèn tè ngà ndzə àsà̧aã àtsəa bèntsìà mèpɨ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà, ntsèke a si bɔ̂ bèshujà bu mbààba àpfəa mbɔŋ la, mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ eye ndɨ ànəa mbɔŋ àa lìà la.
ÀfɨꞋa mbɔŋ, bètǎt bèntsìà mèpɨ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nè bòt lob saꞋa yu bàgème, e me kɨ èlu̧ bɔ̀ɔ zǐ ànəê àtsəa Yesò mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ ebùŋe atò la.
Bòt nyaŋ e li mbàtê ndɔ̀Ꞌ a si ntàꞋa fɨte mènəè ndzì àtsəa tò, ka bɔ̀ ka ye àyea bɔ̀ɔ baãaã tò adù̧ la.
A ghà me lìa, bòt ko babe e kɨꞋɨ a mbì
nê, mbalù̧ yaa li nê, ye bɔ mètàŋ ebùù lob nɨ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà, naa me wu ane èlibȩ betat ye mèe vəèəè.
Àtsəa bèntsìà mèpɨ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà yu a lɔ̀Ꞌɔ a si mbììte a Yesò nê, “À bakà bɔ ànəa àa shu ane mèngǎ̧ maà bɔ zì àtsəa yê la à?”
Ka Yesò kà lâꞋ.
Àtsəa bèntsìà mèpɨ̧̀ yu a shu abua tò nê, “Zi nkà̧ ane èlen Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà yû̧. À wu Fɔ̧̀ wu Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà yɔꞋ ntsà, tà wù Waã Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la, à shu awa.”

Yesò bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê, “Wuê mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ à shu la, ka tsiꞋ è shua wɨ̧ bɨ̀agème nê, ebuꞋu àfɨ̀Ꞌ yaa me ghà ne mbì, bɨa ye Waã Wòt, tà tseke àbâ àbualu̧ a Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà Àtsèàngɔ̀ŋ la, e mě ye atò nchua a ègwet a èbem mbàꞋ la!”

Àtsəa bèntsìà mèpɨ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà yu, a zə ale, sà̧à̧te ndǐ ti nê, “Mbê waa tsiꞋa fɨ̀Ꞌnè àvi ane Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà. Tè bà mèe nkɨ wòt kǒ tsa ka taa shua wa a kàbɔ̀ŋ tà ghɨ̀ la à? Bɨ zə bɨ̀ambɔŋ ndɨ tàa fɨ̀Ꞌnà vi ane Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la!
Bɨ kwàꞋtè na à?”
Bɔ bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê, “Ànəê yu a li àtsəa tò, bɔ̀ bùŋe atò.”
Ale, bɔ bùꞋ me tsəètè mattsə ane tò, ndene atò, èbeko e dèbè atò
nê, “Àwɔ̀ Fɔ̧̀ wu Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà yɔꞋ ntsà la, tùꞋu wòt tà ndèbè àwê la!”
Pità bele àbȩ àsà̧aã tà tseke la, waàvi kǒ tà li ngu wafàꞋ abua àtsəa bèntsìà mèpɨ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la, kɨꞋɨ̀ shu abua tò nê, “À li ngu àyê bɨ Yesò wòt Galìlî.”
Tà bê ntu̧ a mbì lɔb bɔ̀ɔgème nê, “E mbakà ko ànəa à shua la.”

Tà ghǎ àbȩ ntɨ̧ɨ̧ a ètsəê adzìꞋ yu bɔ̀ɔ ntsèà ka nyia a èbem àsà̧aã yu la, wekǒ nè waàvi àfàꞋ mè ndzea tò shu abua bòt bu bɔ tɨ̧ɨ̧te abot la nê, “Mbê waa li ngu bɔ̂ Yesò wòt Nazàlet.”
Pità mè ntù̧ tê ndzì nkà̧ nê, “E mbakà ko a mbê waa.”
AdzìꞋ tseke tè me wù̧ù̧ne, bòt bu bɔ tɨ̧ɨ̧te abot la, e kɨꞋɨ̀ shu abua Pità nê, “Ane nkûŋ, à wu wekǒ ayɔɔ yɔb, nkàà nê, ndɨ̧ yê nàà mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ è yɔb!”
ÀfɨꞋa mbɔŋ Pità bùꞋ me zì tèntsɔ̧̀ɔ̧̀mètsə ane zi shua nê, “E mbakà koa mbê waa.”
KwàꞋ àfɨꞋa mbɔŋ lu̧nkɔ̀Ꞌ bê ntɔ.
Pità kù̧ù̧te ànəa Yesò yaã shu abua zi la, nê “Lu̧nkɔ̀Ꞌ naa me laꞋ nê yea ntɔa aa tû̧ ngò̧ tetat nê ye bakà ko am.” Tà ndzəè ngà àbȩ ndɨ̀ kwàꞋ ànyaꞋne.
ÈtsəꞋ è tsi kwàꞋ a ntɔtetsɔ̌Ꞌ bètǎt bèntsìà mèpɨ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà bàgème nè bɔɔjuŋ Bèjuê e tseke a si tàŋke ndɨ bɔ̀ɔ ghɨ̌ ka ebuŋe a Yesò la.
Bɔ kuule atò ane fȩtsə nɨŋ ngà ndzì a tèkitebu Pȩlèt wu tà wu gɔvanɔ̀ bòt Luêm la.

ÀfɨꞋa Judàs wu ta fɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀ne Yesò la ye ndɨ bɔ̀ɔ buŋe atò la, tà kùbte èntɨ̧ɨ̧ vi, nɨ̀ èkwȩkab bu èghem yetat la nɨŋ nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ mvəèəè abua bètǎt bèntsìà mèpɨ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà bɔ̂ bɔɔjuŋ Bèjuê bu
nê “Mâ fâ̧ ndɨ̀ wu ma fɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀ne wòt kà ghɨ ànəê la.”
Tà shu ale, bɔ nê “È ntsě ànəa yaa, à yu a yea wê.”
Judàs zə ale, màꞋà èkwȩkab bu a si a èbem lob nɨ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà ndzəè ngà tɨ̀ŋnè.
Bètǎt bèntsìà mèpɨ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà e tsiꞋi akwèn ngwi èkwȩkab mbɔŋ nê “Èkab wàa wu èkab àlo̧, mbɨ̧ ta tè ka bɨ̧ɨ̧ne laꞋnê bà zì a èbem lob mànɔŋa èkab.”
Ale, bɔ làŋkè nɨ̀ èkab wu njù̧ àdziꞋa si abua wòt kǒ tàa ngɨa bakɨ̀ŋ la, nɔ̀ŋè me nɨa ntua bègɨ̧̀.
Eyaa wu àghɨa a a ghɨ̂ ka bɔ me tɔ àdziꞋa si a mbɔŋ nê wu ÈbaꞋ Àlo̧ ekɨꞋɨ dzəè laane la.
Ale, ànəa ndàꞋàtɔŋ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà Jèlèmìà li ndàꞋ la a te. Tà li nê, “Bɔ li nɨ̀ èkwȩkab bu èghem yetat la, è wu ètsəê èkab wu bòt Izəèlȩê e li ndàŋkè nê bɔɔ ŋà àtsəa tò la,
ntsiꞋi nɨŋ njû̧ mbȩ wòt tàa ngɨa bakɨ̀ŋ wuê mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà li shu nê è nju̧ la mɨ̧̂.”
Yesò è tɨ̧ɨ̧ a mbì gɔvanɔ̀ ale, tà bììte atò nê “À wu Fɔ̧̀ Bèjuê?”
Yesò bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê, “Wuê mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ à shu la.”
Ka tà kà bê mbɨ̀ɨ̀lè èngǎ̧ bètǎt bèntsìà mèpɨ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nè bɔɔjuŋ Bèjuê ane mènəè bɔ zǐ àtsəa tò la.
Pȩlèt bììte atò nê, “Aà kà zə mènəè maa bɔ shua àtsəa yê la?”
Yesò tù̧u̧ leme ebɨ̀ɨ̀lè ka wuê èngà̧ wemɔꞋ tè ànəa mbɔŋ a taꞋa tsě a gɔvanɔ̀ wu.
È li è ghɨ̀ è wu àlia èpǎ̧ Màntsea a ègwet ègème tè gɔvanɔ̀ sà wòt tèfȩ wemɔ̀Ꞌ bòt àa nkɨà nê tà sa la.
Wòt tèfȩ kǒ li ngu àfɨꞋa mbɔŋ bɔ̀ɔ ntɔ atò ane Bàlabasì la.
Ènɔ̧̂ bòt e tseke tè mbù̧ù̧tè Pȩlèt bììte awɔb nê, “Bɨ̀a nkɨà nê è sa wa ane bòt ba à? È sa Bàlabasì kò è sa Yesò wu bɔ̀ɔ ntɔ atò ane Klistò la à?”
Tàà mbììta ale ngu ndɨ tà ko nê bɔɔjuŋ e nɨa ghòꞋnà ka mbà̧aã Yesò nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ ndzì a tèkitebu ti la.

Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ Pȩlèt è tseke a ègwet atɨ̧ kèfɔ̧̀ vi la, vi tò tsà ntu̧ abua tò nê, “Mbê wu bakà ko ànəê, è wu ale à ka ngɨ̀ àghɨa ko ane tò. Mâ me li ndzě ndzò̧ ko ane tò è taꞋa saa am.”
Bètǎt bèntsìà mèpɨ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nè bɔɔjuŋ Bèjuê e mè ŋwèèlè ènɔ̧̂ bòt bu nê bɔ ghɨa Pȩlèt èsa Bàlabasì mbɔ̂ bùŋè a Yesò.
Gɔvanɔ̀ wu mè mbììte bòt bu nê, “Bɨ̀a nkɨà nê è sa waa ane bòt baa babe la à?” Bɔ bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê “Bàlabasì.”
Pȩlèt mè nê bɨ̀a nkɨà nê è ngɨ̌ ghà ane Yesò wàa bɔ̀ɔ ntɔ atò ane Klistò la à? Bòt bàgème e nê, “Wu̧u̧te, wu̧u̧te atò a mbɨ̧̀ Mbasa.”
Pȩlèt bììte nê “Ànəa tà fà̧ la wu ghàà?” Ka ènɔ̧̂ bòt bu e paà ŋȩ nê “Wu̧u̧te atò a mbɨ̧̀ Mbasa.”

Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ Pȩlèt ye ndɨ ye nyɔ̀Ꞌtè kekaŋ, mè ndze ndɨ ye ghà nè mbì ko bòt bu aa bùꞋu ndèm la, tà nɨ mèleb me shùù èbu bi a mbì lɔb shua nê, “Bɨ bùŋe a mbê waa ko àbu am a ntsě a dù̧.”
Bòt bu bàgème bɔ bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê, “TsiꞋ àlo̧ atò à nɔ̀ŋke àtsəa ya baa bɔ̧ ba.”
Ale, Pȩlèt sa Bàlabasì abua yɔb; tà ghɨa bɔ̀ shu̧u̧ a Yesò; tà ŋǎ atò bɔɔ wu̧u̧te a mbɨ̧̀ Mbasa.
ÀfɨꞋa mbɔŋ bèshujà Pȩlèt e nɨ a Yesò nɨŋ nga a tsâ̧ wɔb, mbɔ̂ fète àlaã bèshujà bɔ ghaale atò ndzì a kètsìà.
Bɔ ghɨ̀ ale, ntsì ndìte tò ndzì èmǎ̧ fɔ̧̀ a mbɨ̧̀ tò,
mbɔ̂ nɨ njɨŋtsə mbàꞋa ntà̧ ndzì àtsəa tò, ndɔ̀Ꞌ ndzì ayɨ̌t àbualu̧ atò ane ambàŋ. Bɔ ghɨ̀ ale, ŋɔ̀Ꞌne a si a mbì tò me wȩ̀ȩ̀te atò shua nê “Àtsèà bèfɔ̧̀, Fɔ̧̀ Bèjuê!”
Mbɔ̂ ntsəètè mattsə ane tò me nɨ ayɨ̌t wu shù̧a atò àtsəa tò.
Bɔ̀ wȩ̀ȩ̀te atò tè bɔ̀ lɔꞋa, bɔ mè sɔ̀ɔ̀lè èmǎ̧ wu, mbɔ̂ ndzì ndìte tò a mbɨ̧̀ tò, ka nɨ atò e ghǎ wu̧u̧te a mbɨ̧̀ mbasa.
Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɔ lɔꞋ me ghà la, bɔ ye wòt Silenè kǒ èlen tò wu Simùn la, mbà̧à̧ atò tà ŋèꞋe mbasa Yesò.
Bɔ kɨꞋɨ àdzìꞋa ko bɔ̀ɔ ntɔ nê Golgotà (ngua shua nê àdziꞋa àghele àtsə la),
bɔ ŋeꞋe mèlùꞋ bɔ fȩ̀tè ne àghɨa ko àa ndìà la ŋa nê tà nu, ka tà yùte tu̧ nê ye ka nu a.
Bɔ ghɨ̀ ale, ngù̧ù̧te atò a mbɨ̧̀ mbasa, mbɔ̂ màꞋà èbìt enɨ ghàbte ndìte tò.
Bɔ ghàbtè ale mbɔ̂ ntsèke a si me baabe atò.
Bɔ shɨ èngà̧ wu bɔ nɨŋ fèèlè atò la ngù̧ù̧te àtsəa tò a mbɨ̧̀ àyɨt nê, “Eyaa wu Yesò Fɔ̧̀ Bèjuê.”
Bɔ mè ngù̧ù̧te bètsɔŋ babe a mbɨ̧̀ bèmbasa mɨ̧̂, wekǒ àbâ àbualu̧ tò nè wekǒ àbâ àbuantoŋ.
Bòt bɔɔ ntsèà la e me nyiꞋi ètsə bɔb ngwȩ̀ȩ̀tà atò,
shua nê “Àwɔ̀ wu à li nê yea bùù lob nɨ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà e mě bɔ̧ɔ̧ ane èlibȩ betat la, tɨŋe awê àwɔ̀ mbɔŋ. À wu Waã Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà, à lɔ̀Ꞌ a ègwet mbasa wu nchu a si.”
Bètǎt bèntsìà mèpɨ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nè bènyɨꞋtà mbɨ̧te Musì nè bɔɔjuŋ Bèjuê e wȩ̀ȩ̀te atò wuê a èlɨ mbɔŋ nê,
“Tà li ntɨ̀ŋe bòt ko, ka tà kà wu ko etɨŋe avi zìambɔŋ. Tà ntsě Fɔ̧̀ bòt Izəèlȩê? Tà chu a si a mbɨ̧̀ mbasa wàà àfɨ̀Ꞌ yaa ko baa bɨ̧ɨ̧ne mènəè tò.
Tà li ndzì èntɨ̧ɨ̧ vi ane Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà mè nê ye wu waã tò. Bà ye nê Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà naa kɨꞋɨ etɨŋe atò àfɨ̀Ꞌ yaa leꞋ.”
Bètsɔŋ bu bɔ wu̧u̧te awɔb bɔ̂ tò ba la e wȩ̀ȩ̀tè atò wuê a èlɨ mbɔŋ mɨ̧̂.
È me wu a kètsìà nèngû̧ ndzěm kwene a èbem àlaꞋ a mbɔŋ àgème, ngà ndzəè ane nyèm tetat.
È me wu a mbɔŋe ane nyèm tetat, Yesò ŋȩ ane àtɔŋ nɨ̧ nê “Èli, Èli, làma sàba tàni?” Ngua shua nê “Tǎt am Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà, Tǎt am Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà leꞋ, à ghɨ̀ na ka ngwàꞋ am à?”
Bòt ko ane bòt bu bɔ tɨ̧ɨ̧te abot la e zə ànəa tà shu la nê, mbê waa wua ntɔ Èlȩjà.
Wekǒ ane bèshujà bu luula àfɨꞋa mbɔŋ ngà nɨ a kùcha bɔ ntseb a èbem àbɨꞋte a mèlùꞋ la, mbɔ̂ nchùꞋ àtsəa ayɨ̌t ntsà a ètsəê tò nê tà sɔ.
Ka èbeko e nê “Ka ndzì, tsiꞋ bà ye nê Èlȩjà naa kɨꞋɨ etɨŋe atò leꞋ.”
Yesò mè ŋȩ ane àtɔŋ nɨ̧, èntɨ̧ɨ̧ tò e paa.
ÀfɨꞋa mbɔŋ, ndǐ yu bɔ nɨŋ ntsòŋâ ngàbtè lob nɨ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la saãaãnà èbâ babe, ebuꞋu àtsə e ghǎ wua lə, sitsǎꞋ nyiꞋnè tèwutsə te saãaãtè àbâ abà.
Ètsəsì e li ngaꞋte mɨ̧̂, bòt Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nyaŋ bɔ li pfəèꞋte la e yu̧u̧mè,
ndzə a èbem ètsəsì bu. Yesò tseke tê njù̧ù̧me bɔ gha a èbem àpfəèa nɨ̧a Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà tè bòt nyaŋ e ye awɔb.

Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ tǎt bèshujà bu, nè bèshujà bu be li ngu bɔ̂ tò ba mbààba Yesò la, e ye ndɨ sitsǎꞋ nyìꞋnè la, nè àghɨa a ghɨ̀ la, bɔ taꞋa bɔa tè nê, “Ane nkûŋ, mbê waa li ngu Waã Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà.”
Bèzi nyaŋ e li ngu abot mɨ̧̂ bɔ tɨ̧ɨ̧ a endɨ̌ me lȩ̀ la. Eyaa wu bèzi bu bɔ li ndzə a Galìlî me ghȩ̀ȩ̀ne akwene Yesò ntɨ̀ŋa tò la.
Èbeko ayɔɔ ayɔb li ngu Màlià Màdàlin, bɔ̂ Màlià nyɨ̌ Jimsì bɔ̂ Jòsêb nè nyɨ̌ bɔ̧ Zebèdiì.
È li me wu a nyèmtèsi wòt èkab ko tà ndzə a Àlimàtià, èlen tò wu Jòsêb la kɨꞋɨ. Tà li ngu wakatè Yesò kǒ mɨ̧̂.
Tà li ngà abua Pȩlèt nê tà ŋa àpfəꞋte a Yesò abua zi. Pȩlèt nê bɔ̀ ŋa abua tò.
Jòsêb nɨ̀ àpfəꞋte yu, ndèbte a èbem ndǐ fi,
nɨ ngà ndzi a èbem èsî li, tà bèla ntùa tu a èbem èwu la. Mbɔ̂ mbɨ̀ŋe taꞋà èti nɔ̀ŋè a ètsəê mbɔ̂ me ghǎ.
Màlià Màdàlin bɔ̂ Màlià kǒ wu e li ngu abot bɔ tseke a mbì me ye àtsəasì yu la.
ÈtsəꞋ e tsi è wu àliapfəèa Bèjuê, bètǎt bèntsìà mèpɨ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nè Bèfalèsiì be bù̧ù̧te a mbì Pȩlèt,
nê “Tê, ba ku̧u̧te ndɨ wòt mèfà̧ waa li mbèle yû̧ nê, yea li mpfə è me wu ane èlibȩ betat ye yu̧u̧mè la.

È wu ale, ghɨa bɔ̀ gha me baabe àtsəasì yu tè èlibȩ bu betat la è tsea. À bakà ghɨ ale, ko ateko bɔkatè tò aa ghǎ etsɔ àpfəꞋte atò, e bɔ fɨte bòt laꞋnê tà yu̧u̧mè. Bɔ ghɨ̀ ale ko mèfà̧ mbɔŋ naa ghe te tsě me mbì mu.”
Pȩlèt zə ale, nê bɔ̀ nɨ bèshujà ko nɨŋ ngà ntsià bɔ̀ me nèèta mbààba àtsəasì yu ane ndɨ bɔ kɔ̀ŋkè la.
Ale, bɔ ghà nèètè ndzì àlȩê ane èti lu àtsəasì yu la mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ wòt kǒ tsì, mbɔ̂ ntsià bèshujà bu bɔ me baabe.
Àliapfəèa Bèjuê yu a li ntsè, è sàꞋà me wu a ntɔtetsɔ̌Ꞌ ane àlia mbì ane nkàb, Màlià Màdàlin bɔ̂ Màlià kǒ wu e ghǎ eye àtsəasì yu.
KwàꞋ àfɨꞋa mbɔŋ sitsǎꞋ nyìꞋnè ànyaꞋne. Wantu̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà chu a ègwet mpàà èti lu, mbɔ̂ ntsèke a ègwet.
Tà li ngua nkàꞋtà mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ nyèm, ndìte tò te mè me fəə mbɨꞋɨ̀ èŋu.
Bòt bu bɔ wua mbààba àtsəasì yu la e bɔa kwàꞋ ànyaꞋne tè ntsìꞋi mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bòt bɔ pfəꞋte la.
Wantu̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà wu shu abua bèzi bu nê, “Bɨ̀ ka mbɔ̀a, mâ ko nê bɨ wua nkɨà Yesò wu bɔ li ngù̧ù̧te atò a mbɨ̧̀ mbasa la.
Tà ntsě adzìꞋ yaa, tà yu̧u̧me mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ tà li shu la. Bɨ̀ kɨꞋɨ ndze àdziꞋ yu bɔ li nɔ̀ŋè àpfəꞋte atò la.
Bɨ̀ bê ngà kwàla àfɨ̀Ꞌ yaa shu bɔkatè tò nê, ‘Tà yu̧u̧mè, tè ngu a mbì lɔb àfɨ̀Ꞌ yaa ngà a Galìlî. Bɨa ye atò abàꞋ və!’ Bɨ̀ ku̧u̧te ànəa mâ shu awɨ̧ la.”
Ale, bɔ lɔ̀Ꞌ àtsəasì yu me lùùla ngà e shu bɔkatè Yesò, ngà ale mbɔ̀â, ka mbɔ̂ me wùꞋtè àwɔb kwàꞋ ànyaꞋne ane àghɨa a ghɨ̀ la.
KwàꞋ àfɨꞋa mbɔŋ Yesò kwene ane yɔb nê, “Àlàŋkè à wu nè nɨ̧̀.” Bɔ kɔꞋ ngà mbà̧ àka atò ngùꞋtè atò.
Yesò shu abua yɔb nê “Bɨ̀ ka mbɔ̀â, bɨ̀ ghǎ shu bɔnyɨ bɔ̧ nê bɔ̀ ghǎ a Galìlî ko bɔɔ ye am abàꞋ və.”
Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bèzi bu àa ngà la, àbəèꞋ ako ane bèshujà bu bɔ wua mbààba àtsəasì yu la e gha a èbem àpfəa nɨ̧ yu è shuê bètǎt bèntsìà mèpɨ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà àghɨa àgème a ghɨ̀ la.
Bètǎt bèntsìàs mèpɨ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nè bɔɔjuŋ Bèjuê e bù̧ù̧tè ndàŋkè, mbɔ̂ ŋà èkab e nɨ zi ètsəê bèshujà bu,
mbɔ̂ shu abua yɔb nê, “Bɨ̀ shu bòt nê, ‘Baa nɔ̀ŋke a si ètsəꞋ me li bɔkatè Yesò e kɨꞋɨ tsɔ àpfəꞋta tò nɨŋ ngà.’
Gɔvanɔ̀, zəa ànəê yaa mbììte awɨ̧ ànəê, ko baa ko ndɨ bàa làꞋà tê tsì àwɨ̧ a èbem ngoꞋ la.”
Ale, bèshujà bu e nɨ èkab wu, ngɨ̀ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɔ shu awɔb la. E bùꞋu ane àlia mbɔŋ kɨꞋɨ ŋa laane waa, mèfà̧ maa bèla ngȩ̀ȩ̀nà wuê a kètsìà Bèjuê.
ÀfɨꞋa mbɔŋ bɔkatè Yesò bu èghem ntsɔ̀b wemɔ̀Ꞌ la e gha a Galìlî nkɔꞋ nga a ègwet èbȩ lu Yesò li ntsɔ̀tè la.
Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɔ ye atò la, bɔ wùꞋtè atò, ka èbeko e ka lâ bɨ̧ɨ̧ne nê wu tòà.
Yesò kɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ a ngèt yɔb shu abua yɔb nê, “Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà ŋa mètàŋ nàa ègwet nè sitsǎꞋ la ègème abua am.
È wu ale, bɨ̀ ghǎ ngɨ̀ bòt èlaꞋ ègème è tsiꞋi bɔkatè bɔ̧, ngɨ̀ bɔ zì àwɔb a èdzî ane èlen Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà, nè èlen Waã, nè èlen Fo Kèfə,
mbɔ̂ nyɨ̀Ꞌte awɔb nê bɔ̀ me ghɨ̌ àghɨ àgème e ndi shu awɨ̧ la, nko nê maa wu nè nɨ̧̀ tê ghǎ dzəâ àfɨꞋa ngɔ̀ŋ nàa li lìà la.”
Eyaa wu Ntu̧ Ntsɔ̧̀ ane ànəa Yesò Klistò Waã Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà.
Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ àa a èbem àkatè ndàꞋàtɔŋ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà, Àsayà la,
“Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà laꞋnê,
Ye wantu̧ am mâ tsǎ atò a mbì lɨ̧
taa kɨꞋɨ enèète alu̧ abua yɨ̧ la.
Wòt kǒ nàa ŋȩ̀a
àbâ àlaꞋ àyuube shua nê,
Bɨ̀ nèètè èlu̧ abua Lefɨ̀Ꞌ,
ndɔ̀ktè alu̧ tò è tɨ̧ɨ̧ ndɨŋndɨ̀ŋ.”
Ale, Jɔ̌n ndzìà èdzî li nkɨꞋɨ àbâ àlaꞋ àyuube me tsɔ̀te nê, “Bòt è waꞋa mènəè kàbɔ̀ŋ mɔb, nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ bɔ̀ zì àwɔb a èdzî mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ taa waꞋa mènəè kàbɔ̀ŋ mu bɔ̀ɔ ngɨ̀à la.”
ÀlaꞋ a Jùdià nè bòt Jèlusalèm bàgème e li ngà abua tò, mbɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀nè mènəè kàbɔ̀ŋ mɔb, tà zì àwɔb a èdzî Jodàn.
Jɔ̌n li ngua nkwà̧aã ndìte bɔ ghɨ ane nyemte anyà̧ kǒ bɔ̀ɔ ntɔ nê kamèl la, mè nkwà̧aã nkànda a èloŋ li. Tà li ngua nkwèla ngù̧ù̧metsə mè njɨ̀a dzə.
Tà li ngùa ntsɔ̀tà abua bòt nê, “Wòt kǒ nàà kɨꞋɨ akwene yaã tà taꞋa tsě am nyaŋ la. E mbakà lem nkùꞋ wòt tàa ŋɔꞋne a si eyààte mèliꞋ gubte tò la.
Maà ndzìà wɨ̧ a èdzî anè, ka taa tsiꞋi me zǐ Fo Kèfə ane yɨ̧.”
Àfɨ̀Ꞌ a li nyaꞋà ntsè, Yesò lɔꞋ a Nazàlet è wu àbâ àlaꞋ a Galìlî la nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂, Jɔ̌n zì atò a èdzî Jodàn.
Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ Yesò è bê ndzə a èbem mèleb mu nkɔ̀Ꞌɔ aguŋ la, tà me ye ègwet e ghaꞋà, Fo Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà chu mbɨꞋɨ̀ baba adù̧ tò.
Àtɔŋ a tsè a ègwet nê, “À wu waã èkɔŋ am; èntɨ̧ɨ̧ am e taꞋa wua mbɔ̀ ane yê.”
KwàꞋ àfɨꞋa mbɔŋ, Fo Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà ghɨ̀ Yesò ghà àbâ àlaꞋ àyuube,
ntsèke abàꞋ və èli èghem yekwì, Satàn me taãaãte atò. BanyaãbàꞋ e li ngu abot, bɔntu̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà e taŋka tò.
Àfɨ̀Ꞌ yu bɔ baãaã Jɔ̌n màꞋa a tèfȩ la, Yesò kɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ a Galìlî me tsɔ̀te Ntu̧ Ntsɔ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà,
shua nê “Ngule àfɨ̀Ꞌ yu a kùꞋ. Kèfɔ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà kɨꞋɨ tê ntsìꞋi a ngèt yɨ̧. Bɨ̀ waꞋa mènəè kàbɔ̀ŋ mɨ̧, mbɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀ne Ntu̧ Ntsɔ̧̀.”
Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ Yesò nàa ngȩ̀ȩ̀nà a ngèt èlemè Galìlî la, tà ye bèmbaãaãbasə ko babe, Simùn bɔ̂ wanyɨ vi Andùlù, mbà̧aã basə ane tasat la.
Yesò shu abua yɔb nê, “Bɨ̀ nkùŋè am. Maa ghɨ̌ bɨa tsiꞋi me kɨ bɔbȩ nɨa nkɨ̀Ꞌa abua am.”
KwàꞋ àfɨꞋa mbɔŋ, bɔ sà bètasat bɔb nkùŋè atò.
Tà nyaꞋa tà ghà nè mbì, tà ye Jimsì waã Zebèdiì bɔ̂ wanyɨ vi Jɔ̌n, a èbem ànkànuꞋ a yɔb, nèètà bètasat bɔb.
Yesò bê ntɔa wɔb, bɔ bê sà a tǎt wɔb Zebèdiì nè bɔfàꞋ bi, nkùŋè atò.
Bɔ li ngà Kàpenàwuêm. Àliapfəèa Bèjuê a kɨꞋɨ̀, Yesò ghà a lob Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà yɔb me nyɨꞋte èngǎ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà.
Mèngǎ̧ tà nyɨ̀Ꞌta la li ntaꞋa tsè àwɔb nkàà nê tà li ngua nyɨ̀Ꞌta wɔb mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ wòt tà bɔ àtɔŋ ane ànəa mbɔŋ la, tà kà wua nyɨ̀Ꞌta mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bènyɨꞋtà mbɨ̧te Musì.
KwàꞋ àfɨꞋa mbɔŋ, wòt kǒ fo kàbɔ̀ŋ nàa ane tò la, nyi a èbem lob Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà yu, ŋȩ nê,
“Yesò wòt Nazàlet, à kɨa ghà abua ya à? À kɨ̀Ꞌa a si ŋaa eliime awa à? Mâ ko wòt à wu wùà la. À wu ngule wantu̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà.”
Yesò bê shu abua fo kàbɔ̀ŋ yu nê, “Kabte ètsəê wê! Sǎ a mbê waa!”
Fo kàbɔ̀ŋ yu nyiꞋa mbê wu ane àzəꞋ, ŋȩ̂ ane ètɨ̧̂, sa atò.

Ànəa ngaa a bê ntsè bòt bu abot la tè bɔ bùꞋ ntsiꞋa mbììta a kètsìà wɔb nê, “Eyaa wu ghà à? Wu àghɨa fi tà nyɨ̀Ꞌta la à? Mbê waa e bɔ àtɔŋ tè tàa ngɨ̀ tà shu ànəê abua fote kàbɔ̀ŋ, te bê ngɨ̀ wuê mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ tà shu la!”
Ale, àndǎ tò a bê ngȩ̀ȩ̀nè kwàla àdzìꞋ àgème àbâ àlaꞋ a Galìlî.
Yesò lɔ̀Ꞌ a lob Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà yu mbê ngà a lob Simùn bɔ̂ Andùlù. Jimsì bɔ̂ Jɔ̌n e kùŋè àwɔb.
Nyɨ̌ vi Simùn li ngu a èku̧ ngo̧o̧na sɔ̧̀ɔ̧̀nà. Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ Yesò nyi a lob la, bɔ bê shua tò ànəa mbɔŋ.
Tà ghà a ngèt àvi wu mbà̧ àbu atò, ndɔ̀kè atò a si. Sɔ̧̀ɔ̧̀nà wu bê sà tò, tà lɔ̀Ꞌɔ a si mbùꞋ me taŋke awɔb.
ÀfɨꞋa nyèm èbàꞋà tê ndzěm bùꞋ me fene la, bòt e nɨ bòt àghɔ̧, nè bòt fote kàbɔ̀ŋ tèa ŋǎ wɔb ngoꞋ la nɨŋ nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ Yesò naa bə a wɔb.
Bòt bàgème àpfəa nɨ̧a ngaa e bu̧u̧te a ètsələèꞋ və.
Yesò bəâ bòt tèwuute èghɔ̧ nyaŋ, mè fəè fote kàbɔ̀ŋ nyaŋ ane èbeko. Tà kà bɨ̧ɨ̧nè fote kàbɔ̀ŋ tu te làꞋ, nkàà nê te ko wòt tà wu wùà la.
ÈtsəꞋ e li ntsi, kà àbȩ a zìꞋ ngàꞋtê, Yesò lɔ̀Ꞌɔ a si ndzəè a lob. Tà lɔꞋɔ àpfəa nɨ̧ yu, ngà àdziꞋa ndziꞋne àko me tsàꞋta Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà.
Simùn bɔ̂ bèshu̧ bi e me gheeba nkɨà tò.
ÀfɨꞋa bɔ yea tò la, bɔ shu abua tò nê, “Waa waa nàà nkɨà wê.”
Yesò nê, “Ba bɔ ndɨ bàa ghǎ etsɔ̀te Ntu̧ Ntsɔ̧̀ yaa a èdzìꞋ ko bu a ngèt adzìꞋ yaa la mɨ̧̂. Nkàà nê, eyaa wu àghɨa a li ngɨ̀ ka e nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ a ngɔ̀ŋ ŋaa la.”
Tà me ghȩȩne a èdziꞋ ègème a Galìlî nyɨ̀Ꞌta èngǎ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà a èbem lobte Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà tɔb mè fəèà fote kàbɔ̀ŋ adù̧ bòt.
Wòt kǒ àghɔ̧atsɔꞋɔ a baãaã tò la li nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ ntèm tènjûŋ ti a mbì Yesò ndɨ̀ nê, “À kɔ̀ŋkà, ko betsiꞋa à ghɨ̀ e pem àghɔ̧ yaa.”
Tèsȩte ŋut te nkua Yesò. Tà nyààbè àbu azi mbà̧à̧te atò, mbɔ̂ shu abua tò nê, “Oò maà nkɔ̀ŋkà, pem!”
Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ tà làꞋ ale la, àghɔ̧atsɔꞋɔ yu a bê sà mbê wu, tà pem.
Yesò ghɨ̀ ale, mbɔ̂ səèŋkè àtû̧ atò mbê ntsàà atò tà me ghǎ.

Tà shu abua tò nê, “Zə, ko mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ à shu wòt àghɨa a ghɨ̀ la, ka ghǎ nyɨ̀Ꞌte awê abua ntsìà mèpɨ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà. À me ghǎ à nɨ èghɨ àa nɨ kɔ̀ŋke a Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ Musì li shu la, enɨ ghɨ̀ waa waa naa ko nê à pem.”

Ka mbê wu lɔꞋ a mbì Yesò ale, mbê ngà me làꞋa àdziꞋ àgème ndɨ bɔ bəa vi la, . Tà ghà ale, mbê mbùù ànəa ngaa tè Yesò kà tsi nko ngȩ̀ȩ̀nè àpfəèà nɨ̧ yu a kètsìà bòt. Tà ntsiꞋi me tseke wuê a èdziꞋi ndziꞋne, bòt e bɔ me dzəâ a èdzìꞋ ègème nkɨ̀Ꞌa abua tò.
Èli ko e li nyàꞋa ntsè, Yesò wènè a Kàpenàwuêm. Tà ghà ale, a bê mbùà nê tà kua tê ntsìꞋi àpfəè.
Ale, bòt nyaŋ e bù̧ù̧te abot tè àdziꞋ à ka bê tsi ngu, ka wuê a mbì ètsələèꞋ. Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ Yesò nàa ntsɔ̀tà Ntu̧ Ntsɔ̧̀ yu abua yɔb la,
bòt bakwì e ŋeꞋè wòt kǒ àbâ ènyit tò a pfə la, nɨŋ nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ abua tò.

Bɔ kɨꞋɨ ale, bɔ̀ ka ye èlu̧ bɔ̀ɔ nɨa ŋut epùùla a mbì Yesò nkàà ènɔ̧̂ bòt bu abot la. Ale, bɔ kɔꞋ a ègwet lob, ntùꞋ èləꞋ kwàꞋ a ègwet àdziꞋ yu Yesò tɨ̧ɨ̧ la, shùke a mbê wu a ègwet àkwàŋkè ntsàà a lob.
Yesò ye ndɨ bòt ngaa e bɔ ntɨ̀ ane zi la, shu abua mbê ngaa nê, “Waã am, mâ waꞋa a kàbɔ̀ŋ wê.”
BènyɨꞋtà mbɨ̧te Musì ko e tsekè abot me lèmte a mèntɨ̧ɨ̧ mɔb shua nê,
“Mbê waa ghɨ̀ na ka me làꞋa anè à? Tàa fɨ̀Ꞌnà àvi ane Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà! Wàa tsa nàa ngwàꞋa kàbɔ̀ŋ ka nè Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà à?”
KwàꞋ àfɨꞋa mbɔŋ, Yesò ko àghɨa bɔ mɨ̀ɨ̀tà la a èntɨ̧ɨ̧ vi mbììte awɔb nê, “Bɨ ghɨ̀ na ka me kwàꞋtè èwuu maa nè mènəè à?
Àyea ŋa àa njùa à, e shu abua wòt àbâ ènyit tò a pfə la nê ‘Mâ waꞋa kàbɔ̀ŋ wê’, kò wuê nê ‘Lɔ̀Ꞌɔ a si ŋèꞋè àkwàŋkè ye me ghȩ̀ȩ̀ne à?’
Maa nyɨꞋte awɨ̧ laꞋnê Waã Wòt bɔ àtɔŋ a sitsǎꞋ à màngwaꞋa kàbɔ̀ŋ.” Ale, tà shu abua wòt wu àbâ ènyit tò a pfə la nê,
“Mâ laꞋnê, lɔ̀Ꞌɔ a si ŋèꞋe àkwàŋkè àyê me ghǎ àpfəè.”
Ŋut bê ndɔ̀Ꞌ a si ŋèꞋe àkwàŋkè zi yu me ghà àbȩ a mbì lɔb bàgème. A tsè ènɔ̧̂ bòt bu, bɔ tsiꞋi me wùꞋte a Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà shua nê, “Ba te bakà ye ànəê àko anè!”
Yesò li mè nkua akwèn nga a ngèt èlemè Galìlî, ènɔ̧̂ bòt e kɨꞋɨ̀ nkwene ane tò, tà bùꞋ me laꞋa abua yɔb.
MbɨꞋɨ tàa ngȩ̀ȩ̀tà la, tà yèa nɨà èkab taksì kǒ èlen to wu Levì, waã Alfeɔ̀ tà tsekè àdzìꞋa àfàꞋ àzi la. Yesò shu abua tò nê, “KɨꞋɨ nkùŋè am.” Levì lɔ̀Ꞌɔ a si nkùŋè atò.

Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ Yesò tsekè me jɨ èghɨ a lob Levì la, bòt nyaŋ bɔ̀ɔ nɨ̀a èkab taksì la nè bòt kàbɔ̀ŋ e tsekè a si bɔ̂ Yesò ba nè bɔkatè tò me jɨ èghɨjɨ. A li ngu anè nkàà nê èwuu bòt bàa e li ntàꞋa wua nkuŋa tò.

BènyɨꞋtà mbɨ̧te Musì ko è wu Bèfalèsiì la e ye ndɨ tà fɔta èghɨjɨ bɔ̂ bènɨa èkab taksì nè bòt kàbɔ̀ŋ la, mbììtè bɔkatè Yesò bu nê, “Tà ghɨ̀ na ka me fɔte èghɨjɨ bɔ̂ èwuu bòt ba à?”
Yesò zə ale, mbɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê, “Bòt kekweelè aà kà kɨ ngàŋ. Bèngɔ̧̀ ka bɔ̀ɔ nkɨà ngàŋ la. È nka kɨꞋa etɔ bòt bɔ mɨɨtè nê bɔ tɨ̧ɨ̧ ndɨŋndɨ̀ŋ la, e nkɨꞋa etɔ bòt kàbɔ̀ŋ.”

È li ngu àfɨ̀Ꞌ àko, bɔkatè Jɔ̌n ndzìà èdzî nè Bèfalèsiì e me tseke àfɨ̀Ꞌ àko kà jɨ àghɨ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ etsàꞋte a Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà. Bòt ko e kɨꞋɨ̀ mbììte a Yesò nê, “Ghǎ ghɨ̀ ka bɔkatè Jɔ̌n ndzìà èdzî, nè èbe Bèfalèsiì be me tseke àfɨ̀Ꞌ àko kà jɨ àghɨ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ etsàꞋte a Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà ka èbê è ka wua ngɨ̀à ale à?”
Yesò bììte a wɔb nê, “Tè betsiꞋa bègɨ̧̌ ndzɔꞋɔ etɔ̧ɔ̧ èbu bɔb àfɨꞋa lu̧ ndzà bèlè bɔ̂ tò ba la à?
Àfɨ̀Ꞌ aa ghɨ̌ nkùꞋ bɔ tsì lu̧ ndzà yu ayɔɔ yɔb, e ye wu àfɨꞋa bɔ̀ɔ me tseke kà jɨ àghɨ la.
“Wòt nàà kà lɔꞋ àlia nɨ̀ àdziꞋa ndǐ fi ntèmte ndǐ èlènè la, nkàà nê ye fi yu naa tseke tê sààlà ndzəè, èləꞋ mbɔŋ e mè mpàa fàŋ tê ntsè ndɨ e ghɨ̂ ngu la.

Wòt kà meè ngua ndɔ̀Ꞌ àlia ndzìà mèlùꞋ fi a èbem ètetuꞋ gùbnyà̧ e lènè la. Tà ghɨ̀ ale, ko ètetuꞋ gùbnyà̧ bu aa gwele, mèlùꞋ mu naa tsəète, ètetuꞋ bu aa bɨɨ. ChaꞋ bɔ̀ɔ ndzìà mèlùꞋ fi wuê a èbem ètetuꞋ gùbnyà̧ è fi.”
È li ngu àliapfəèa Bèjuê àko, Yesò me tsě a èbem mbȩte bɔ liꞋi èwuu ntsəètè ko la. Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɔ̂ bɔkatè bi àa ngȩ̀ȩ̀nà la, bɔ bùꞋ me fààte ntsəè tu.
Bèfalèsiì e shu abua Yesò nê, “Ye àghɨa bɔkatè bê e ghɨ̀à, è wu àghɨa bɔ̀ɔ ka ghɨ àliapfəèa Bèjuê la.”
Yesò bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê “Bɨ te bakà tɔ ezə àghɨa fɔ̧̀ Dàbid bɔ̂ bòt bi e li ngɨ̀ àfɨꞋa ndzìtsə te li ngua nkua awɔb la à?

Ka tà li nyi a èbem lob nɨ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà bɔ̂ bòt bi, àfɨꞋa Àbiatà lè wu àtsəa bèntsìà mèpɨ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la, kwèle a bled wu bɔ tɔ èlen Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà adù̧ la à? Bɔɔ̀ nkwèla ale è kà wu àghɨa mbɨ̧ ta te bɨ̧ɨ̧nè nê wòt tsa kà wu ntsìà mèpɨ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà ghɨa la.”
Yesò lìà nê, “Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà li ngɨ̀ àliapfəè mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ nɨ etɨŋe wɔ̀bȩ̂, tà li tà kà wua ngɨ̀à nê, wɔ̀bȩ̂ ŋà àtsəa zi ane ànəa àliapfəè.
È wu ale, bɨ̀ ko nê, Waã Wòt wu wòt tà bɔ àtɔŋ a ègwet àliapfəèa Bèjuê la.”
Yesò ghɨ̀ ale, ndɔ̀Ꞌ abot ngà nyi a èbem lob Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà, wòt kǒ wu a èbem lob və àbu atò a pfə la.
Bòt ko e mè ngu abot me kɨ nyɨꞋte nê Yesò è ghɨa kàbɔ̀ŋ. Ale, bɔ me nèèta ndȩ̀à tò nê kò taa bəa mbê wu àliapfəèa Bèjuê leꞋ.
Yesò tɔ wòt wu àbu atò a pfə la nê, “KɔꞋɔ a mbì.”
Yesò bɔ̂ mbììte bòt bu nê, “Mbɨ̧ ta te laꞋnê bà me ghɨ̀ na ane àliapfəè ya à? Nê bà ghɨa kàbɔ̀ŋ, kò ntsɔ̧̀ à?” Nê, bà bə wòt kò ba buŋa leè? Ka bɔ̀ ka tsɔ̀Ꞌɔ èngǎ̧ tò.
Yesò me lɨ̀ŋkè àwɔb nè èntɨ̧ɨ̧ bɨ̌, ntsòa ndɨ̀ wu bɔ tu̧ zǐ èntɨ̧ɨ̧ wɔb ane tò la, shu abua mbê wu nê, “Nyààbè àbu ayê.” Tà nyààbè àbu azi yu, a bê nkwèèlê.
Bèfalèsiì e lɔ̀Ꞌɔ àfɨꞋa mbɔŋ, mbê ngà nkwène ane bòt fɔ̧̀ Elɔ̀d, bɔ̂ tò ba e bùꞋ me taãaã ndɨ bɔ̀ɔ bùŋe a Yesò la.
Yesò bɔ̂ bɔkatè bi e lɔ̀Ꞌ ngà èlemè Galìlî, ènɔ̧̂ bòt e me kùŋe atò e dzəa Galìlî nè Jùdià,
nè Jèlusalèm, nè Idùmìà, nè èdziꞋ bu agua èdzî Jodàn la. Èbeko nè bòt e li ndzə a ngèt èpfəè nɨ̧ bu è wu Tȩê bɔ̂ Sidɔ̀n la, ngu ndɨ bɔ zə èghɨ tàa ngɨ̀à la.
Ènɔ̧̂ bòt yu e li ndzaã tê Yesò tsiꞋi shu abua bɔkatè bi nê bɔ̀ kɨ ànkànuꞋ ye nyi a èbèm nyaꞋ ngà a èbem èlemè wu mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ ènɔ̧̂ bòt bu e ŋèꞋnè àvi.
Tà li mbəâ bòt nyaŋ tè bòt àghɔ̧ e me ŋwèèla nkɨ ebaãaãte atò.
Àfɨ̀Ꞌ àgème bòt bu fote kàbɔ̀ŋ tèa ane yɔb la e ye atò la, bɔ kwene a si a mbì tò ŋȩ nê “À wu Waã Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà!”
Ka Yesò sèntè shu abua fote kàbɔ̀ŋ tu nê tè ka shu wòt ye wu wùà la.
Ale, Yesò kɔꞋ ngà a ègwet èku̧u̧nè, ntɔ bòt bu tàa nkɨa wɔb la. Bɔ kɨꞋɨ̀,
tà là bòt ntsɔ̀b babe, ntɔ awɔb ane bɔntu̧ nê bɔ̀ wu nè nì. Mbɔ̂ shu abua yɔb nê, yea nga tsàà àwɔb bɔɔ ghǎ me làꞋa èngǎ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà,
e mě ŋa awɔb mètàŋ ndɨ bɔɔ me fəâ fote kàbɔ̀ŋ la.
Eyaa wu bòt bu ntsɔ̀b babe tà li ndà la: Simùn (wu Yesò li ntsì èlen tò ko nê Pità la),
Jimsì bɔ̂ wanyɨ vi Jɔ̌n, bɔ̧ Zebèdiì. (Yesò li ntsì tèlen tɔb ko nê Bòànejì, ngua shua nê, “Bòt Èfàŋ.”)
Andùlù, Filìb, Bàtòlomiò, Màtìù, Tɔmasì, Jimsì waã Alfeɔ̀, Tàdià, Simùn wu tà lè taꞋa wua nùà mènəè àlaꞋ la,
nè Judàs Iskaliòt wu tà lè fɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀nè a Yesò la.
Yesò li ngɨ̀ ale ngà àpfəè, ènɔ̧̂ bòt e mè mbù̧ù̧te abot tè bɔ̂ bɔntu̧ bi è ka tsi mbɔ àfɨ̀Ꞌ bɔ̌ jɨ èghɨjɨ bɔb la.
ÀfɨꞋa bɔnyɨ Yesò e zə nê tà wu bɔ̂ ènɔ̧̂ bòt la, bɔ ghà nê bɔ kɨ enɨa tò nkàà nê, bòt e li ngua shua nê “Tà be!”
BènyɨꞋtà mbɨ̧te Musì ko bè le dzə a Jèlusalèm la e me shu nê, “Tà bɔ Belzebùl, fɔ̧̀ fote kàbɔ̀ŋ ane zi. Wu wùà ka nàa ŋǎ atò mètàŋ tà nɨ̀a fəèà fote kàbɔ̀ŋ ane bòt la.”
Ale, Yesò tɔ bòt bu, ndàꞋ abua yɔb ane mèngà̧teme, mbììte a wɔb nê, “BetsiꞋa Satàn ko fəè a Satàn?
Nê àlaꞋ a ghàbtè tè bòt e tsiꞋa nùà èbeko, ko àlaꞋ a mbɔŋ aa kwene.
Ləlob ghàbtà tè bòt ko e tsiꞋa nùà èbeko, ko betsiꞋa ləlob mbɔŋ ka tsi ko èfetê.
È wu ale, kèfɔ̧̀ Satàn ghàbtà tè ntsìꞋi a mètsəê tsa tsa, ko è ka tsi kweele mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ nàa anè la a. Ko kèfɔ̧̀ mbɔŋ nàà kwene tê ebee lìa.
BetsiꞋa wòt kà bəꞋə lob wòt tà bɔ ètɨ̧̂ nyaŋ la tè nɨ̀ èghɨ ŋut nɨŋ ngà. Tà bɔ ndɨ tàa bɨ̌ ekuule wòt kèkweelè wu ka bɔ ko eŋeꞋe èghɨ tò la.
TsiꞋ è shua wɨ̧ ane nkûŋ nê, Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà naa li waꞋa kàbɔ̀ŋ bòt nè mènəè kàbɔ̀ŋ bɔ làꞋa ane zi la.
Ka è wu wòt tà làꞋà mènəè kàbɔ̀ŋ ane Fo Kèfə la, Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà ka waꞋa ayùà nkàà nê, ŋut è ghɨ̌ kàbɔ̀ŋ kà wu li elìa.”
(Yesò nàà ndàꞋà èngà̧ waa ale, ngu ndɨ̀ wu bòt ko àa shua nê, “Tà bɔ fo kàbɔ̀ŋ ane zi” la.)
Nyɨ̌ Yesò bɔ̂ bɔnyɨ tò e ghɨ̀ ale, nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ ntɨ̧ɨ̧ àbȩ ntsà ntu̧ nê tà kɨꞋɨ.
Ènɔ̧̂ bòt e ko nê, e tseke ngààle a Yesò, bɔ shu abua tò nê, “Nyɨ̌ wè bɔ̂ bɔnyɨ bè e wu àbȩ nkɨ̀a wê.”
Yesò bììte nê, “Nyɨ̌ am wu wa, bɔnyɨ bɔ̧ mè ngu wà ba à?”
Tà ghɨ̀ ale, tà lɨ̀ŋkè bòt bu bɔ tsekè ngààle tò la mbɔ̂ nê, “Eyaa wu nyɨ̌ am bɔ̂ bɔnyɨ bɔ̧.
Wòt ègème tàa ngɨ̀à àghɨa Tǎt am a ègwet nàa nkɨà la wu wòt tà wu nyɨ̌ am mè ngu wanɔ̧ la.”

Yesò mè bùꞋ me nyɨꞋte èngǎ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà abua bòt a ngèt èlemè Galìlî. TaꞋà ènɔ̧̂ bòt e kɨꞋɨ̀ mbù̧ù̧tè a ngèt tò, kwat tè tà tsìꞋi sà àwɔb nyi a èbem ànkànuꞋ ngà a èbem *èdzî. Ènɔ̧̂ bòt bu e wu aguŋ.
Tà shua awɔb mènəè nyaŋ ane mèngà̧teme, mè nɨ̀ mèngà̧ mi nyɨ̀Ꞌte awɔb nê,
“Bɨ̀ zə! Wòt kǒ li ndɔ̀Ꞌ nga esà èsaãaãme.
Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ tàa sà la, è weko e kwentè a èbuꞋ èlu̧, banɨ̧̀ e kɨꞋɨ ngwȩ̀ȩ̀te,
è weko e kwentè a ègwet èwu, kà ye ètsaꞋ nyaŋ. ÀdziꞋ bê me wù̧ù̧ne e tuutè ndɨ̀ wu ètsaꞋ wu abot àa ndzàŋà la.
Nyèm chu mbê ntò̧ èsaãaãme wu e tuute la, e yu̧ ndɨ̀ wu tèghaŋ tɔb tè bakà nyi a si ntsɔ̧̀ la.
È weko e kwente a èbèm àdzɔ̧, a kɔꞋ nɨŋ tè è ka kɔɔle tètaãaãtsə.
Ka è weko nè èsaãaãme e kwente adù̧ ètsaꞋ ntsɔ̧̀, nkɔꞋ nkɔ̀ɔ̀le, me nkwèꞋne tè nkɔ̀ɔ̀la tètaã èghem yetat, èghem yentùa, nè ènkɨ̀.”
Yesò me lìà nê, “Wòt bɔ̌ ètû̧, tà yùte èngà̧ waa.”
