Yesò bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê, “WafàꞋ ntsɔ̧̀ tà bɔ èyì la wu we ŋa à? Wu wu tǎt àfàꞋ tò zi atò àtsəa beko nê tà me ŋa wɔb èghɨjɨ àfɨꞋa ntsɔ̧̀ la.
WafàꞋ ngaa naa taꞋa wùꞋtè àvi, na tǎt àfàꞋ tò me kɨꞋɨ àpfəè ndze atò fàꞋà la.
Ane nkûŋ, tsiꞋ è shua wɨ̧ nê, ko tǎt àfàꞋ waa naa zǐ atò àtsəa èghɨ bi ègème.
Ka wafàꞋ mbɔŋ shu abua zi zìambɔŋ nê, ‘Tǎt àfàꞋ am tseke nyaŋ,’ mbùꞋ me lene bɔfàꞋ ko bu, mbâ̧tsə nè bèzi, mè njɨ̀a nùa mbèa,

ko tǎt àfàꞋ tò naa kɨꞋɨ ane àlia tà ghɨ̂ tà kà wua nchɨꞋa tò la, nè àfɨꞋa kà tà koê. Mbɔ̂ ngu saãaãte atò e màꞋa a si, e tsàà atò àdziꞋa bòt bu bɔ tu̧u̧ zǐ èntɨ̧ɨ̧ wɔb ane Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la, è wu la.
“È me wu wafàꞋ wu tà ko àghɨa tǎt vi nàa kɨa nê yè ghɨa, ka tà kà nɔŋe avi e ghɨ̌ yùà la ko bɔɔ li shu̧u̧ atò kwàꞋ ànyaꞋne.

Ka è me wu wafàꞋ wu kà ko àghɨa tǎt vi nàa nkɨ̀a la, mbɔ̂ me ghɨ̀ àghɨa bɔ bɔ̂ ndɨ bɔ̀ɔ shu̧u̧ atò kwàꞋ ànyaꞋne la, ko bɔɔ li shu̧u̧ atò mpiꞋa. Bɨ̀ ko nê wòt ègème bɔ zǐ atò àtsəa èghɨ nyaŋ la, bɔɔ biite atò mènəè nyaŋ, è we bɔ ŋa nyaŋ nɨŋ fu atò la, bɔ mè ngu me kɨ nyaŋ abua tò.”
Yesò mè shu abua bɔkatè bi nê, “E nkɨꞋa e zǐ èwet adù̧ sitsǎꞋ. E ghɨ̀ ale ngua ngoꞋa àfɨ̀Ꞌ yaa ko a bɔ̀ am.
Maa nyi a èbem ngoꞋ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɔ̀ɔ ndzì wòt a èdzî la. Ànəa mbɔŋ aa ndèlà am tè a ghɨ̀ mbakà tsè, ènyit yaã è ka yaa.
Bɨ̀ ka mɨ̀ɨ̀tè nê, e nkɨꞋa e ŋa àlàŋkè a ngɔ̀ŋ ŋaà. ChaꞋ, tsiꞋ è shu awɨ̧ nê e nkɨꞋa ezǐ àyɔ̀ŋ a kètsìà bòt.
È wu ale, e buꞋa àfɨ̀Ꞌ yaa, me ghà ne mbì ləlob nè bòt batà̧â̧ nàa sàbte, bòt batat e tɨ̧ɨ̧ abà yɔb, babe e tɨ̧ɨ̧ ayɔb.
Bètǎt aa me yɔ̀ ne bɔmbâ̧ bɔb, bɔtèsà e me yɔ̀ nè bètǎt bɔb. Bèzi e yɔ̀ nè bɔɔ̀zi bɔb, bɔɔ̀zi e me yɔ̀ nè bènyɨ̌ bɔb. Bènyɨ̌ e yɔ̀ nè bèzi bɔ̧ bɔb, bèzi e yɔ̀ nè bènyɨ̌ bèlu̧ bɔb.”
Yesò mè shu abua ènɔ̧̂ bòt bu nê, “Ègwet àa ngɨ̀ è fen àbâ zìa, bɨ nê ‘Mbɨ̀ŋ naa lu’, è bê ndu mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɨ shu la.
“Bɨ̀a ngɨ̀ bɨ̀ ye àfeme a dzə a tsɔꞋɔ la, bɨ nê ‘Nyèm nàà ngà ete’, è bê ntè wuê mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɨ shu la.
Ye bòt ko bɔ̀ɔ shua nê bɔ wu àghɨa kà wu yùà la. Bɨà nkoa ndȩ̀à ègwelebuule nè sitsǎꞋ shua ndɨ àa wu la. Ghǎ ghɨ̂ ka bɨ̀ ka wu eko shu ndɨ àbȩ àa la à?
“Tè betsiꞋa bɨ̀ambɔŋ è ka ko nkwàꞋtè àghɨa è wù àghɨa ntsɔ̧̀ la ngɨ̀?

Wòt fɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀nè àwê a èkɔ̂t, à nyɔ̀Ꞌtè mbà̧à̧ àka tò àfɨꞋa bɨ̀ bele alu̧ la. Ghɨ̀ ale mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ ka tà səèŋnè awê nɨŋ nga a mbì wòt tàa sàꞋa èkɔ̂t la, tà zì awê a tèkitebu bɔkefen, bɔ màꞋà awê a tèfȩ.
TsiꞋ è shu awê nê à bakà tsə àtsɔb ayê te gha lìa ane nini à kà dzəê.”
Bòt ko bɔ wu abot la, e tseke tê ndɔ̀kè ànəa Pȩlèt ndɨ tà li mbùŋè bòt Galìlî ko àfɨꞋa bɔ li ngua nkɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀ma banyà̧ ŋǎ abua Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la.
Yesò bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê, “Bɨ mɨɨtè nê bòt Galìlî baa bɔ li mpfəèꞋtê la e li ngɨ a kàbɔ̀ŋ tè ntsè àbəꞋa bòt Galìlî à ko?
A ntsě ale! Ka e ngu a si shua wɨ̧ nê, bɨ bakà kùbte mèntɨ̧ɨ̧ mɨ̧ ewaꞋa mènəè kàbɔ̀ŋ mɨ̧, ko bɨa li pfəꞋte bàgème mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɔ̀ɔ̀ba.
Kò bɨa laꞋnê ghǎ ane ànəa bòt bu èghem ntsɔ̀b bafà̧aã a Silòàm, lob li nkwen a ègwet lɔb bɔ pfəꞋtè la à? Bɨ mɨɨtè nê bɔ li ngɨa kàbɔ̀ŋ tè ntsè bòt bàgème a Jèlusalèm?
A ntsè ale! E ngu a si shua wɨ̧ nê, bɨ bakà kùbte mèntɨ̧ɨ̧ mɨ̧ ewaꞋa mènəè kàbɔ̀ŋ mɨ̧, ko bɨa li pfəꞋte bàgème mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɔ̀ɔ̀ba.”
Yesò ghɨ̀ ale, mè shu awɔb èngà̧teme wàa, nê, “Wòt ko le lɔ̂Ꞌ mbɔ̀ àyɨt a fik a mbȩ zi. Tà lɔ̀Ꞌ ane àli ako nga kaabe tètaãaãte fik, ka tà kà ye.

Ale, tà shu abua wɔ̀fàꞋ vi nê, àfɨ̀Ꞌ yaa wu èngùꞋ yetat, mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ mâ bùꞋ me kɨꞋɨ àdzìꞋ yaa abàꞋa tètaãaãte fik, ka è nka ye ka kemɔꞋ la. ‘Nê, tà kòꞋò àyɨt a ngaa màꞋa a si, a bakà bɔ̂ ndɨ àa me jɨ si àku la.’
“Wòt àfàꞋ wu mè shu abua tǎt vi nê, ‘Tê, sa àyɨt a mbɔŋ ane èngùꞋ waa wemɔꞋ la. Maa nyàꞋà èten egheebe, ebɔ zì ètsaꞋ ntsɔ̧̀ tè èbɨ ngaa aa lu̧u̧.
È me wu ane èngùꞋebȩ e kɔɔlè, ko aa wu ane ntsɔ̧̀, mbə è baka kɔ̀ɔ̀lê, à ghɨ̀ bɔ kòꞋ maꞋa a si.’ ”
È li ngu ane àliapfəèa Bèjuê àko, Yesò me nyɨꞋte èngǎ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà a lob Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà yɔb kǒ.
Àvi kǒ wuê abot fo kàbɔ̀ŋ ghɨ̂ tà ghɔ̧̀ɔ̧̀nè ane èngùꞋebȩ èghem ntsɔ̀b yefà̧aã la. Tà ko nê, ye ŋɔꞋɔ tè mèndɔ̀Ꞌɔ ka tsi nguê.
Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ Yesò ye atò la, tà tɔ atò nê, “Mê, àghɔ̧ ayê a sà àwê.”
Yesò ghɨ̀ ale, nɔ̀ŋè àbu azi àtsə atò, kɔ̧̀ tò yu bê ndɔ̀Ꞌ tè àvi wu tɨ̧ɨ̧ ndɨŋndɨ̀ŋ, mbɔ̂ ngùꞋtè a Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà.

Wòt tà wu àtsəa lob Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà yu la bùꞋ me tsoo nê, Yesò bə wòt àliapfəèa Bèjuê. Wòt wu ghɨ̀ ale, shu abua bòt bu bàgème abot la nê, “Ba bɔ èli bentùa ba bɔ̂ ndɨ bàa ghɨ̌ àfàꞋ la, bɨ̀ kɨꞋɨ ane èli ngaa bɔ̀ bə awɨ̧, bɨ̀ ka nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ ane àliapfəè.”

Yesò bɨ̀ɨ̀lè èngǎ̧ tò nê, “Ye awɨ̧, bɨ̀a bòt ko, bɨ̀a ngɨ̀ bɨ me shu ànəê, mbɔ̂ ngɨ̀à àyea tsa la. Wòt wu ane yɨ̧ tàa sǎ mpɔ̀ŋ zi, kò loà vi leꞋ a èbem àkàt àliapfəèa Bèjuê kà yaa enɨ ghǎ ŋa mèleb abua tò la wu wàà?
Tè bɔ̀ ka ndzaa àvi wàà, è wuê wòt àndǎ̧ Abàlàghâm Satàn kuule atò ane èngùꞋebȩ èghem ntsɔ̀b yefà̧aã la, àliapfəèa Bèjuê ngɨ̀ tà pem?”
Èngà̧ waa Yesò làꞋà la e ghɨ̀ ètsə bɔmbù̧ tò bàgème e kɔꞋ kwàꞋ abot, mbɔ̂ ebeko nè bòt e me wùꞋtè àwɔb ane ènəê nɨ̧ baa tà ghɨ̀à la.
Yesò mè mbììtê nê, “Kèfɔ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà wu mbɨꞋɨ̀ ghàà? Màa nɨ ghǎ efɨ̀Ꞌne adù̧ à?

Nàà mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ èsaãaãme èwuu maŋkaŋa kǒ wòt kǒ sǎ a mbȩ zi la. Èsaãaãme mbɔŋ e koo te ntsè èsaãaãme ègème, ka àa ngɨ̀ ètsə, e faŋ ntsè èghɨjɨ ègème bɔ liꞋi a mbȩ la, tè ntsìꞋi mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ àyɨt, tè banɨ̧̀ bu bèa ndèa la e me kɨꞋa nkùùla tèjî tɔb adù̧ mèntaãaã tò.”
Yesò mè nê, “Màa nɨ ghǎ nɨ efɨ̀Ꞌɨ ane Kèfɔ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà à?
Kèfɔ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà wu mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ yis wu naa ngɨ̀à ka bled kɔ̀Ꞌa la. Àvi nàa ngɨ̀ tà nɨ̀ adzìꞋ ntɔ̀bte ane bapfəèꞋ fàlawà batat è tsekè tè ngȩȩne a èbem fàlawà wu ègème ngɨ̀ è kɔꞋ.”
Yesò le lɔ̂Ꞌ me tse èpfəè nɨ̧ nè bɔbɔpfəè nyɨ̀Ꞌta èngǎ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà, ntsèà ngà a Jèlusalèm.
Wòt kǒ kɨꞋɨ̀ mbììte atò nê, “Tê, wu wuê ndàꞋà bòt mpiꞋa bɔ̀ɔ li bɔ mèmpème kàlìà la à?”
Yesò bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê,
“Nyɔ̀Ꞌta a mànyia ane ètsələèꞋ techɨɨle, nkàà nê bòt nyaŋ aa li me nùa nyɔ̀Ꞌtà nkɨ enyi ka èlu̧ è ka wu wu abua yɔb.
ÀfɨꞋa tǎt lob lɔ̀Ꞌɔ a si tè nkȩ̀ lob la, bɨa tɨ̧ɨ̧ àbȩ me lùꞋte ètsələèꞋ è shua nê, ‘Tê, tsɔꞋ lob abua ya.’
“Ka tà bɔ ngu shu abua yɨ̧ nê ‘E mbakà ko awɨ̧, e nka ko àdziꞋa bɨ dzəè la’.
“NdàꞋ ale ko bɨa bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê, ‘Ba li njɨ èghɨjɨ mè nu mèlùꞋ ba nɨ̧̀ ba, à mè nyɨ̀Ꞌte awa mènəè mê a kètsìà àpfəè aya.’
“Ko taa mě tse a lob e shu nê, ‘E mbakà ko awɨ̧, bɨ̀ lɔ̀Ꞌɔ a mbì ètsələèꞋ am, bɨ̀a wu bɨ̀a ngɨ̀à mènəè kàbɔ̀ŋ la.’
“Bɨa me dɨ̀a nkwèla àsɔŋ yɨ̧ abot àfɨꞋa bɨ̀a ye Abàlàghâm bɔ̂ Asàk nè Jàkɔ̂b, nè bèndàꞋàtɔŋ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà bàgème, a èbem kèfɔ̧̀ tò, mbɔ̂ bɨ̀ambɔŋ e wu àbȩ bɔ màꞋà la.
Bòt aa li dzəâ a bètɔꞋɔ ngɔ̀ŋ ekɨꞋɨ bɔɔ jɨ èpǎ̧ wu Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nàa taŋke abua yɔb a kèfɔ̧̀ vi la.
Ane nkûŋ, àfɨ̀Ꞌ a ngaa bòt ko bɔ wua kwèn la bɔɔ li tsiꞋi a mbì, èbeko bè wu a mbì la be tsiꞋi akwèn.”
Yesò bèla ndàꞋà, Bèfalèsiì ko e kɨꞋɨ shu abua tò nê, “À bɔ̂ ndɨ àa sa àdziꞋ yaa e ghǎ àbâ ako la, nkàà nè Fɔ̧̀ Elɔ̀d nàà kɨ baãaã awê ebùŋe.”

Yesò shu abua yɔb nê, “Bɨ̀ gha shu abua tǎt eŋɔꞋte mènəè ngaa nê, e ngua fəèà fote kàbɔ̀ŋ tèa ŋǎ bòt ngoꞋ la, mè mbəèa bòt àghɔ̧ laane bɔ̂ tètsɔꞋ, ka atetsɔꞋ vìa maa paate àfàꞋ am.
Ka la mâ bɔ̂ ndɨ màa ghà wuê àdziꞋa e ngà la, laane bɔ̂ tetsɔꞋ, nè tètsɔꞋ vìa la. Maa ghɨ̀ ale, nkàà nê a bakà bɔ̀ŋ nê bɔ̀ buŋa ndàꞋàtɔŋ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà àdziꞋ ako tsa kà wua Jèlusalèm.

“Bòt Jèlusalèm, bòt Jèlusalèm leꞋ, èghǎ ghɨ̂ ka àfɨ̀Ꞌ àgème Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà tsàà bèndàꞋàtɔŋ bi abua yɨ̧ la, bɨ me temte awɔb ane àti mbùŋè àwɔb à? Mâ laꞋnê e nkɨ efete awɨ̧ ngò̧ nyaŋ ebaabe awɨ̧ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ nyɨ̌nkɔ̀Ꞌ nàa ngɨ̀ efete bɔ̧ bi a èten tèbààbè ti la, ka bɨ̀ ka bɨ̧ɨ̧nè.

Bɨ̀ zə! Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà tsì èsi vi ane àpfəè ayɨ̧ tè ndɔ̀Ꞌ. TsiꞋ è shu awɨ̧ nê, bɨ̀ ka tsi e ye am a, tè àli yu bɨ̀a li lete ngùŋ nê, ‘TsiꞋ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà lɔ̀ɔ̀le wòt wu nkɨ̀Ꞌa ane èlen tò la’, a kùꞋ.”
È lè lɔ̂Ꞌ ngu àliapfəèa Bèjuê àko, Yesò gha ejɨ èghɨjɨ a lob tǎt Bèfalèsiì ko. Bòt ko bɔ wu abot la, e bê ntsìte àghɨ ayɔb ane tò, bɔɔ nkɨ ye àghɨa tàa ghɨ̀ la.
Bɔɔ ngɨa ale, wòt kǒ èka tò nè èbu tò e kɔꞋte la wu a mbì Yesò tà tɨ̧ɨ̧ la.
Yesò lɔ̀ke àvi mbììte bènyɨꞋtà mbɨ̧te Musì nè Bèfalèsiì bu abot la nê, “Tè mbɨ̧te Musì tè bɨ̧ɨ̧nè nê bɔ̀ bə wòt àliapfəèa ya, kò te bakà bɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀ne à?”
Ka wòt ane yɔb ka tsɔꞋɔ èngǎ̧ tò. Yesò nɨ wòt wu ngò̧ò̧na la mbə atò, mbɔ̂ shu abua tò nê tà me ghǎ.
Tà mè mbììte awɔb nê, “Wòt wu ane yɨ̧ waã tò, kò mpɔ̀ŋ tò, kwene a èbem èbɨ mèleb ane àliapfəè, ko taa tseke ka tsì kwàꞋ àfɨꞋa mbɔŋ la wu wàà?”
A tsè àwɔb ndɨ bɔ̀ɔ bɨ̀ɨ̀lè la.
Àfɨ̀Ꞌ a me wu, Yesò ye ndɨ bòt ko ane bègɨ̧̀ bu aa nkɨà wu ètɨ̧ ntsɔ̧̀ ka tseke la, ale tà shu awɔb bàgème èngà̧teme waa nê,
“Wòt kàꞋà àwê a èpǎ̧ ndzɔꞋɔ à ka mbɨ̀ ntsèke adù̧ atɨ̧ ntsɔ̧̀. Ngua ngɨ̀à ale mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ ka wòt kǒ tà tsè àwê la lɔ̀Ꞌ nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂,
tǎt èpà̧ wu kɨꞋɨ shu abua ye nê, lɔ̀Ꞌɔ a si ŋa atɨ̧ wu abua ŋut ngɨ̀ àfɨꞋa ngaa ale, àtsə ayê a kɔꞋ ndɨ àa ghǎ tsiꞋi nɨ atɨ̧ elìa akwèn la.

Ka wòt kàꞋà àwê, à kɨꞋɨ, à ghà ntsèke ane atɨ̧ elìa akwèn la, mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ tǎt èpà̧ ekɨꞋɨ tà shu abua ayê nê, ‘Ewuɔ, kɨꞋɨ ntsèke adzìꞋa ntsɔ̧̀’. Tà ghɨ̀ ale, ko na wu nê tà ŋa kènuke abua yê a mbì bòt bàgème abot.
Aa ale nkàà nê wòt ègème tàa ŋèꞋa tèkwȩ ti a ègwet la, Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà naa shuke atò a si, wòt tàa nɨ̀a avi a si la, Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà ŋèꞋe atò a ègwet.”

Yesò ghɨ̀ ale, mbɔ̂ shu abua tǎt lob wu nê, “À me kàꞋa bòt nê bɔ̀ kɨꞋɨ njɨ èghɨjɨ, à ka nkàꞋà bèshu̧ bê, bɔ̂ bɔnyɨ bè, nè bòt ləlob yê, mè nè bòt èkab bɔ̀ɔ ntsèka a ngèt yê la, nkàà nê bɔ̀ kɨꞋà ko bɔ̀ɔ kàꞋa awê mɨ̧̂, nko nê bɔ̀ wua vəèà èsiꞋ lê.
Ka à me ghɨ̌ èpǎ̧ wè, à kàꞋà wuê bòt ntseb, bɔ̂ bòt bɔ̀ɔ ŋɔ̧̀ɔ̧̀mà la, nè bòt èka bɔb e ŋɔꞋte la, nè bòt àghɨ ayɔb a leme la,
ko aa bɔ èlɔ̂t ngu ndɨ bèŋût e ka li ko evəâ èsiꞋ ngaa la. Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà naa li tsɔꞋɔ àfàꞋ àyê, ane àli yu tàa li yu̧u̧me bòt bu bɔ li ntɨ̧ɨ̧ ndɨŋndɨ̀ŋ a mbì tò ka mpfəèꞋte la.”
Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ wòt kǒ ane bòt bu njɨ̀a èghɨjɨ bu la è zə èngà̧ waa la, tà shu abua Yesò nê, “Ntsɔ̧̀ wu bòt bu bɔ̀ɔ li tseke a mànjɨa èpà̧ wu a kèfɔ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la.”
Yesò shu abua tò nê, “Wòt ko li ntàŋke taꞋa èpǎ̧ vi nkàꞋà bòt nyaŋ.
ÀfɨꞋa èpà̧ wu a kùꞋ, tà tsàà wafàꞋ vi nê tà ghǎ ntɔ bòt bu ye li nkàꞋà àwɔb la nê, bɔ̀ kɨꞋɨ, nê bɔ taŋke èghɨ ègème tè ndɔ̀Ꞌ.
“Ka bɔ̀ɔgème e bùꞋ wemɔ̀Ꞌ wemɔ̀Ꞌ me shu nê ànəê a baãaã wɔb. Wòt mbì nê, ye yu̧u̧ èbaꞋ li, ngu a si nga elɨ̀ŋke lùà, ale tà ka fèèlè am.
“Wekǒ nè wòt nê, ye yu̧ mpɔ̀ŋke àfàꞋ ti èghem, ntsiꞋa alu̧ nga eyute, nê tà ka ntso.
“Wòt kǒ ane yɔb nê, ye shùu ndzà, ale betsiꞋa ye ka ko nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂.

“WafàꞋ wu kua akwèn ngà è shu a tǎt vi. A saa tǎt tò wu, tà shu abua tò nê, ‘Luula ngà a balu̧ nè bɔbɔlu̧ a èbem àpfəè, ntɔ bòt ntseb, bòt bɔ̀ɔ ŋɔ̧̀ɔ̧̀mà la, bòt àghɨ àleme nè bòt èka bɔb e toŋke la nê bɔ̀ kɨꞋɨ.’
“WafàꞋ wu kɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂, shu abua tǎt vi nê, ‘Tê, mâ ghà tê ngɨ̀ àghɨa à shu la, ka lob ka lu̧.’
“Tǎt wafàꞋ wu mè shu abua tò nê, ‘Ghǎ a mèlu̧ mbȩtsə nè bɔbɔlu̧, ngɨ̀ bòt e kɨꞋɨ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ lob yaã naa lu̧.
TsiꞋ è shu awɨ̧ bɨ̀agème nê, wòt kǒ ane bòt bu maa kàꞋ la è ka yute àghɨ àdziꞋa èpà̧ am a.’ ”
Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ Yesò lɔ̀Ꞌ te me ghǎ la, taꞋa ènɔ̧̂ bòt a me ghà bɔ̂ tò ba. Tà gheble avi shu abua yɔb nê,
“Wòt kɨꞋa abua am, tè mbakà kɔ̀ŋkè am te tsě a tǎt vi nè nyɨ̌ vi, vi vi nè bɔ̧ bi, nè bɔnyɨ bi, te ghǎ dzəâ ane zi zìambɔŋ, ko betsiꞋa ŋut wu ka kuꞋù wòt tàa wu wakatè am la.
Wòt bakà bɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀ne eŋeꞋe mbasa vi ekùŋè am tà kà kuꞋ èwe tàa wu wakatè am la.
“Wàa nàa ane yɨ̧ tà me kɨ ebɔ̧ɔ̧ taꞋa lob, tà kà bɨ tseke asi ekwàꞋte ètsəkab lob ngaa eye nê ko èbu bi e kùꞋu a màmbɔ̧a lob ngaa la à?
Ŋut wu bakà kwàꞋtè te ko, mbə lob yu naa tsě atò àfɨꞋa tà bɔ̧ɔ̧ àtetsi tè ndɔ̀Ꞌ la. AfɨꞋa mbɔŋ, ko bòt ntsèà ndzèa la, aa bùꞋu me tsoꞋte atò nê,
‘Wòt waa e bùꞋu lob kà wu ko paa.’ ”

Yesò ghɨ̀ ale, mè shu nê “Kò fɔ̧̀ wu tàa me ghǎ enua fɔ̧̀ kǒ tsa e bakà bɨ etseke a si kwàꞋtè la wu wàà? Ko taa kwàꞋte nê kò bɔ̂ bòt bi bètɔsì èghem aa ko nua fɔ̧̀ ko wu nè bòt bi bètɔsì èghem yebe la leꞋ?
Tà me ye bɔ tse atò ko taa tsàà bɔntu̧ nê, bɔ̀ gha nkwene ane fɔ̧̀ ko wu nê tà shu àghɨa yea ŋa bɔɔ ghɨ̌ àlàŋkè la.”
Yesò me lìa nê, “Wu wuê a èlɨ mbɔŋ betsiꞋa wòt ane yɨ̧ ka kuꞋù wòt tàa wu wakatè am la kà bɨ lèène àghɨ àgème tà bɔ la.”
“Angwaŋ nàà mbɔ̀, ka angwaŋ bakà wua ntsia ndɨ̧̀à, ko bɔ̀ɔ ghɨ̀ na tè naa mě me lɨ̧̌ à?
Angwaŋ mbɔŋ tsiꞋi àku. BetsiꞋa bɔ̀ ka zi a mbȩ, ko lem efɔte ane efəèꞋ ezǐ a mbȩ leꞋ. Ale, è tsìꞋi kùꞋù wuê ndɨ bɔ̀ɔ waꞋa la.
“Wòt bɔ ètû̧, tà yute èngà̧ waa.”
È le wu àfɨ̀Ꞌ àko bèmbaãaã taksì nè bòt bɔ tsì àwɔb ayɔɔ la, bɔ kɨꞋɨ eyute àghɨa Yesò lè wua shua la.
Bèfalèsiì nè bènyɨꞋtà mbɨ̧te Musì e bùꞋ me lèmta shua nê, “Mbê waa nàà mbɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀nâ bòt kàbɔ̀ŋ e kɨꞋa a ngèt tò, tà mè njɨ̀a bɔ̂ tò ba.”
Ale, Yesò shu awɔb èngà̧teme wàa, ane àbɨ̀t àlèmtè àyɔb.
“Tè wòt ane yɨ̧ bɔ njɨ̀tsə ènkɨ̀, yemɔ̀Ꞌ nyɔ̂ ko tà ka saame tu èghem yebəèꞋa ntsɔ̀b tebəꞋa la a ègwet èghem e ghǎ me kɨ yu yemɔ̀Ꞌ e nyɔ la te e ghɨ̌ ye ka etseke a si à?
Tà me ghɨ̌ te ndzea ko tàa taꞋa wùꞋtè àvi kwat te etsiꞋi nɔ̀ŋe atò a tèkwȩ ti
enɨ gha àpfəè. Mbɔ̂ ngɨ̀ ale nkàꞋà bèshu̧ bi nè bòt bu àpfəè yeamɔꞋ nè tò la nê, ‘Bɨ̀ bù̧ù̧te enu ndɔŋ ngùꞋtè àwɨ̧ ba nɨ̧̀ ba. Njɨ̀ yaã li nyɔ̂, ka mâ ye.’

Ale, kwàꞋ ane nkûŋ tsiꞋ è shu awɨ̧ nê wu wuê èlɨ mèngùꞋte nàa wu a ègwet ane wòt kàbɔ̀ŋ wemɔ̀Ꞌ tà kubte èntɨ̧ɨ̧ vi, ngwàꞋà mènəè kàbɔ̀ŋ mi la, tè ntsè me nàa ane bòt èghem yebəèꞋa ntsɔ̀b babəèꞋa bɔ̀ wu bòt ntsɔ̧̀ kà tsi mbɔ̌ ndɨ bɔ̀ɔ kubte mèntɨ̧ɨ̧ mɔb la.”
Yesò mè nê, “Tè àvi ko bɔ èkwȩkab bi èghem, yeamɔꞋ a nyɔ̂, ko tàa ghɨ̌ naà? Ko taa tô̧ èkaꞋà, etuꞋu silob ègème elɨ̀ŋke èdziꞋ ègème te e ghɨ̌ eye ka tseke a si.

Me ghɨ̀ ale, tè ndzea ko taa tɔ bèshu̧ bi nè bòt bu àpfəè yeamɔꞋ nè tò la, e shu abua yɔb nê, ‘Ndè ba, e ngu kwàꞋ ane mèngùꞋte ngu ndɨ mâ ye àkwȩkab am a ghɨ̂ nyɔ̂ la. Bɨ̀ kɨꞋɨ bà nɨ̧ ba ebù̧ù̧ta nu ndɔŋ ngùꞋtè àwa.’ ”

Yesò ghɨ̀ ale, mè nê, “E ngu a si è shu awɨ̧ nê, ndɨ àvi wàa le lɔ̂Ꞌ ngùꞋtè àvi la, wu wuê èlɨ mbɔŋ bɔntu̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà àa ngùꞋtà àwɔb ane wòt kàbɔ̀ŋ wemɔ̀Ꞌ tà kubtè èntɨ̧ɨ̧ vi èsà mènəè kàbɔ̀ŋ mi la.”
Yesò mè shu awɔb nê, “Wòt ko lè lɔ̂Ꞌ mbɔ̀ bɔmbâ̧ babe.
We kwèn shu abua tǎt wɔb nê, ‘Tê, ghàbtè èghɨ bê ŋà àyaã ne abà.’ Ŋut wu ghàbtè èghɨ bi ane èdzìꞋ bebe, ŋa abua bɔ̧ bi bu babe la.

“Àli a me wu, we kwèn wu fɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀nè àzi ne abà, mbɔ̂ sà àpfəè, nɨ èkab nɨŋ nga àlaꞋ ako a endɨ̌. Tà ghà àlaꞋ yu ale, me tsòkè èkab wu ane ndɨ ye kɔ̀ŋkè la, kà ye àghɨa tà ghɨ̀à nè wùà la.
Àfɨ̀Ꞌ a me wu, èkab wu ègème e mì. Èchɨɨ kekweelè e mè nyi àlaꞋ a mbɔŋ mɨ̧̂, àghɨ à ka tsi mè ngu abua tò.
Ale, tà ghà shù̧ù̧te wòt kǒ àlaꞋ və nê tà ŋa avi àfàꞋ. Tà tsaa atò nê tà ghǎ me baabe mè njɨ̀a mèkunyà̧ mi a èbaꞋ li.
Ale, tà ghà, wòt kà wuê tàa ŋǎ tò èghɨjɨ la. Ndzìtsə te baãaã atò tè tà tsìꞋa nkɨà èghele e ghɨ̌ èkunyà̧ ejɨ.
“ÀfɨꞋa èyǐ tò e kua la, tà shu abua zi zìambɔŋ nê, ‘BɔfàꞋ tǎt am bàgème e bɔ èghɨjɨ tè e me tsèà wɔb a njɨ̀a, e ngu àdziꞋ yaa mpfəà ndzìtsə.
Maa lɔ̀Ꞌɔ a si ghǎ ekwene ane tǎt am, e shu abua tò nê, Tê, mâ fâ̧ ànəê a mbì Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà, mè fâ̧ a mbì lê.
Àfɨ̀Ꞌ yaa, e mbakà tsi nkùꞋù we bɔ̀ɔ me tɔ am ane waã wè la, nɨ am nkwèꞋnè ane bɔfàꞋ bê.’
Tà ghɨ̀ ale, ndɔ̀Ꞌ a si mbà̧ èlu̧ me gha àpfəèa tǎt vi.
“Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ tà bele alu̧ la, tǎt tò ye atò, tèsȩte waã tò wu te taꞋa kua atò. Tà lùùlà ngà màꞋà èbu bi a tèkwȩte tò ntaꞋa atò.
“Waã wu lɔ̀kè àvi shu abua tǎt vi nê, ‘Tê, mâ fâ̧ ànəê a mbì Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà, mè fâ̧ a mbì lê. E mbakà tsi nkùꞋ we bɔ̀ɔ me tɔ am ane waã wè la’.”
Ka tǎt tò wu tsiꞋi tɔ wuê bɔfàꞋ bi nê, “Bɨ̀ gha kwàla nɨ̀ ndaŋa ndǐ ntsɔ̧̀ nɨŋ nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ ndzi a mbɨ̧̀ tò, ndzì kèmbǎꞋ àbu atò, nè gùbtsə a èka tò,
nɨ̀ wampɔ̀ŋ wu è lu̧u̧te la, nɨŋ nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ bà waala ndaã nkwet ngùꞋtè awa adù̧ və.
Na waã am waa lè lɔ̂Ꞌ mpfə, ka nè àfɨ̀Ꞌ yaa tà yu̧u̧mè, tà lè lɔ̂Ꞌ nyɔ̂, ka nè àfɨ̀Ꞌ yaa mâ ye atò.” Tà làꞋ ale, bɔ bùꞋ me wùꞋtè àwɔb.
“Bɔɔ ngɨ̀à ale waã mbì tò wu a mbȩ. Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ tà lɔ̀Ꞌɔ a mbȩ nkua tè me wu a ngèt lob la, tà zəè ndɨ bɔ̀ kɔ̧a mbèna la.
Tà tɔ wɔ̀fàꞋ kǒ mbììte atò nê, ‘Èghǎ e ghɨ à?’
Wɔ̀fàꞋ wu shu abua tò nê, ‘Wanyɨ wè kua tǎt wè bùŋè wampɔ̀ŋ wu è lu̧u̧te la ndɨ̀ wu wanyɨ wè kua ntsɔ̧̀ kà àghɨ a ghɨa tò la’.
“Waã mbì wu bê ntso tè è ntu̧ nyi a lob. Tǎt tò dzəè àbȩ shù̧ù̧te atò nê tà nyi a lob.
Tà shu abua tǎt vi nê, ‘Ye, mâ faꞋa abua yê ane mèngùꞋ maa ègème kà tu̧ àghɨa à shu nê è ngɨ̀à la. Ka à te bakà ŋa mbɔ̀ŋè wadzə maa nɨ wùꞋte am bâ bèshu̧ bɔ̧.
Ka waã wè waa, tà nɨ èkab wê ngà ntsòkè bɔ̂ bèghȩ̀ȩ̀nè ghȩ̀ȩ̀ne la, è kɨꞋɨ̀ à bê mbùŋè wampɔ̀ŋ wu è lu̧u̧te la abua tò.’
“Tǎt tò nê, ‘Waã am, à wu nè nà̧ àfɨ̀Ꞌ àgème, àghɨ àgème mâ bɔ la wu ayê.
Ka ba ghɨ̂ mbɔ̌ ndɨ bàa wùꞋtè àwa la. Wanyɨ wè lè lɔ̂Ꞌ mpfə, ka nè àfɨ̀Ꞌ yaa tà yu̧u̧mè, nyɔ̂ ka mâ ye atò.’ ”
Yesò lɔ̀Ꞌ mè shu abua bɔkatè bi nê, “Wòt èkab kǒ le bɔ waã àtsəa àfàꞋ vi kǒ, bòt e nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ è shu abua tò nê wòt àtsəa àfàꞋ tò wu nàa sàbta èghɨ tò.
Ŋut wu tɔ wòt àtsəa àfàꞋ vi wu mbììte atò nê, ‘Eyaa ka ànəê e ndzəa ane ye à? Ŋa àkatè àfàꞋ àyê, e ndze àghɨa a ghɨ̀ nè èkab am la, na à ka tsi wu wòt àtsəa àfàꞋ am la a.’
“Wòt àtsəa àfàꞋ wu bììtè àvi zìambɔŋ nê, ‘Tǎt àfàꞋ am nàa tsǐ am anè, maa ghɨ̀ na à? E mbakà bɔ ètɨ̧̂ e tu si. È ngu bɔ àtsəa kɔꞋɔ a màndo̧a àghɨ.
Mâ ko àghɨa màa ghɨ̌ ka bòt aa tseke kâ wua mpùùbà am afɨꞋa bɔ̂ fəè am àfàꞋ la.’
“Tà ghɨ̀ ale, ntɔ bòt njûte tǎt àfàꞋ vi wemɔ̀Ꞌ wemɔ̀Ꞌ, mbììte wòt mbì nê, ‘Njû tǎt àfàꞋ am abua yè wu ghà à?’
“Tà nê, ‘Mâ bɔ atò èpân mèwet ènkɨ̀.’
“Tà shu abua tò nê, ‘Nɨ àkata njû yu, ntsèke a si kwàla ntsiꞋi shɨ èghem yetà̧â̧.’
“Tà mè ntɔ wekǒ nê, ‘Njû yè wu ghà à?’
“Ŋut wu nê, ‘Mâ bɔ atò bakaŋ ntsəè tɔsì’.
“Wòt àtsəa àfaꞋ wu mè shu abua tò nê, ‘Nɨ àkata njû yu, shɨ bakaŋ ntsəè ènkɨ̀ yefà̧aã’.
“Tǎt àfàꞋ wu bɨ̧ɨ̧ne ànəa waã àtsəa àfàꞋ bèyuŋ wu è ghɨ̀ la nê tà lâ mbɔ̂ èyì. Nkàà nê, bòt ngɔ̀ŋ yaa aa ngɨ̀à mènəè mɔb ane bèyuŋ tè ntsè bòt Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà.
Yesò mè nê tsiꞋ è shu awɨ̧, bɨ̀ nɨ èghɨ ngɔ̀ŋ ngɨ̀ bèshu̧ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ è baka tsi ngu, ateko bɔ sèè àwɨ̧ adzìꞋa kà wòt wu li tsi epfə.

“Wòt mènəè tò è tɨ̧ɨ̧ ndɨŋndɨ̀ŋ ane mènəè tèchɨɨle la, wu ndɨ mènəè tò nàa tɨ̧ɨ̧ ndɨŋndɨ̀ŋ ane mènəè nɨ̧ la. Wòt mènəè tò e toŋke ane mènəè tèchɨɨle la, wu ndɨ mènəè tò nàa toŋke ane mènəè nɨ̧ la.
Ale, tè bɨ bakà ko mbà̧à̧te èghɨ sitsǎꞋ yàa ndɨŋndɨ̀ŋ, ko wàà naa li lɔ̀Ꞌɔ evi àghɨa ko eŋa abua yɨ̧ nê wu àyɨ̧ à?
Tè bɨ bakà bèà àghɨa wòt tsa ntsɔ̧̀, ko wàà nàa ŋa awɨ̧ àyea wu àyɨ̧ la à?

“BetsiꞋa wafàꞋ kà ko fàꞋ abua bètǎt àfàꞋ babe, nkàà nê tà bakà wua mpààbà wekǒ, nkɔ̀ŋkà wekǒ, mbə taa me zə wekǒ ngwǎ wekǒ. BetsiꞋa wòt kà me kùŋa Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà mè nkùŋà èkab.”
Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ Bèfalèsiì e zə èghɨ bàa Yesò shu la, bɔ̀ bùꞋ me wȩ̀ȩ̀te atò nkàà ndɨ bɔ̀ɔ nkɔ̀ŋkà èkab nyaŋ la.

Yesò shu abua yɔb nê, “Wu bɨ̀a bɨ̀a ŋèꞋa wɨ̧ a ègwet a mbì bòt nê mènəè mɨ̧ tɨ̧ɨ̧ ndɨŋndɨ̀ŋ la, ka Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà bɔ̂ ko mèntɨ̧ɨ̧ mɨ̧. Bɨ̀ ko nê àghɨa bòt àa nɨ̀a nê wu taꞋa àghɨ la, a bakà kùꞋ àghɨ a mbì Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà.

“Bòt e li ngua ndzəa wuê mènəè mbɨ̧te Musì nè mèngǎ̧ bèndàꞋàtɔŋ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà eghǎ edzəâ ane àfɨ̀Ꞌ Jɔ̌n ndzìà èdzî. E bùꞋu àfɨꞋa mbɔŋ Ntu̧ Ntsɔ̧̀ kèfɔ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà wu a mètsəê bòt bɔ̀ tsɔ̀tà, tè waa waa tà zə la tsiꞋa nùà ane ètɨ̧̂ nkɨ enyi a èbem.
Ka wu ànəa leyu ègwet bɔ̂ sitsǎꞋ aa tsě, tè ntsè ndɨ àlaata ànəê àko ane mbɨ̧te Musì nàa tsè àku la.
“Wòt ègème tà tu̧ vi vi ngà ndzɔ̀Ꞌɔ àvi kǒ tsa la, ŋut ko nê ye wua njɨ̀a àbȩ. Wòt tà yɔꞋɔ àvi lu̧ tò tu̧ atò la, wua njɨ̀a àbȩ mɨ̧̂.”
Yesò ghɨ̀ ale, mè shu abua yɔb nê, “Wòt èkab, kǒ lè lɔ̂Ꞌ nguê, ntaꞋa wua nkwà̧aã ndìte èkab ete membaŋ nè te kèfə, mbɔ̂ me tseke a èbem èghɨ ntsɔ̧̀ àli àgème,
Wòt ntseb kǒ wuê, èlen tò wu Lazalɔ̀s, tà me tseke àtsəa àpfəè atò, mbɔ̂ ntaꞋa bɔ tèfɨŋtsə ane zi.
Lazalɔ̀s me nɔ̀ŋkè ale ngua nchɨ̀Ꞌà badzìꞋ èghɨjɨ e kwente a ègwet tibàlà wòt èkab wu la, ejɨ. Tà nɔ̀ŋkè ale babə be me kɨꞋa ndààla tèfɨŋke tò tu.
“Àfɨ̀Ꞌ a me wu, wòt ntseb wu pfə, bɔntu̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà e kɨꞋɨ̀ ŋèꞋe atò nɨŋ ngà a ngèt Abàlàghâm. Wòt èkab wu tseke tè mpfəè àzi mɨ̧̂, bɔ tu atò.
Tà gha àlaꞋ a bèmpfəà, me ye ngoꞋ kèkweelè, ntsèkê ndɔ̀kè àvi me ye ndzě Abàlàghâm a endɨ̌, nè Lazalɔ̀s a ngèt tò.
Tà tɔ nê, ‘Tǎt wa Abàlàghâm, ku tèsȩ taã, ntsàà a Lazalɔ̀s tà chɨꞋɨ̀ wakèti vi a èbem mèleb nɨŋ nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ èfìî èlɨ̧ laã, na e ndâ ngu a èbem ngoꞋ a èbem èwet waa la’.

“Abàlàghâm nê, ‘Waã am, è li ngu àfɨ̀Ꞌ yu à bele a ngɔ̀ŋ la, à bɔ̀ èghɨ ntsɔ̧̀ ègème, ka Lazalɔ̀s wu ane ngoꞋ. Ka nè àfɨ̀Ꞌ yaa, tà wu ane mèntsèke ntsɔ̧̀, è me wu awê, à wu ane ngoꞋ.

A màà mbakà wu ale, ko àfuꞋ ànɨ̧ a ghàbtè àwa ba nè ba. BetsiꞋa wòt kà lɔꞋɔ adzìꞋ ya nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ ayɨ̧ ne adzìꞋ yu. Wòt kà meè ngu ko elɔ̀Ꞌɔ ayɨ̧ ne adzìꞋ etu̧ àfuꞋa mbɔŋ ekɨꞋɨ aya mɨ̧̂.’
“Wòt èkab wu nê ‘Mâ shu̧u̧te awê a Tê, tsaa Lazalɔ̀s tà gha a lob tǎt am,
na ma bɔ bɔnyɨ bɔ̧ batà̧â̧ la, nkɨ̀ɨ̀te awɔb mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ wòt wɔb kɨꞋɨ̀ àdziꞋa ngoꞋ yàa.’
“Ka Abàlàghâm nê, ‘Bɔ bɔ a Musì nè bèndàꞋàtɔŋ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà, bɔ̀ yute awɔb.’
“Wòt èkab wu mè nê, ‘ÀwɔꞋ a tè Abàlàghâm, wòt bakà lɔ̀Ꞌɔ adzìꞋa bèmpfəà yaa te gha shu awɔb, ko bɔ ka kubte mènəè kàbɔ̀ŋ mɔb a.’

“Abàlàghâm tsɔꞋɔ èngǎ̧ tò nê, ‘Bɔ bakà bɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀ne mènəè Musì bɔ̂ bèndàꞋàtɔŋ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà e shu la, ko wòt màà ndɔ̀Ꞌ adzìꞋa bèmpfəà nkɨ̀Ꞌâ è shu ànəê àko abua yɔb, ko bɔ̀ ka bɨ̧ɨ̧ne a.’ ”
Yesò ghɨ̀ ale, è shu abua bɔkatè bi nê, “Èghɨ àa ngɨ̀à bòt e ghɨa kàbɔ̀ŋ la e bɔ ndɨ àa kɨꞋɨ la. Ka aa li bɨɨ àbâ wòt wu tà ghaꞋa èlu̧ ka e kɨꞋɨ la.
Tà tsiꞋi te ghɨ̌ è weko ane ebe techɨɨle bàa naa ghɨa kàbɔ̀ŋ, a bɔ̂ŋ nê bɔ sèlè taꞋa èti àmî a tò, màꞋa atò a èbem *èdzî.
Bɨ̀ me ko awɨ̧ ndɨ bɨ̀a ntsèka la.
“Wanyɨ wè fà̧ ànəê abua yê, à ŋȩte atò, tà kubte mènəè kàbɔ̀ŋ mi, à waꞋa a kàbɔ̀ŋ tò.
Tà màà ngɨa kàbɔ̀ŋ abua yê ane ngò̧ tesà̧à̧mbe ane àliabȩ, à waꞋa a kàbɔ̀ŋ tò àfɨ̀Ꞌ àgème tà kɨꞋɨ̀ shu abua yê nê ye fà̧ la.”
Bɔntu̧ Yesò e ghɨ̀ ale, shu abua tò nê, “Ghɨa mèntɨ̧ɨ̧ ma me kweele ane yê.”

Yesò bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê, “Bɨ bɔ ntɨ̀ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ èsaãaãme maŋkaŋa kǒ e taꞋa wua nkòòta la, ko betsiꞋa bɨ shu abua àyɨt yaa nê, ‘ŊeꞋe awê nè tèghàŋ adzìꞋ yaa ngà ntsèmè a èbem *èdzî’, ko àyɨt a ngaa aa ghɨ̌ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɨ shu la.”

Yesò mè mbììte bɔntu̧ bi nê, “Tè wòt kǒ naa ane yɨ̧ wafàꞋ tò tàa ndìꞋa àliꞋ atò, kò wòt mbààba njɨ̀te tò la, kua a mbȩ ko taa shu abua to nê, ‘KɨꞋɨ kwàla ntsèke à si njɨ̀ èghɨjɨ la à?’
Àghɨa tàa ghɨ̀ la wu nê, taa shu abua wɔ̀fàꞋ vi wu nê, ‘Ghǎ ntàŋke èghɨjɨ nɨŋ nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ ntsìà, è jɨ, nu, tè è mpaa, ka à jɨ̀ èbe.’
Tè wafàꞋ wu ghɨ̀à àghɨa bɔ laꞋnê tà ghɨa la, bɔ mè me ŋa mènkɔ̀ŋke abua tò?
Eyaa ndɨ àa ane yɨ̧ la mɨ̧̂. Bɨ paatè àghɨa bɔ shu nê bɨ̀ ghɨa la, bɨ bɔ̂ ndɨ bɨ̀a shu nê, ‘Ba bê ngu wuê bɔfàꞋ. Ba ghɨ wuê àghɨa ba wu ghɨ̀ la.’ ”
Yesò lɔ̀Ꞌ me ghǎ Jèlusalèm ntsèà adzìꞋa èlɨ̀ wu à kètsìà Sàmalìà bɔ̂ Galìlî la.
Tà kɨꞋɨ tà me nyi àpfəè àko, bòt àghɔ̧atsɔꞋɔ ko èghem e tɨ̧ɨ̧ a endɨ̌
ntsà mètsəê mɔb nê “Tê Yesò, ba shu̧u̧te awê, ku tèsȩ ta.”
Yesò lɔ̀kè àvi ndzè àwɔb, mbɔ̂ shu abua yɔb nê, “Bɨ̀ ghǎ nyɨ̀Ꞌte awɨ̧ abua bèntsìà mèpɨ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà.” Bɔ lɔ̀Ꞌ me ghǎ, mbele alu̧ me ye ènyit yɔb e yɔ̀à.
Wòt kǒ ane yɔb ye ndɨ ye peme la, ngèble avi mbùꞋ me ŋȩa ngùꞋtè a Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà.
Nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂, ntèmè tènjûŋ ti a si a mbì Yesò, me ŋa atò mènkɔ̀ŋke. Ŋut bɔ̂ ngu wòt Sàmalìà.
Yesò nê, “Ka bɨ wu èghem àghɔ̧ yu a dzə ane yɨ̧ la à? Bòt babəèꞋa è wu neŋàà?
Nko nê wòt kǒ tsa ghɨ̀ tà kà wuê tàa kɨꞋɨ eŋa mènkɔ̀ŋke abua Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la kà wu wòt waa tà dzə àtu̧a tsa la à?”
Yesò shu abua tò nê, “Ndɨ̀ wu à zi èntɨ̧ɨ̧ wê ane yaã la, à pem. Lɔ̀Ꞌɔ a si me ghǎ àwê.”
Bèfalèsiì ko e biite a Yesò nê, “AfɨꞋa Kèfɔ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nàa li kɨꞋɨ la wu ka àfɨ̀Ꞌ à?” Tà bɨ̀ɨ̀lè èngǎ̧ wɔb nê, “Àghɨ ako àa li nyɨ̀Ꞌte nê Kèfɔ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nàà nkɨ̀Ꞌâ la a ntsě.
Wòt kà mèe ngu e shu nê, ‘Ye a kèfɔ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà adzìꞋ yaa’, kò ‘Ye vìà leꞋ’, nkàà nê kèfɔ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà wu a kètsìà wɨ̧.”
Tà mè shu abua bɔkatè bi nê, “Àfɨ̀Ꞌ a bele wu, bɨa me kɨ nê bɨ wu eye Waã Wòt nkɨ̀Ꞌâ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ Fɔ̧̀, ka wù ane àli yeamɔꞋ la, ka bɨ̀ ka wu eye.
Bòt aa li shu awɨ̧ nê, ‘Bɨ̀ ye atò adzìꞋ yaa,’ mbə ‘Bɨ ghà ndze atò àbà nyià.’ Bɨ̀ ka nga akwene yɔb.
Waã Wòt naa li saꞋa ane èli bu tàa li kɨꞋɨ la, mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ ègwelebuule àa ngɨ̀ e kaꞋa abà yaa ngà ngu a zià la.
Ka tà bɔ ndɨ tàa bɨ̌ taꞋa ye ngoꞋ, bòt laane aa mèe tu̧ nê bɔ bakà ko atò la.
“Èlɨ mènəè li ngɨ̀ àfɨꞋa Noà la, wu ndɨ nàa li ghɨ̌ àfɨꞋa Waã Wòt nàa nkɨ ekɨꞋɨ la.
È li ngu àfɨꞋa mbɔŋ bòt e me jɨa mè nua, mbâ̧tsə nè bèzi e me yɔꞋɔ awɔb tè ngà dzəè àfɨ̀Ꞌ yu Noà li nyi a èbem ànkànuꞋ yu la. Mèleb mu kɨꞋɨ ndììme awɔb bàgème.
“Aa li wu mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ à le lɔ̂Ꞌ nguê àfɨꞋa Lɔ̂t la. Bòt e li ngua njɨ̀a nua, ntà tèwentsə, ndìꞋa èghɨ ndɔ̀Ꞌ mbɔ̧̀a lob tɔb.
Ka kwàꞋ ane àli yu Lɔ̂t le lɔ̂Ꞌ sà Sodòm la, èwet nè èkem nendu̧ e lɔꞋ a ègwet ndù mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ mbɨ̀ŋ, ndììme bòt àpfəè və bàgème.
“Eyaa wu ndɨ àa li wu àfɨꞋa Waã Wòt nàa li pùùla ayaã la.
Ane àlia mbɔŋ, wòt tà wu a ègwet lob zi la ka tsi chu eghǎ a lob enɨ èghɨ bi. È we tà wu a mbȩ la tà ka tsi nkua akwèn e kɨꞋɨ a lob zi.
Bɨ̀ ku̧u̧te àghɨa à le ghɨ vi Lɔ̂t la.
Wòt me baabe àtsəa zi, ko taa pfə wuê pfə. Mbə wòt pfə ko taa li bɔ mèmpème.
Ane nkûŋ, naa li ngu àfɨꞋa mbɔŋ bòt babe e wu a ègwet èku̧ bɔ nɨ wemɔ̀Ꞌ ntɔ̀ɔ wekǒ.
Bèzi babe e wua èti ngɔ̀Ꞌɔ̀ ntsəètsə, bɔ nɨ wemɔ̀Ꞌ ntɔ̀ɔ wekǒ. [
Mbà̧ tebe te wu ebâꞋ, bɔ nɨ yemɔ̀Ꞌ ntɔɔ yeko.]”
Bɔkatè tò e biite atò nê, “Ànəa ngaa àa li wu a ka adzìꞋa à?”
Tà bɨ̀ɨ̀lè èngǎ̧ wɔb nê, “ÀpfəꞋta nyà̧ àa ngua adzìꞋ, tè tèdzǐtsə
Yesò ghɨ̀ ale, shu bɔkatè bi èngà̧teme wàa nɨŋ nyɨ̀Ꞌte awɔb nê, bɔ bɔ̂ ndɨ bɔ̀ɔ me dɨ̀a abua Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà àfɨ̀Ꞌ àgème kà kaã la.
Nê, “ÈtsəꞋ e li ndɔ̀Ꞌ ntsi, sàꞋàmèkěm kǒ wu àpfəè àko, tà kà wua nkùkta a Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà bɔ̂ bɔbȩ.
Nempfə kǒ wu àzi àpfəè və, me tseka nkɨ̀Ꞌa àli àgeme shua abua sàꞋàmèkěm wu nê, ‘Làŋke ànəê yaa a kètsìà wa baà bɔmbù̧ bɔ̧ la à tɨ̧ɨ̧ ndɨŋndɨ̀ŋ’.
“Àvi wu me kɨꞋɨ ale, saꞋa mèkěm wu ka wua njùta ànəa tà shua la, ka àfɨ̀Ꞌ a tseke tè me wu tà nê, ‘Maa kà bàte mbɔ̀a a Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà bɔ̂ bɔbȩ,
ka ndɨ̀ wu nempfə wàa nàa nkɨ̀Ꞌa ŋǎ am ngoꞋ àfɨ̀Ꞌ àgème la, maa làŋke ànəa tò yaa mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ tà me kɨꞋɨ wuê kɨꞋɨ tè ntsɔ̀Ꞌ am maꞋa a si.’ ”
Yesò Lefɨ̀Ꞌ ghɨ̀ ale, shu awɔb nê, “Bɨ̀ zə àghɨa sàꞋàmèkěm nè ètòŋke ènəê bi shu la.
Tè a wu anè ko bɨ mɨɨtè nê betsiꞋa Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà kà laŋkè mènəè bòt bi bu tà làà wɔb bɔ̀ɔ ndɨ̀à mènəè mɔb abua tò àli àgème la à?”

TsiꞋ è shu awɨ̧ nê, ko taa nàŋe mènəè mɔb naa tɨ̧ɨ̧ ndɨŋndɨ̀ŋ kwàla kwàla. Ka la, tè Waã Wòt naa li me kɨꞋɨ àfɨꞋa tà kɨꞋa la, te mèe ye bòt bɔ zi mèntɨ̧ɨ̧ mɔb ane tò a sitsǎꞋ ŋàa la à?
Yesò lè lɔ̂Ꞌ shu èngà̧teme waa abua bòt bu bɔ tanda nê bɔ tɨ̧ɨ̧ ndɨŋndɨ̀ŋ e mbì Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà tè ntsìꞋa ndzea bòt ko ntsia àghɨ ane yɔb la.
Nê, “ÈtsəꞋ e li ndɔ̀Ꞌ ntsi, bòt ko babe e gha etsàꞋte a Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà a èbem lob nɨ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà. Wòt wemɔ̀Ꞌ wu Falèsiì, wekǒ wu fetà èkab taksì.

Wòt Falèsiì wu lɔ̀Ꞌɔ a si ntɨ̧ɨ̧ a mbì ntsàꞋtè a èntɨ̧ɨ̧ vi nê, ‘Tǎt wa Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà leꞋ, mâ taꞋa kɔ̀ŋkè àwê na màa ka ghɨ èghoꞋ, mènəè mɔ̧ ka toŋke mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ me bòt ko, è nka mèe ngua njɨ̀a àbȩ la. Mâ kɔ̀ŋkè àwê na à ghɨ̂ è nka wu mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ fetà èkab taksì via la.
Maà ntsèka kà jɨ èghɨjɨ ngò̧ tebe ane nkàb, ntsàꞋtà wê, mè ngàbtà àghɨ àgème mâ bɔ la ane èdziꞋ èghem, ŋǎ àdziꞋ yeamɔꞋ abua yê.’
“È me wu a fetà èkab taksì wu, tà tɨ̧ɨ̧ a endɨ̌, tà kà lem ndɔ̀kè àtsə azi a ègwet, mbɔ̂ màꞋà èbu bi a tèkwȩ ti shuê nê, ‘Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà, ku tèsȩ taã, e ngu wòt kàbɔ̀ŋ.’ ”

Yesò nê, “TsiꞋ è shu awɨ̧ nê, wu ndàꞋa fetà èkab taksì waa tà li me laꞋnê yea ngà àpfəè, Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà ghɨ̀ mènəè tò tɨ̧ɨ̧ ndɨŋndɨ̀ŋ a mbì li la. Aa ale nkàà nê wòt ègème tàa ŋèꞋe avi a ègwet la, Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà naa shuke atò a si, è we tà nɨ avi a si la, Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà ŋèꞋe atò a ègwet.”
Bòt ko e li nɨ bɔ̧ bɔb nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ Yesò naa nɔ̀ŋè èbu bi adù̧ yɔb, bɔkatè tò bu e ŋȩte awɔb.
Ka Yesò tɔ bɔ̧ bu nê, “Bɨ tsiꞋ bɔ̧ bu è kɨꞋɨ abua am; bɨ̀ ka nkàlè àwɔb, nkàà nê kèfɔ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà wu abua bòt mbɨꞋɨ̀ bɔ̀ɔ̀ba wàa.
TsiꞋ è shua wɨ̧ ane nkûŋ nê, wòt bakà bɨ̧ɨ̧ne a Kèfɔ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ watèchɨɨle, ŋut li tà kà nyi a èbèm.”
Wajûŋ Bèjuê kǒ biite a Yesò nê, “NyɨꞋtà Ntsɔ̧̀, betsiꞋa e ngɨ̀ nǎ tè mbɔ̀ mèmpème kàlìà à?”
Yesò mè mbììte atò nê, “À ghɨ̀ na ka ntɔ am nê wòt ntsɔ̧̀ à? NdàꞋ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà ka tà wu wòt ntsɔ̧̀ la.
À ko mbɨ̧te Musì: ‘À ka njɨ̀ àbȩ, à ka mbùŋè wɔ̀bȩ̂, à ka ntsɔŋ, à ka mbɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀ne ànəa àfɨte àtsəa wòt, me zəa tǎt wè bɔ̂ nyɨ̌ wè.’ ”
Ŋut bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê, “Mâ nɔ̀ŋe mbɨ̧ tàa à shua la tègème àfɨꞋa e ndi ngu wakèsà la.”

Yesò zə ayaa ale, shu abua tò nê, “À bela mbùa àghɨ yeamɔꞋ àa ghɨ̌ la. Ghǎ fɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀nè èghɨ bê ègème, ŋà èkab èghɨ mbɔŋ abua bòt mbuŋ, mbɔ̂ nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ nkùŋè am, ko aa li jandèlè a ègwet.”
Ŋut wu zə ale, a taꞋa saa tò, nkàà nê tà li ntaꞋa bɔ èghɨ nyaŋ.
Yesò ye ndɨ a saa atò la nê, “Aa li taꞋa kweele abua bòt èkab a mànyia kèfɔ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà.
Aà njùa anyà̧ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ loà naa tɔɔ a èbem èləꞋə sàꞋa, tè ntsè ndɨ wòt èkab nàa nyi a kèfɔ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la.”
Tà làꞋ ale bòt bɔ wu abot ndzəèa la, e biite atò nê, “Tè a wu anè, ko betsiꞋa wàà bɔ mèmpème à?”
Yesò bɨ̀ɨ̀lè èngǎ̧ wɔb nê, “Aà nkwèèla abua bɔbȩ, ka è wu ne Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà, ko àghɨa àgème aà njùa.”
Pità bɨ̀ɨ̀le nê, “Ye ndɨ baà sa èghɨ ègème nkùŋè àwê la.”
Yesò nê, “Oò! KwàꞋ ane nkûŋ, tsiꞋ è shu awɨ̧ nê wòt tà sa àpfəè azi, nè vi vi, nè bɔnyɨ bi, nè tǎt vi bɔ̂ nyɨ̌ vi, kò bɔ̧ bi leꞋ, ambo kèfɔ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la,
naa bɔ àbȩ̀ a tsè èghɨ mbɔŋ la àfɨ̀Ꞌ yaa, e mèe li lɔ̀Ꞌɔ ebɔ mèmpème kàlìà àfɨ̀Ꞌ yu nga ekɨꞋɨ la.”
Yesò nɨ bɔkatè bi bu ntsɔ̀b babe la ngà a ntsèm, è shu awɔb nê, “Bɨ̀ zə, ba wua nkɔꞋɔ ngà a Jèlusalèm, àdziꞋa àghɨ àgème bèndàꞋàtɔŋ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà e le shu ane Waã Wòt la àa te la.
Bɔɔ li e zǐ atò a tèkitebu bòt kà wu Bèjuê, bɔɔ wȩ̀ȩ̀te atò, etsɔ̧̀ɔ̧̀te atò, e mèe tsəètè mattsə ane tò.
Bɔɔ li shu̧u̧ atò, ebɔ bùŋe atò, ka naa me wu ane èlibȩ betat taa yu̧u̧me.”
Bɔkatè tò e zə ale, bɔ ka bê nko ànəa tà shuà la. Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà li ndò̧ lə ànəa mbɔŋ abua yɔb tè bɔ̀ ka ko ànəa Yesò làꞋa yùà la.
Yesò lè lɔ̂Ꞌ nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ tè me dzə a ngèt Jèlikò, wòt kǒ àghɨ atò a leme la, wu a si a ngèt alu̧ ndò̧a èghɨ bi.
Ŋut wu tseke me zə ènɔ̧̂ bòt e me tsě, tà bììte nê, wu ghà leꞋ?
Bɔ shu atò nê, “Wu Yesò wòt Nazàlet ntsèà.”
Tà bê ndɔ̀kè ètsəê vi ntɔ̂ nê, “Yesò, waã Dàbid, ku tèsȩ taã.”
Bòt bu bɔ wu a mbì la bɔ ŋȩ atò nê, tà kate ètsəê vi. Ka tà pàa ŋȩ nê, “Waã Dàbid, ku tèsȩ taã.”
Yesò tɨ̧ nê bɔ̀ nɨ wòt àghɨ àleme wu nɨŋ nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂. Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ ŋut wu kɨꞋɨ la, Yesò bììte atò nê,
“Àa nkɨà nê è ngɨ gha abua ye à?”
Tà nê, “Tê, maà nkɨ̀a e mě me ye èdziꞋ.”
Yesò shu abua tò nê, “Me ye èdziꞋ, èntɨ̧ɨ̧ wê wu à zi ane yaã la, e ghɨ̂ à pem.”
KwàꞋ àfɨꞋa mbɔŋ, àghɨa ŋut a ghaꞋtè tè tà bùꞋ me ye èdziꞋ, nkùŋa a Yesò, ŋa mènkɔ̀ŋke abua Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà. Ènɔ̧̂ bòt bu e ye àghɨa a ghɨ̀ la, ŋà mènkɔ̀ŋke abua Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà mɨ̧̂.
Yesò kɨꞋɨ nyi Jèlikò me tsèa ngà.
Tǎt bèfetà èkab taksì kǒ tà lè taꞋa bɔ èghɨ la wu àpfəè və, bɔ mè tɔ̀ atò nê Zàkià.
Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ Yesò nàa ntsèà la, Zàkià me kɨ ye wòt tà wu wùà la, ka èlu̧ è ka wuê, ndɨ tà lè kaꞋa bɔ àtetsia, bòt e mè me yaã la.
Ale, tà lùùlà ngà a mbì ènɔ̧̂ bòt bu, nkɔꞋ a ègwet àyɨt ako ntɨ̧ɨ̧ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ eye atò, ngu ndɨ Yesò nàa kɨꞋɨ ètsě abot la.
Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ Yesò kɨꞋɨ tê ndzəèà abot la, tà lɨ̀ŋkè ègwet shu abua tò nê, “Zàkià, chu a si kwàla, nkàà nê maa lia a lob yê laane.”
Tà shu ale, Zàkià bê ntèmnê nchu a si nɨ atò nɨŋ nga a lob zi ane mèngùꞋte.
Bòt bu bàgème bɔ wu abot la, bɔ bùꞋ me lèmte shùa nê, “Tà gha eli a lob wòt mènəè kàbɔ̀ŋ?”
Zàkià lɔꞋ a si nê, Lefɨ̀Ꞌ, yute ànəê ya e kɨ eshu la. “Maa ŋa àbâ èghɨ bɔ̧ abua bòt ntseb, ebɔ evəèə ètsəkab ègème mâ nəêꞋ nɨ abua wòt la ngò̧ tekwì.”
Yesò shu abua tò nê, “Mâ kɨꞋɨ a lob yê laane etsì àwê bɨ bòt bê a èbem kàbɔ̀ŋ wɨ̧. Ngu nê, àwɔ̀ Zàkià, à tsiꞋi ngule wòt àndǎ̧ tǎt wa Abàlàghâm mɨ̧̂.
Aa ale nkàà nê, Waã Wòt kɨꞋa ekɨ bòt bu bɔ nyɔ la, etsì àwɔb a èbem kàbɔ̀ŋ wɔb.”

Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bòt bu bɔ wu abot la, bɔ bela ndzəèa èngǎ̧ Yesò la, tà mè ntsìꞋi shu awɔb èngà̧teme. È li me wu àfɨꞋa mbɔŋ bɔ tsiꞋa nkɨ nyi a Jèlusalèm, bòt bu e tsiꞋa mɨ̀ɨ̀tà nê Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà tsiꞋa nkɨ epùùle ayaã mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ Fɔ̧̀.
Yesò shu awɔb nê, “ÈtsəꞋ e li ndɔ̀Ꞌ ntsi, wòt nɨ̧ kǒ lɔ̀Ꞌ me taŋke e ghǎ àlaꞋ a endɨ̌ ako bɔɔ yɔꞋɔ atò ane fɔ̧̀ ka tàa bɔ kua àpfəè.
Tà tsiꞋa mànga, tà tɔ bɔfàꞋ bi èghem, ŋa wòt ègème èfəꞋə èkab nɨ̧ lemɔꞋ, lemɔꞋ. Mbɔ̂ ngɨ̀ ale shu abua yɔb nê, ‘Bɨ̀ zi ane èwen tè è ngǎ nkuà.’
“Bòt àlaꞋ a wòt ngaa e li bɔ̀ ka wua nkɔ̀ŋkà atò, ale bɔ tsàà bɔntu̧ akwèn atò nê, ‘Baà kà kɨ nê mbê waa wu fɔ̧̀ wa.’
“Ka tà ghà bɔ yɔꞋɔ atò ane fɔ̧̀. Tà kuà àpfəè ntɔ bɔfàꞋ bi bu tà li ŋà èkab wu abua yɔb la nê, bɔ̀ kɨꞋɨ yè ye àbȩ̀ bɔ tsiꞋi ale mbɔŋ ane èkab wu la.
“WafàꞋ mbì kɔꞋ nê, ‘Tê, mâ bɔ tèfəꞋte èkab nɨ̧ èghem ane àbȩ̀ èfəꞋ lu lemɔꞋ, à li ŋa abua am la.’
“Ŋut wu shu abua wafàꞋ ngaa nê, ‘À ghɨ ntsɔ̧̀, à wu wafàꞋ ntsɔ̧̀! Ndɨ̀ wu à baãaãte àdziꞋ èkab wàa ntsɔ̧̀ la, maa tsia awê àtsəa èpfəè nɨ̧ èghem.’
“WafàꞋ kǒ lɔ̀Ꞌɔ a si shu abua tò nê, ‘Tê, mâ bɔ tèfəꞋte èkab nɨ̧ tetà̧â̧ ane àbȩ̀ lu à li ŋǎ abua am la.’
“Ŋut wu mè ntsìꞋi shu abua wafàꞋ ngaa nê, ‘Maa tsia awê àtsəa èpfəè nɨ̧ betà̧â̧.’
“Wekǒ nè wafàꞋ lɔ̀Ꞌɔ a si shu abua tò nê, ‘Tê, ye èkab wê wu e ndi nkùtê a èbem àdziꞋa ndǐ ndò̧ la.
E ndi ngua mbɔ̀a awê, na à wu wòt kèkweelè la. Àà nɨ̀a àghɨa kà nɔ̀ŋè, mè fùꞋà àdziꞋa kà liꞋ.’

“Ŋut wu shu abua wafàꞋ ngaa nê, ‘À wu wafàꞋ kàbɔ̀ŋ. Màa nɨ èngà̧ e dzəâ ètsəê wê la, ka nɨ saꞋa awê adù̧. À li nko nê, e ngu wòt kèkweelè, màa nɨ̀a àdziꞋa kà nɔ̀ŋè, mè fùꞋà àdziꞋa ka liꞋ la,
ale, è ghǎ ghɨ̂ à kà nɨ èkab am e ghǎ zǐ a lob èkab, mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ è nkua e mbɔ àbȩ̀ à?’
“Tà shu abua bòt bu bɔ wu abot la nê, ‘Bɨ̀ nɨ èkab wu abua tò la ŋa abua wafàꞋ wu nè tèfəꞋte èkab èghem la’.
“Bɔ tu̧ nê, ‘Tê, tà bɔ tèfəꞋte èkab èghem tè ndɔ̀Ꞌ.’
“TsiꞋ è shu awɨ̧ nê, ‘Wòt tà bɔ àghɨ la, bɔɔ kwèꞋne aa taꞋa yaãaã, ka è me wu wu kà bɔ àghɨ la, ko bɔɔ paa kàyaã wu tà bɔ la enɨ.
Ka è me wu bɔmbù̧ bɔ̧ bu bɔ̀ le kaꞋa wua nkɨ̀a nê e ngu fɔ̧̀ wɔb la, bɨ̀ səèŋnè àwɔb nɨŋ nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ nkɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀me a mbì laã.’ ”
Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ Yesò shu èngà̧ waa tè ndɔ̀Ꞌ la, tà pààtè bòt bu bɔ wu bɔ̂ tò ba la me ghǎ a mbì lɔb, àpfəèa nɨ̧a Jèlusalèm.
Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ tà kɨꞋɨ tê dzə a ngèt Befagè bɔ̂ Betanì a ngèt èbȩ Olìf la, tà tsàà bɔkatè bi babe nê bɔ̀ gha a mbì.
Shu abua yɔb nê, “Bɨ̀ ghǎ àpfəè zia a mbì lɨ̧ la ko bɨa bê ye a jàkâ kǒ bɔ sèlè, wòt bakà li mè kɔꞋɔ a ègwet tò la. Bɨ̀ yaa nɨŋ nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ a si ŋàa.
Wòt bììte awɨ̧ àghɨa bɨ yaa nɨ gha ghɨ̀ la, bɨ̀ nê ‘Lefɨ̀Ꞌ laꞋnê yea nkɨà wùà.’ ”
Ale, bɔ gha ndze àghɨa àgème wuê mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ Yesò shu la.
Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɔ gha tê me yàà wajàkâ wu la, bòt bu bɔ bɔ la e biite awɔb nê, “Ghǎ ghɨ̂ bɨ me yàa atò à?”
Bɔ nê, “Tǎt wa laꞋnê bà nɨŋ nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ abua zi.”
Mbɔ̂ nɨŋ ngà ŋa abua Yesò, nɨ ndǐ tɔb ndzèènè a kɔ̧̀ tò, ŋèꞋe a Yesò ntsia ègwet.
Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ Yesò è tsekè a ègwet wajàkâ wu tè me ghǎ la, bòt esàŋkè ndǐ tɔb alu̧.

Tà kɨꞋɨ tê tà me nyi a Jèlusalèm, àdzìꞋ yu èlu̧ e bùꞋ me chu a mbɨ̧̀ èbȩ Olìf la, ènɔ̧̂ bɔkatè tò bu e bùꞋ me ŋȩa ngùꞋtà a Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà ane èghɨꞋne èghɨ bu ègème tà ghɨ̌ bɔ ye la.
“TsiꞋ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà lɔ̀ɔ̀le a fɔ̧̀ wu nkɨ̀Ꞌa ane èlen tò la; Àlàŋkè a wu a kèfɔ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà, mèngùꞋte wu abua Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà wu a ègwet la.”
Bèfalèsiì ko bɔ wu ane ènɔ̧̂ bòt bu la, e shu abua Yesò nê, “NyɨꞋtà, ŋȩ bɔkatè bê nê bɔ̀ buŋ.”
Yesò bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê, “Ane nkûŋ, tsiꞋ è shu awɨ̧ nê bɔ bua, ko àti yaa aa me ŋȩȩ.”
Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ Yesò kɨꞋɨ tê me dzə àpfəèà nɨ̧ a Jèlusalèm la, tà lɔ̀kè àvi ndzè àpfəa mbɔŋ, mbùù èdɨ̂ ambo bòt àpfəè və.
Nê è me wu laane waa ale bɨ nchɨɨme nko ndɨ betsiꞋa wòt ghɨ̀ ka mbɔ àlàŋkè la; ka mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ àa si àfɨ̀Ꞌ yaa la betsiꞋa bɨ̀ ka bɔ yùà.
Àfɨ̀Ꞌ aa li me wu bɔmbù̧ bɨ̧ e kuule àkaã nkààle awɨ̧ a èbèm, tè àdziꞋa bɨa dzəâ la a ka wuê.

Mbɔ̂ ngɨ̀ ale nyi a èbèm àpfəè yu, ndììmè bòt bàgème bɔɔ a èbèm la, mè mbùù lobtsə tègème tè ngà ndzəè ane ètetsi. Èghɨ baa aa li ghɨ̌ a èlɨ waa, nkàà nê bɨ le kaꞋa nɨ àli yu Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà le kɨꞋɨ etsì àwɨ̧ a èbem kàbɔ̀ŋ wɨ̧ la mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ àghɨ ako.
Yesò ghɨ̀ ale, nyi a èbem lob nɨ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà fəè bòt bu fɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀nà èghɨ la.
Mè shu awɔb nê, “Àkate a Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà a laꞋnê, ‘Lob yaã wu lob bɔ̀ɔ me tsàꞋtè am a èbèm la’, ka bɨ nɨŋ ngɨ̀ è tsiꞋi àdziꞋa bètsɔŋ aa nkɨ̀Ꞌa ndò̧ò̧tà la.”
Yesò li ngua nyɨ̀Ꞌta àli àgème a èbem lob nɨ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà. Bètǎt bèntsìà mèpɨ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nê bènyɨꞋtà mbɨ̧te Musì nè bèfɔ̧̀ e me kɨ bùŋe atò.
Ka bɔ ka ko ndɨ bɔ̀ɔ ghɨ̌ la, nkàà nê bòt bàgème è le wua njùtâ mènəè tà shua la, tè wòt kà wua nkɨ̀a nê èngà̧ wemɔꞋ è tsè ka ye zə.

È li ngu ane àli ako Yesò wu a èbem lob nɨ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nyɨ̀Ꞌta bòt mè ntsɔ̀tà Ntu̧ Ntsɔ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà. Bètǎt bèntsìà mèpɨ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà, nè bènyɨꞋtà mbɨ̧te Musì nè bɔɔjuŋ Bèjuê, e kɨꞋɨ̀
shu abua tò nê, “Shu awa àdziꞋa à nɨ̀a àtɔŋ yàa àa nɨ̀a ngɨ̀à èghɨ bàa la. Shu awa wòt tà ŋa awê àtɔŋ ngaa la.”
Yesò bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê, “Maa biite awɨ̧ èngà̧ mɨ̧̂. Bɨ̀ tsɔꞋɔ wùà,
wàa ka tà li ntsàà a Jɔ̌n nê tà me zǐ bòt a èdzî la à? È li ngu Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà kò wuê bɔbȩ à?”
Bɔ bùꞋ me kààne a kètsìà wɔb shua nê “Bàa laꞋnê ghà à? Ba wu anè nê ‘Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà’ ko taa biite awa nê, ‘À wu ale ghǎ a ghɨ̀ ka bà ka bɨ̧ɨ̧ne èngǎ̧ tò à?’
Ka ba shua nê, abua bɔbȩ, ko ènɔ̧̂ bòt baa aa temte awa, nkàà nê bɔ bɨ̧ɨ̧ne nê Jɔ̌n li ngu ndàꞋàtɔŋ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà.”
Ale, bɔ tsɔꞋɔ èngǎ̧ Yesò nê “Baa bakà ko.”
Tà shu abua yɔb nê “Ale betsiꞋa è nka shua wɨ̧ àdziꞋa mâ nɨ àtɔŋ ka me ghɨ̌ èghɨ bàa la.”
Yesò ghɨ̀ ale, shu bòt bu èngà̧teme waa nê, “Wòt ko li ndɔ̀Ꞌ ndìꞋi èyɨt vȩn a mbȩ zi, ŋǎ abua bòt bɔ me faꞋa la, mbɔ̂ ndzəè ngà àvi a lèghȩ̀ȩ̀nè seè.
AfɨꞋa màfuꞋa èghɨ a kuêꞋ, tà tsàà àbùꞋ àzi nê, tà ghǎ abua bòt bu fàꞋa a èbaꞋ li la, nɨ èbi nè èghɨ. Tà ghà bòt ngaa e lene atò mbɔ̂ èfəè atò tà gha èbu fə.
Tǎt èbaꞋ lu mè ntsàà àbùꞋ a tsa, bèŋût e mè ndene atò mbɔ̂ ngɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀nè atò, èfəè atò tà gha èbu fə.
Tǎt èbaꞋ lu mè ntsà àbùꞋ akwèn, bɔ zì tèfɨŋtsə ane tò mɨ̧̂, mbɔ̂ màꞋà atò àbȩ.
“Tǎt èbaꞋ lu me ye tê nê, ‘Maa ghɨ̌ na à? Maa tsàa kwàꞋ waã èkɔŋ am, ateko bɔɔ kà̧aã me bɔa tò.’
“Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɔfàꞋ bu e ye waã ngaa la, bɔ me làꞋ a kètsìà wɔb nê, ‘Eyaa wu waã tǎt èbàꞋ lu. Bɨ̀ kɨꞋɨ bà bùŋe atò mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ jɨ èbàꞋ mbɔŋ!’
Ale, bɔ bê màꞋà atò àbȩ akwèn mbȩ yu, mbùŋè atò.”
Yesò bɔ̂ mbììte bòt bu nê, “Bɨ mɨɨtè nê, wòt wu tà bɔ èbaꞋ laa la nàa ghɨ̌ èghà ane bɔfàꞋ bu à?”
“Ŋut naa kɨꞋɨ ebùŋe bɔfàꞋ bu, èbɔ ŋa èbaꞋ lu abua bɔfàꞋ tsa.”
Bòt bu è zə ale nê, “Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà ka mbɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀ne a wu ale.”
Yesò me lɨ̀ŋke àwɔb tè nê, “Èngǎ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà è shua nê ghàà?
‘Èti lu bèmbɔ̧ɔ̧ lob e li ngwaꞋ nê wu èti kàbɔ̀ŋ la,
wu lùà ka e tsiꞋi ngule èti tɔ̀Ꞌɔ̀ lob la.’
Wòt tà kwene a ègwet èti làa la, tàa bəꞋte atem atem, ka èti ngaa è kwene a ègwet wòt ko aa ŋèꞋne atò.”
BènyɨꞋtà mbɨ̧te Musì nè bètǎt bèntsìà mèpɨ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà è lɔ̀Ꞌɔ àfɨꞋa mbɔŋ me kɨ ebaãaã a Yesò, nkàà nê tà làꞋa èngà̧teme wu ŋa abua yɔb. Ka mbɔ̂ ngɨ̀ ale me bɔa bòt bu.

Ale, bɔ me chɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ ngule àfɨꞋa bɔ̀ɔ baãaã atò e ŋa abua gɔvanɔ̀ la. Bɔ ŋa àbu akwèn abua bòt ko nê bɔ gha ngɨ̀ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɔ̂ Yesò ba e bakà bɔ ànəê, mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ Yesò me làꞋa, bɔ ye ànəa bɔ̀ɔ zǐ àtsə atò enɨ ghɨ̌ bɔ̀ɔ mbà̧aã atò adù̧ la.

Bòt bu e biite a Yesò nê, “NyɨꞋtà, ba ko nê èghɨ àa shua mè nyɨ̀Ꞌta la wu nkûŋ. À kà wua njùta ànəa bòt àa ndàꞋà la, ka mbɔ̂ me nyɨꞋte bòt nkûŋ ndɨ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nàa nkɨà nê bòt è wu la.
Shu awa, tè mbɨ̧ ta tê bɨ̧ɨ̧nè nê bà me ŋa èkab taksì abua Sisà kò wu nê bà ka ŋa à?”
Ka Yesò tuꞋa yuŋ wɔb ntsɔ̀Ꞌɔ èngà̧ wu nê,
“Bɨ̀ nyɨꞋte am àkwȩkab.” Tà biite awɔb nê “Àtsə yàa nè èlen làa adù̧ la wu ayea wàà?”
Bɔ bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê “Àtsəa Sisà.”
Ale, Yesò shu abua yɔb nê “Bɨ̀ ŋa àghɨa è wu àyea Sisà la abua tò, ŋà àghɨa è wù àyea Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la abua Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà.”
Bòt ngaa e ghɨ̀ ale, bɔ ka ye àghɨa Yesò fà̧aã a mbì bòt bu abot betsiꞋa bɔ nɨŋ mbà̧aã atò la. Ale, a taꞋa tsè àwɔb, bɔ̀ ka tsi mbɔ̌ ànəa bɔ̀ɔ shu ane àbɨ̀t yu Yesò ŋa la.
Bèsadùsiì ko, bòt bu bɔ̀ɔ shua nê betsiꞋa wòt kà pfə mè njù̧ù̧me la, e kɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ ndze a Yesò mbììte atò nê,
“NyɨꞋtà, Musì li shu nê, Wòt pfəa kà bi bɔ̧, wanyɨ tò bɔ ndɨ tàa nɨ nempfə wu mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ ebi bɔ̧ abua wanyɨ vi wu tà pfə la.
Bòt ko basà̧à̧mbe e li ngu bɔ̧ wòt wemɔ̀Ꞌ. We mbì yɔ̀Ꞌɔ̀ vi vi mpfəè ka bɔ bɔ̧.
Wòt kwèn tò nɨ a nempfə wu,
wòt kwen we mbɔŋ mè nɨŋ àvi wu, a mè ntsè wu a èlɨ̀. Ànəê yaa a li ndzè àwɔb bɔ̀ɔsà̧à̧mbe bàgème, bɔ pfəꞋte kà ye wòt tà bi waã bɔ̂ àvi wu la.
A li ngà me lìa, àvi wu pfə azi mɨ̧̂.
Naa li ngu ane àlia bèmpfəà be yu̧u̧me la, àvi mbɔŋ wu vi wà ane yɔb wu basà̧à̧mbe la à? Bɔ̀ɔgème e li ndzɔ̀Ꞌɔ atò.”
Yesò bɨ̀ɨ̀lè èngǎ̧ wɔb nê, “Bòt ngɔ̀ŋ yaa àfɨ̀Ꞌ yaa la, aà ndzɔ̀Ꞌa,
Ka mbâ̧ tu nè bèzi bu bɔ kùꞋu be bɔ̀ɔ li lɔ̀Ꞌɔ eyu̧u̧me e tseke àfɨ̀Ꞌ yu nga ekɨꞋɨ la, è ka li lɔ̀Ꞌɔ tsi yɔꞋɔ a.
Bɔɔ li tsiꞋi mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɔntu̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà kà wu li pfə. Bɔ wu bɔ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nkàà nê bɔ yu̧u̧me ayɔɔ bèmpfəà.

Musì li nyɨ̀Ꞌte nê, bèmpfəà beà njù̧ù̧mâ mbɔ mèmpème. A èbem adzìꞋ yu tà làꞋa ànəa èwet wu è li ngua nkòòlâ ane abàꞋ wu la tà shu nê, Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà wu ‘Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà Abàlàghâm, Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà Asàk nè Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà Jàkɔ̂b.’
Tà wu Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà bòt yu̧, tà ntsě Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà bèmpfəà. Nkàà nê, aa abua tò, bòt bàgème bɔ zi mèntɨ̧ɨ̧ mɔb ane tò la e wu bòt yu̧.”
BènyɨꞋtà mbɨ̧te Musì ko bɔ wu abot la e nê, “NyɨꞋtà, à bɨ̀ɨ̀le ntsɔ̧̀.”
Ale, wòt kà tsi mè nyɔꞋte a màmbiite atò èngà̧ ko tsa.
Yesò bììte awɔb nê “Bɔ ghɨ̀ na ka me shu nê Fɔ̧̀ wu Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà li ndzɔꞋ etsàà la naa li wu wòt àndǎ̧ fɔ̧̀ Dàbid à?
Dàbid zìambɔŋ è shu a èbem Àkata Mèkù̧ nê,
‘Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà Lefɨ̀Ꞌ li shu abua Lefɨ̀Ꞌ am nê,
Tseke àbâ àbualu̧ am
tè e ŋà èlu̧ à tsite èka bê a ègwet bɔmbù̧ bê.’
Fɔ̧̀ Dàbid wu tɔ atò ane tǎt vi, tà ghɨ̀ na ka ntsiꞋi wòt àndǎ̧ Dàbid à?”
Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bòt bu bàgème è wua njùta mènəè Yesò shua la, tà ghèble avi shu abua bɔkatè bi nê,

“Bɨ̀ me ko awɨ̧ ane bènyɨꞋtà mbɨ̧te Musì. Bɔ taꞋa wua nkɔ̀ŋkà me kwaãaã mèmǎ̧ mɔb ngȩ̀ȩ̀nà, mè ntàꞋa wua nkɔ̀ŋkà bòt aa me tsàꞋtè àwɔb mè nkùkte awɔb àsà̧aã tèwentsə. Bɔ̀ɔ ngɨ̀ bɔ gha èdziꞋi mèpà̧, bɔ̂ lobte Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà bɔ me kɨ wu ètɨ̧ ntsɔ̧̀ ka tseke a ègwet.
Mbɔ̂ ngu bɔ̀ɔ̀ba bɔ̀ɔ ngɨ̀ɨ̀la bènempfə fàà èghɨ bɔb, mbɔ̂ ndɔ̀Ꞌ me tsàꞋta Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà ndà̧à̧nà mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ enɨ èvəèəèlè àghɨ a bòt la. Bɨ̀a li bɔ ngoꞋ è tsě ye bòt bàgème la.”
Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ Yesò tseke a lob nɨ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà ndɔ̀kè àvi me ye ndɨ bòt e màꞋà èkab a èbem akɔ̂b èkab la,
tà me ye nempfə kǒ kà ye azi kɨꞋɨ̀ ndzì bakwȩkab babe a èbem.
Tà nê, “KwàꞋ ane nkûŋ, nempfə wàà è zi èkab a èbem tè ntsè bòt bàgème.
Nkàà nê bòt ko bu e ŋa wuê adzìꞋ ane èghɨ bu nyaŋ bɔ bɔ la, ka tò waa kà bɔ azi la, è ŋa àghɨ àgème tà bɔ la, tè àghɨ à ka tsi nguê tàa nɨ eyu̧ èghɨjɨ bi la.”
Bɔkatè Yesò ko e li ngua shu ndɨ lob nɨ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà yu a Jèlusalèm nàa mbɔ̀ nè àti a ntsɔ̧̀ la, mè nè èghɨ bòt àa nkɨ̀Ꞌâ ŋǎ abua Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la. Yesò nê,
“Àfɨ̀Ꞌ aa li me wu, ka wuê èti lemɔꞋ ane àti yàa bɨ yea la è ka tsi ngu àdziꞋa zi. Bɔɔ li bùu yùà etsàa a si.”
Bɔ biite atò nê, “NyɨꞋtà,” èghɨ bàa àa li ghɨ̌ a ka àfɨ̀Ꞌ à? “Ghǎ aa li nyɨ̀Ꞌte nê èghɨ ngaa e tsiꞋa nkɨ̌ me ghɨ̌ à?”
Yesò shu abua yɔb nê, “Bɨ̀ me ko awɨ̧ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ wòt fɨte awɨ̧, na bòt aa li taꞋa kɨꞋɨ ane èlen laã e me shu nê, ‘E ngu tòà’, e mě laꞋnê ‘Àfɨ̀Ꞌ a kuêꞋ’ la. Ka bɨ̀ ka nkùŋè àwɔb.

Bɨa tseke tê bɨ̀ me zə èlaꞋ è buꞋa è me nù èbeko, ngoꞋtsə tè mě tè me dzəâ ayɔɔ bɔbȩ, mèntɨ̧ɨ̧ mɨ̧ ka bentè. Èghɨ ngaa e bɔ̂ ndɨ àa bɨ̌ ghɨ̌ la, ka è ka wua nyɨ̀Ꞌta nê àfɨꞋa ngɔ̀ŋ nàa lìa la a kuêꞋ.”
Tà mè nê, “ÈlaꞋ aa li enù beko, bèfɔ̧̀ enù beko.

SitsǎꞋ mè ngu me nyɨ̀Ꞌna nkwèà nyɨŋa bòt a èdzìꞋ ègème, èchɨɨ nè èghɔ̧ kàbɔ̀ŋ e mè ngu wu a èdzìꞋ ègème a sitsǎꞋ. Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà naa li nyɨ̀Ꞌte mètàŋ mi a ègwelebuule nè èghɨ àa tàꞋa fàŋe bòt la.

“Ka èghɨ ngaa aa li me laꞋ nê aa ngɨ̀à, bɔ baãaã awɨ̧, ngɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀nè àwɨ̧, ntsàà àwɨ̧ a lobte Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà Bèjuê bɔ saꞋa awɨ̧, màꞋà àwɨ̧ a tèfȩ. Bɔɔ li esəèŋnè àwɨ̧ enɨ kɨꞋɨ a mbì bèfɔ̧̀ nè bɔɔjuŋ àlaꞋ, ambo yaã.
Eyaa wu àfɨꞋa bɨ̀a tsɔ̀te Ntu̧ Ntsɔ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la.
Ka bɨ̀ ka me mɨ̀ɨ̀tè àbɨ̀t bɨ̀a li ŋa abua bòt mbɔŋ la àfɨꞋa tsa, nkàà nê,
maa li zǐ mèngǎ̧ a mètsəê mɨ̧, e mě zì mèyì a ètsə bɨ̧, ndɨ betsiꞋa wòt ane bɔmbù̧ bɨ̧ è ka tu̧ ànəa bɨ shua la.
Bètǎt bɨ̧ nè bɔnyɨ bɨ̧, bɔ̂ bòt lətelob tɨ̧, nè bèshu̧ bɨ̧ aa li jɨ mènàŋ mɨ̧, e ghɨ̌ bɔɔ bùŋè bòt ko ane yɨ̧.
Bòt bàgème aa li me pààbè àwɨ̧ ambo yaã.
Ka nyèm yemɔ̀Ꞌ a ètsə bɨ̧ ka wu li nyɔ.
Bɨ kuulà mèntɨ̧ɨ̧ mɨ̧ tè ngà ndzəè a mèndìa, ko bɨa li bɔ mèmpème.”
Yesò ghɨ̀ ale, shu awɔb nê, “Bɨa li bɨ̀ me ye èlaã bèshujà e tɨ̧ɨ̧te tê è kaale a Jèlusalèm èkua èbu̧u̧ma, bɨ ko nê àfɨꞋa bɔ̀ɔ tsòke àpfəèà nɨ̧ a ngaa la a kuêꞋ.

AfɨꞋa mbɔŋ, bòt bɔ̀ wu a Jùdià la, è luula nkɔꞋ ngà a ègwet tèbȩtsə, èbe bɔ wu a èbem àpfəèà nɨ̧ a Jèlusalèm la, bɔ dzə àpfəè və. È me wu bòt bu bɔ wu a tèbemtebàꞋ la, bɔ̀ ka tsi nyi a èbem àpfəèà nɨ̧ yu,
na èli mbɔŋ wu èli Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nàa li ghɨ̌ bòt aa ye ngoꞋ nkàà mènəè kàbɔ̀ŋ mɔb mbɨꞋɨ̀ ghɨ̌ ànəa àgème Àkata Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà a shu la àa wu nkûŋ la.
Aa li bɨɨ àbâ bèzi bu bɔ kɔte la, nè èbu bɔ̀ɔ nyɔŋa bɔ̧ la àfɨꞋa mbɔŋ. NgoꞋte kàbɔ̀ŋ tea li e ghe a èbem àlaꞋ mbɔŋ, ntsǒ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà naa mèe nɔ̀ŋke ègwet bòt Izəèlȩê baa.

Bɔɔ li kɨ̧ɨ̧me bòt ko, mbà̧à̧ èbeko ane èbùꞋ nɨŋ nga èlaꞋ tsa tsa. Naa li ngu àfɨꞋa mbɔŋ bòt kà wu Bèjuê e tɔ̀Ꞌtè a Jèlusalèm ndàŋkè a si, tè àfɨꞋa mètàŋ bèŋût nàa li mǐ la a kùꞋ.”
“Àfɨ̀Ꞌ aa li me wu, àtaãnyèm bɔ̂ àtaã èŋu nè tènto̧tsə e kubte tèkɔtsə, èlaꞋ a sitsǎꞋ e mè mbɔ̌ ngoꞋtsə. Bòt e mè ngu me bɔɔ ndɨ *èdzî e jùꞋà, mèleb tò e ŋeꞋe avi nga ègwet la.
Bòt aa li bɔa te tsiꞋa nkɨ epfəꞋte, mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɔ̀ɔ nchɨ̀Ꞌà àghɨa nkɨ e ghɨ̌ a sitsǎꞋ ègème la, nkàà nê ègwet nè èghɨ àa ègwet la aa li bente.
ÀfɨꞋa mbɔŋ, ko Waã Wòt naa dzə a èbem mbàꞋ a ègwet, nè mètàŋ bɔ̂ mèngùꞋte ènɨ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà.
AfɨꞋa mènəè maa bùꞋ te me ghɨ̀ la, bɨ lɔꞋte a si ndɔ̀kè ètsə bɨ̧ a ègwet, nkàà nê wu àfɨꞋa Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà tsiꞋa nkɨ echùꞋù ètsə bɨ̧ etsì àwɨ̧ a èbem ngoꞋ la.”
Yesò shu èngà̧teme wàa nê, “Bɨ̀ lɨ̀ŋke àyɨt a fik bɔ̂ èbeko nè èyɨt ndze.
TèfəꞋte fi tèa ngɨ̀ te me dzəâ, bɨ ko nê mènkwenà nàà nkɨ̀Ꞌa.
Wu wuê èlɨ bɨ yea èghɨ bàà ègème e ghɨ̀à la, bɨ ko nê, kèfɔ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà kɨꞋɨ tê ntsìꞋi a ngèt yɨ̧ la.
“Ane nkûŋ, tsiꞋ è shua wɨ̧ nê, bòt ngɔ̀ŋ àfɨ̀Ꞌ yaa aa me laꞋ nê bɔɔ ndèma, èghɨ bàagème e ghɨ̌.
SitsǎꞋ bɔ̂ ègwet naa li lɔ̀Ꞌɔ lìa, ka àghɨ à ka wu li ekubte ane èngǎ̧ am.”

Yesò paa èngà̧ waa ale mè shu abua yɔb nê, “Bɨ̀ me ko awɨ̧, mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɨ sà àwɨ̧ èghɨjɨ nyaŋ nè mèlùꞋ kèkweelè e tsòke ètsə bɨ̧. Bɨ̀ ka me mɨ̀ɨ̀tè mènəè sitsǎꞋ nyaŋ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ àli yu a kɨꞋɨ̀ mbà̧à̧ àwɨ̧ kà bɨ koê, mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ àtaã àa ngɨ̀ a baãaã nyà̧ la
nkàà nê, àlia ngaa aa li kɨꞋɨ kwene ane bòt bàgème bɔ̀ wu a sitsǎꞋ ŋàa la.
Bɨ̀ me chɨ̀Ꞌɨ àfɨ̀Ꞌ àgeme mè ntsàꞋta a Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ taa ŋa awɨ̧ mètàŋ bɨ̀a nɨ enû etsě mènəè maa, e mě ko etɨ̧ɨ̧ ntsɔ̧̀ a mbì Waã Wòt ane àli yu tàa li saꞋa bòt bi la.”
Yesò ghɨ̀ ale, mè me nyɨꞋte èngǎ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà abua bòt àli àgème a èbem lob nɨ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nɨa ngà nè mbì. Nyèm ghɨ̀ è fen, tà lɔ̀Ꞌ ngà a ègwet èbȩ Olìf ndi.
Bòt e li ngua mbùa a ntɔtetsɔ̌Ꞌ ègème nga a èbem lob nɨ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà ndzəa ànəa tà shua la.
Èpǎ̧ bled kà wua nkɔ̀Ꞌɔ
bètǎt bèntsìà mèpɨ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà bɔ̂ bènyɨꞋtà mbɨ̧te Musì e me kɨ èlu̧ bɔ̀ɔ nɨ ebùŋè a Yesò a ndò̧, nkàà ndɨ bɔ̀ɔ mbɔ̀a bòt bɔb la.
Satàn nyi a èntɨ̧ɨ̧ wakatè Yesò kǒ ane bɔkatè tò bu ntsɔ̀b babe èlen tò wu Judàs Iskaliòt la.
Tà ghà nkwène ane bètǎt bèntsìà mèpɨ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà bɔ̂ bètǎt bèmbaabà lob nɨ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà, bɔ̂ tò ba e làŋkè ndɨ tàa fɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀ne a Yesò abua yɔb la.
Bɔ làŋkè ale, ànəê yu a taꞋa bɔ̀ àwɔb, bɔ nê bɔɔ ŋa atò èkab.
Judàs bɨ̧ɨ̧ne, mbê mbùꞋ me kɨ ndɨ yèa ghɨ̌ bɔɔ baãaã a Yesò kà bòt e ko la.
Àlia èpǎ̧ bled wu nàa ka kɔꞋ la à nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂, è wu àli yu bɔ̀ɔ nkɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀ma bɔɔnjɨ̀ ane èghɨjɨ èpǎ̧ Màntsea a ègwet la.
Yesò tu̧u̧ a Pità bɔ̂ Jɔ̌n nê, “Bɨ̀ ghǎ ntàŋke èghɨjɨ èpǎ̧ Màntsea a ègwet, bà kɨꞋɨ njɨ.”
Bɔ biite atò nê, “Aà nkɨà nê bà gha ntàŋke a ka adzìꞋ à?”
Ale, Yesò bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê, “Bɨ̀ gha a èbem àpfəèà nɨ̧, ko wòt kǒ tà ŋeꞋe èkɨŋ mèleb la naa kwene ane yɨ̧, bɨ kuŋe atò nga a èbem lob tàa nga enyi la.
Bɨ̀ nyi, bɨ shu abua tǎt lob nê, ‘NyɨꞋtà laꞋnê ntàŋ wu bɔ̂ bɔkatè bi àa jɨ èghɨjɨ èpǎ̧ Màntsea a ègwet bɔb a èbèm la àa waa?’
Ko taa nyɨꞋte awɨ̧ taꞋà àtsəa lob a ègwet bɔ naŋe la. Eyaa wu àdziꞋa bɨ̀a taŋke èghɨjɨ èpǎ̧ Màntsea a ègwet bu la.”
Bɔkatè tò e gha àpfəèà nɨ̧ yu, me ye àghɨ àgème a wu mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ tà ghɨ̂ shu la. Ale, bɔ taŋke èghɨjɨ èpǎ̧ Màntsea a ègwet bu.
AfɨꞋa mànjɨa èghɨjɨ èpǎ̧ Màntsea a ègwet bu a kɨꞋɨ, Yesò tseke a si bɔ̂ bɔntu̧ bi me jɨ èghɨjɨ.
Bɔ tseke ale, tà shu abua yɔb nê, “Maa lâ ngua nkɨ ejɨ èghɨjɨ èpǎ̧ Màntsea a ègwet bàa ba nɨ̧̀ ba, nè èntɨ̧ɨ̧ am ègème ka e bɔ eye ngoꞋ.
TsiꞋ è shu awɨ̧ nê, è nka tsi jɨ èghɨjɨ baa, tè àli yu bòt àa ko lə èghɨjɨ mbɔŋ a kèfɔ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la a kùꞋ.”
Ale, Yesò nɨ ndɔŋ, ŋa mènkɔ̀ŋke abua Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà, mbɔ̂ nê, “Bɨ̀ nɨŋ nù bàgème.
Maa shua wɨ̧ nê, è nka li tsi nu mèlùꞋ màa bɔ ghɨ ane tètaãaãte vȩn la a, tè àli yu màa nu mèlùꞋ fi a kèfɔ̧̀ Tǎt am la a kùꞋ.”
Tà mè nɨa bled, ŋà mènkɔ̀ŋke abua Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà, mbɔ̂ mbòꞋtê ŋa abua bɔntu̧ bi nê, “Eyaa wu mbɨ̧̀ ènyit yaã mâ ŋa abua yɨ̧ la. Bɨ̀ me ghɨa nɨa mɨ̀ɨ̀tè am.”
Tà lɔ̀Ꞌ mè ngɨ̀ wuê a èlɨ ngaa nè ndɔŋ yu è shu nê, “Ndɔŋ yaa wu mènkàꞋa fi Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà màa nɨ àlo̧ am enɨ ghɨ̌ aa tsəète a si nkàà wɨ̧ la.
Bɨ̀ zə, wòt wu tàa fɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀ne am la, wua njɨ̀a èghɨjɨ ba tò.
Waã Wòt naa pfə wuê mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà li nɔ̀ŋè la, ka aa li bɨɨ àbâ wòt wu tàa fɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀nè atò la.”
Bɔ bùꞋ me biite a kètsìà wɔb wòt nga e ghɨ̀ èwuu ànəê yaa la.
Àyɔ̀ŋ a li ntsèke tè ndzə a kètsìà bɔkatè Yesò ane ànəa wòt tà wu wɔ̀jûŋ ane yɔb la.
Yesò shu abua yɔb nê, “Bɨ ko nê bèfɔ̧̀ kà ko a Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà àa ngɨ̀ bɔ me ghɨɨle bòt bɔb, bèkěm bɔb, e mè me kɨ nê bòt è me tɔ awɔb ane bèshu̧ banɔ̧̀.
Ka a bakà bɔ ndɨ aà wu anè a kètsìà wɨ̧ la. Wɔ̀jûŋ ane yɨ̧ è bɔ̂ ndɨ tàa wu mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ we kwèn la. Wòt tà tɨ̧ɨ̧ àtsə la bɔ̂ ndɨ tàa wu mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ wafàꞋ la.
Wàà wu wɔ̀jûŋ à? Wu wòt wu tà tseke a si me jɨ la, kò wòt tà bɨ̧ɨ̧ne ewu wafàꞋ tò la à? Ane nkûŋ, wu wòt tà tseke a si la. Ka e ngu a kètsìà wɨ̧ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ wafàꞋ.
Ka wu ndàꞋà bɨ̀a, bɨ li ntɨ̧ɨ̧ a ngèt yaã àfɨꞋa e ndi mbùꞋ me ye ngoꞋ tê kɨꞋɨ edzəâ àfɨ̀Ꞌ yaa la.
Ale, mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ Tǎt am è yɔꞋ am ane Fɔ̧̀ la, wu ndɨ màa yɔꞋɔ awɨ̧ la.
Bɨa li jɨ e mě nu ne nà̧ àfɨꞋa màa li tseke a ègwet àtɨ̧ kèfɔ̧̀ am la. ÀfɨꞋa mbɔŋ bɨa tsekte a ègwet ètɨ̧ nɨ̧, ka me saꞋa lətelob bòt Izəèlȩê tu èghem ntsɔ̀b tebe la.”

Yesò ghɨ̀ ale, ntɔ Simùn wu èlen tò ko wu Pità la nê, “Simùn, zə ànəa e nkɨ eshu awê la. Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà bɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀nè nê Satàn kɨꞋɨ nyìꞋì àwɨ̧ bàgème, mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɔ̀ɔ nyìꞋà ntsəètsə ntsìà èfaa la.
Ka mâ tsàꞋte a Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà àtsəa yê àwɔ̀ Simùn mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ ka à tsì èntɨ̧ɨ̧ wê ane yaã. Ka aa me kua akwèn nkɨ̀Ꞌa abua am à zì mèntɨ̧ɨ̧ bɔnyɨ bè.”
Pità bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê “Tê, è màà ngu wuê fȩ ko maa nyi yùà ba nè, nguê èvə e mpfə ba nè.”
Yesò shu abua tò nê, “Pità, kwàꞋ ane nkûŋ lu̧nkɔ̀Ꞌ naa me laꞋ nê yea ntɔ ètsəꞋ waa, à tû̧ ngò̧ tetat nê ye bakà ko am.”
Yesò ghɨ̀ ale, mbììte awɔb nê, ye li lɔ̂Ꞌ ntù̧ àwɔb kà ye ntaꞋ kò ambè nè gùbtsə ale, bɔ bu àghɨ ako leꞋ?
Bɔ nê, “ÀwɔꞋ.”
Yesò mè ntsìꞋi shu abua yɔb nê, “Ka àfɨ̀Ꞌ yaa, wòt ane yɨ̧ bɔ ntaꞋ kò wuê ambè leꞋ, tà ka ntɔ. Wòt kà bɔ àlùmbà̧, tà fɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀nè ndǐmàꞋa zi nju̧.

TsiꞋ è shu awɨ̧ ane nkûŋ nê, èngǎ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà wu e laꞋ nê, ‘Bɔɔ li nɨ atò mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ wòt kàbɔ̀ŋ’ la, e bɔ ndɨ àa wu nkûŋ ane yaã la, nkàà nê àghɨa bɔ̀ le shɨ ane yaã la a bùꞋù tê me te.”
Tà làꞋ ale, bɔkatè tò e shu abua tò nê, “Tê Yesò, ba bɔ èlùmbà̧ bebe.”
Yesò nê, “Bɨ̀ tsiꞋi ànəa ngaa ale.”
Yesò dzəè àpfəèà nɨ̧ yu ngà a ègwet èbȩ Olìf mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ tàa ndzìà ngɨ̀à la, bɔkatè tò e kùŋe atò ngà mɨ̧̂.
Tà kɨꞋɨ tê tà dzə abot, tà shu abua yɔb nê, “Bɨ̀ me tsàꞋte a Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà shù̧ù̧te atò mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɨ kwen a èbem ètaãaãte mènəè.”
Tà sà àwɔb nyaꞋa nga a endɨ̌, ntèmè tènjûŋ ti a si ntsàꞋtè a Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nê,
“Tê, nɨ ndɔŋ ngoꞋ yaa abua am la, na à kɔ̀ŋkà la. Ka à ka ngɨ̀ àghɨa e nkɨa la, ghɨ̀ wuê àyea àa nkɨà la.”
[Wantu̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà kǒ chu a ègwet ndzì èntɨ̧ɨ̧ tò.
Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ tà ghɔ̧ɔ̧na a èntɨ̧ɨ̧ vi nyaŋ la, tà tsènè ntsàꞋta Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nè èntɨ̧ɨ̧ vi ègème. Èlemne tò e me chɨ̧ɨ̧te a si mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ tètabte àlo̧.]
Tà tsàꞋtè mpàa, ndɔ̀Ꞌ a si nga nkwene ane bɔkatè bi ndìa, bɔ kaã nyaŋ ngu ndɨ ènyit yɔb e tsa ègème ane ànəa mbɔŋ la.
Tà bììte awɔb nê, “Bɨ̀ lia ghà à? Bɨ̀ lɔ̀Ꞌɔ a si me tsàꞋte a Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà, mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɨ kwen a èbem ètaãaãte mènəè.”

Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ Yesò bèla ndàꞋà la, ènɔ̧̂ bòt ko e kɨꞋɨ̀ nkwène ane yɔb. Wantu̧ ko ane bɔntu̧ Yesò bu ntsɔ̀b babe bɔ̀ɔ ntɔ nê Judàs la, li ngua nɨa awɔb nkɨ̀Ꞌâ. Tà kɨꞋɨ ale ngà a ngèt Yesò, me kɨ etaꞋa atò.
Yesò bììte atò nê, “Judàs, nko nê à kɨ etaꞋa Waã Wòt mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ efɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀ne atò?”
Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɔkatè bu bɔ wu bɔ̂ Yesò la e ye àghɨa nkɨ e ghɨ̀ la, bɔ nê, “Lefɨ̀Ꞌ, bà sɔ̀ŋke èlùmbà̧ nkòꞋte awɔb?”
Wakatè ko sɔ̀ àlumbà̧ mì ndo àtû̧ àbualu̧ àbùꞋ a àtsəa bèntsìà mèpɨ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà.
Yesò bê shu abua yɔb nê, “Bɨ̀ tsiꞋa yu ale.” Mbɔ̂ mbà̧à̧te àtû̧ atò ngɨ̀ tà pem.

Yesò shu abua bètǎt bèntsìà mèpɨ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nè bètǎt bèmbaabà lob nɨ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà, nè bɔɔjuŋ bɔ kɨꞋɨ mbɨꞋɨ̀ ebaãaã atò la nê, “Bɨ ghɨ̀ na me kɨꞋɨ ebaãaã am ndzəè mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɨ kɨꞋa baãaã tsɔŋ nè nyitsə bɔ̂ mbuꞋtsə à?
Maà wu ba nɨ̧̀ ba a èbem lob nɨ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà àli àgème, ka bɨ̀ ka mbà̧aã am. Ka eyaa wu àfɨ̀Ꞌ àyɨ̧ nè àfɨꞋa Satàn bɔ mètàŋ mi ègème la.”
Bɔ baãaã a Yesò nɨ̀a tò ngà a lob Kefàs wu tà li ngu àtsəa bèntsìà mèpɨ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la. Pità me nyaꞋa nkùŋà wɔb akwèn
TaꞋà èwet ko e wu a kètsìà àsà̧aã bɔ tsəꞋte la, Pità ghà me yɔɔ bɔ̂ bòt bu abot la.
Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ Pità tseke me yɔɔ èwet wu la, waàvi àfàꞋ kǒ kɨꞋɨ me lɨ̀ŋke atò tè nê, “Mbê waa lè wu bɔ̂ Yesò nɔ̂.”
Tà bê ntu̧ nê, “Àvi wàà, e mbakà ko atò.”
Àfɨ̀Ꞌ a me wu, wòt kǒ mè ndze atò, mbê nê, “À wu wòt kǒ ane yɔb mɨ̧̂.” Pità tu̧ nê, “Mbê wa, è ntsě mmɔ̌.”
È mè me wu mbɔŋe ane nyèm yemɔ̀Ꞌ, wòt kǒ mè ŋwèèle kwàꞋ ane ètɨ̧̂ nê, “Ane nkûŋ, mbê waa li ngu bɔ̂ Yesò ba, nkàà nê tà wu wòt Galìlî mɨ̧̂.”
Pità shu nê, “Mbê waa, e mbakà ko ànəa à shua la.” Tà bela ndàꞋà, lu̧nkɔ̀Ꞌ bê ntɔ.
Yesò Lefɨ̀Ꞌ ghèble avi ndɨ̀ŋkè a Pità àghɨ atò, Pità bê nkù̧ù̧te mèngǎ̧ Yesò è ghɨ̂ shu la nê “Lu̧nkɔ̀Ꞌ naa me laꞋ nê yea ntɔa aa tu̧ ngò̧ tetat nê ye bakà ko am.”
Pità ndzəè ngà àbȩ ndɨ̀ kwàꞋ ànyaꞋne.
ÀfɨꞋa mbɔŋ bòt bu bɔ tsia awɔb nê bɔ̀ me baabe a Yesò la, e bùꞋ me wȩ̀ȩ̀tè atò
nkùùle àghɨ atò, mbɔ̂ shu̧u̧ atò, mbììte atò nê, tà shu wòt tà shu̧u̧ atò la.
Mbɔ̂ ngɨ̀ ale mè ntaꞋa làꞋà mèngǎ̧ nyaŋ nɨŋ ngwȩ̀ȩ̀tè atò.
ÈtsəꞋ e me tsi, bɔɔjuŋ Bèjuê, nè bètǎt bèntsìà mèpɨ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nè bènyɨꞋtà mbɨ̧te Musì, e nyi a lob, bɔ nɨ a Yesò nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ bɔɔ saꞋa atò.
Bɔ biite atò nê, “À wu Fɔ̧̀ wu Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà yɔꞋ ntsà la, à shu awa?”
Yesò bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê, “E ngu anè è shu awɨ̧, ko bɨ̀ ka bɨ̧ɨ̧ne a.
E mbììte awɨ̧ èngà̧, ko bɨ̀ ka tsɔꞋa.
Ka e bùꞋu àfɨ̀Ꞌ yaa, me ghà ne mbì Waã Wòt naa tseke àbâ àbualu̧ a Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà Àtsèàngɔ̀ŋ.”
Bɔ mè ntsìꞋi biite atò nê, “Nko nê à wu Waã Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà à?”
Tà shu abua yɔb nê, “Bɨ shuê nê e ngu wùà.”
Bɔ mè nê, “Wòt ko tsa bàa mè nkɨ̀a nê tà kɨꞋɨ ndzì ànəê àtsə atò la ntsě. Bàa mbɔŋ e zə ànəa tà shu la.”
Bòt bu bàgème e lɔ̀Ꞌ a si nɨ a Yesò nɨŋ ngà a mbì Pȩlèt.

Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɔ kɨꞋɨ tê ndzə a mbì tò la, bɔ bùꞋ me zì mènəè àtsəa Yesò shua nê, “Ba baãaã a mbê waa ndùta bòt ba shua nê, bɔ̀ ka ŋà èkab taksì abua Sisà, mè shua nê ye wu wòt wu Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà yɔꞋ ntsà taa wu Fɔ̧̀ la.”
Pȩlèt bììte a Yesò nê, “À wu Fɔ̧̀ Bèjuê?”
Tà bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê, “Wuê mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ à shu la.”
Pȩlèt shu abua bètǎt bèntsìà mèpɨ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà bu nè ènɔ̧̂ bòt bu abot la nê, “E bakà ye àghɨa tà ghɨ̀ tê è wu àyea bɔ̀ɔ bùŋe atò la.”
Ka bòt bu e me ŋwèèlè wuê ŋwèèle shua nê, “Tàà ndùta bòt nyɨ̀Ꞌta a èbem àlaꞋ a Jùdià àgème, e lɔ̀Ꞌɔ a Galìlî e kɨꞋɨ̀ tê wu adzìꞋ yaa.”
Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ Pȩlèt zə ànəê yaa la, tà bììte awɔb nê, “Mbê waa wu wòt Galìlî?”
Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ tà zə nê Yesò dzəa àbâ àlaꞋ yu Elɔ̀d wu Fɔ̧̀ abot la, tà tsaa atò abua Elɔ̀d, na Elɔ̀d lè wu àzi àfɨꞋa mbɔŋ a Jèlusalèm la.

Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ Elɔ̀d ye Yesò la, ànəa ngaa a taꞋa bɔ̌ atò, nkàà nê, tà li ndzaŋe wua nkɨ̀ eye atò, nkàà nê tà li ngua ndzəèa mènəè tò. Tà li ngua nkɨ eye ndɨ Yesò nàa ghɨ̌ àghɨa nɨ̧ àko enɨ nyɨꞋte mètàŋ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la.
Ale, tà bììte a Yesò mènəè, ka Yesò kà kwe.
Bètǎt bèntsìà mèpɨ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà bɔ̂ bènyɨꞋtà mbɨ̧te Musì e taꞋa zì mènəè àtsəa Yesò.
Elɔ̀d bɔ̂ bèshujà bi e wȩ̀ȩ̀tè a Yesò, mbɔ̂ mè ntàꞋa eghɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀ne atò. Mbɔ̂ ndzì taꞋà èmǎ̧ èkab a mbɨ̧̀ tò, ka mbɔ̂ mè ntsaa atò abua Pȩlèt.
E bùꞋu ane àlia mbɔŋ, Elɔ̀d bɔ̂ Pȩlèt e tsiꞋi bèshu̧, na bɔ li ndzaã ngu bɔmbù̧ la.
Bɔ vəèə a Yesò ale, Pȩlèt tɔ bètǎt bèntsìà mèpɨ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nè bɔɔjuŋ Bèjuê, nè bòt àlaꞋ,

shu abua yɔb nê, “Bɨ lɔ̀Ꞌ nɨ a mbê waa nɨŋ nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ abua am nê, tàà ntsòkà ètsə bòt àlaꞋ, ka nè àfɨ̀Ꞌ yaa, mâ lɨ̀ŋke atò a kètsìà wɨ̧ tè ndze nê tà bakà paate mbɨ̧ ane mbɨ̧ tu bɨ shua nê tà pààtè la.
Elɔ̀d mɨ̧̂ ye nê tà bakà paate mbɨ̧ kǒ, ndɨ̀ wu tà ghɨ̀ ale mè ntsaa atò abua ya la. Ale, àghɨa ko mbê waa ghɨ̀ tê è tsiꞋi àyea bɔ̀ɔ bùŋe atò la a ntsě.
Maa ghɨ̌ bɔɔ shu̧u̧ atò, ebɔ sa atò taa me ghǎ.”
[Pȩlèt nàà ndàꞋà ale ngu nê tà ko nê nàa ngɨ̀ è wu àlia èpǎ̧ Màntsea a ègwet àgème, a me nyɨꞋte nê yè tsɔꞋɔ wòt tèfȩ wemɔ̀Ꞌ sàŋ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ àlaꞋ a shu la.]
Ènɔ̧̂ bòt bu ègème e me ŋȩa shua nê, “Bɨ̀ bùŋe a Yesò, sa a Bàlabasì abua ya.”
Bàlabasì li me wu a tèfȩ ale, ngu ndɨ ngoꞋ li ndzəè a àpfəèà nɨ̧ yu tà mè bùŋe wòt la.
Pȩlèt me kɨ esǎ a Yesò, ale tà mè ndàꞋ abua ènɔ̧̂ bòt bu,
bɔ paà ŋȩ nê “Bɨ̀ wu̧u̧te atò, bɨ̀ wu̧u̧te atò a mbɨ̧̀ Mbasa.”
Pȩlèt mè mbììte awɔb è wu ngò̧ tetat la nê, “Tà ghɨ̀ ka ànəa kàbɔ̀ŋ à? E mbakà ye a kàbɔ̀ŋ kǒ tà ghɨ̀ tê bɔɔ bùŋe atò la. Maa ghɨ̌ bɔɔ shu̧u̧ atò, ebɔ sǎ atò.”
Ka bɔ paà ŋȩ nê “Bɨ̀ wu̧u̧te atò a mbɨ̧̀ Mbasa.” Bɔ me ŋȩ tê tà bɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀nê àghɨa bɔ kɨa la.
Ale, Pȩlèt nê bɔ̀ ghɨ̀ nê tò mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɔ kɨà la.
Tà tsɔꞋɔ wòt wu bɔ li ntsaa atò a tèfȩ ambo ndèm nè ndɨ bɔ bùŋe wòt la sàŋ, mbɔ̂ ŋǎ a Yesò abua yɔb nê bɔ̀ ghɨ̀ ne tò mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɔ kɔ̀ŋkè la.
Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɔ lɔꞋɔ nɨa tò me ghà la, bɔ ye wòt Silenè kǒ èlen tò wu Simùn la alu̧ tà dzəa àbâ àlaꞋ a ko me kɨꞋɨ àpfəèà nɨ̧ la, mbà̧à̧ atò tà ŋèꞋe mbasa Yesò me kùŋe atò.
Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɔ̀ɔ ngà la, ènɔ̧̂ bòt e me kùŋe atò. Bèzi ko e li ngu ayɔɔ yɔb ŋȩ̀a ndɨ̀à ambo tò.
Yesò ghèble avi shu abua yɔb nê, “Bèzi Jèlusalèm, bɨ̀ ka tsi ndɨ̀ ambo yaã, bɨ̀ tsiꞋi me dɨ̀ wuê ambo yɨ̧ nè bɔ̧ bɨ̧.
Aa ale nkàà nê, àlia ko aa nkɨ̀Ꞌa bɔ̀ɔ me shu nê, ‘Ntsɔ̧̀ wu bèzi bu bɔ̀ wu bèyen, kà li tè me bi, bɔ̀ ka li tè me nyɔŋe waã la.’
Eyaa wu àfɨꞋa bɔ̀ɔ li shu abua tèbȩtsə nê, ‘Bɨ̀ kabte awa’, mè shu abua tèku̧u̧nè nê, ‘Bɨ̀ fəèəèlè awa’ la.
Bɔ wu e ghɨ̀ èwuu ànəê yaa ane àyɨt a kefi, ko bɔ̀ɔ li e ghɨ̀ na ane àyɨt ayuube à?”
Bɔ li nɨ̌ bòt mènəè kàbɔ̀ŋ ko babe, e ghǎ ebùŋè àwɔb bɔ̂ tò ba nɔ̂.
Bɔ kɨꞋɨ tê bɔ̀ dzə adzìꞋ yu bɔ̀ɔ ntɔ̀ nê, “Àghele àtsə” la, bɔ wu̧u̧te a Yesò a mbɨ̧̀ mbasa nè bòt mènəè kàbɔ̀ŋ bu, wemɔ̀Ꞌ àbâ àbualu̧ nè wekǒ àbâ àbuantoŋ atò.
Yesò nê, “Tê, waꞋa kàbɔ̀ŋ wɔb, nkàà nê bɔ bakà ko àghɨa bɔ ghɨ̀à la.” Bɔ màꞋà èbìt enɨ ghàbte ndìte tò.
Ènɔ̧̂ bòt e tɨ̧ɨ̧ me ye, bɔɔjuŋ Bèjuê e me wȩ̀ȩ̀te atò shuà nê, “Tà li ngɨ̀ bòt ko e pem, tà tɨŋe avi zìambɔŋ àfɨ̀Ꞌ yaa mɨ̧̂, na tà wu Fɔ̧̀ wu Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà yɔꞋ ntsà la.”
Bèshujà bu e me wȩ̀ȩ̀te atò mɨ̧̂, nɨ èwuu mèlùꞋ kǒ nàa nkȩ̀ta la ŋǎ abua tò.
Mbɔ̂ shu abua tò nê, “À wu Fɔ̧̀ Bèjuê à tɨ̀ŋe awê àwɔ̀ mbɔŋ.”
Bɔ ghɨ̀ ale, è shɨ èngà̧ ngù̧ù̧te àtsə atò a mbɨ̧̀ àyɨt nê, “Eyaa wu Fɔ̧̀ Bèjuê.”
Wòt kǒ ane bòt mènəè kàbɔ̀ŋ bu bɔ wu̧u̧te awɔb mɨ̧̂ la, tsɔ̧̀ a Yesò nê, “À ntsě Fɔ̧̀ wu Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà yɔꞋ ntsà la à? Tɨŋe awê, mè ntɨ̀ŋe awa.”
Wekǒ ŋȩtè wanyɨ vi nê, “Àa kà bɔɔ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà à? Bɔ tsàà àwa ba tò ba ane èvə lemɔꞋ.
È me wu awa ko ba wua ndzèa ngoꞋ ane ànəa ba ghɨ̀ la, ka mbê waa bakà ghɨ ànəa kàbɔ̀ŋ àko.”
Tà nê, “Yesò, aa li à kɨꞋɨ a èbem kèfɔ̧̀ wê, à kù̧ù̧te am.”
Yesò shu abua tò nê, “KwàꞋ ane nkûŋ tsiꞋ è shu awê nê, laane waa aa wu ba nè a palàdȩê.”
È me wu a mbɔŋe a kètsìà nèngû̧ ndzěm kwene a èbem àlaꞋ a mbɔŋ àgème, ngà ndzə ane nyèm tetat.
ÀfɨꞋa mbɔŋ ndǐ yu bɔ nɨŋ ntsòŋâ ngàbtè lob nɨ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la, saãaãnà èbà bebe.
Yesò ŋȩ ane àtɔŋ nɨ̧ nê, “Tê, ye àlɨ̀ŋkè am àyaa àbu ayê mâ zì la.” Tà shu ale, mbê mpfə.
Tǎt bèshujà wu tà wu abot la ye àghɨa a ghɨ̀ la, ŋà mèngùꞋte abua Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà shu nê, “KwàꞋ ane nkûŋ, mbê waa li tà kà ghɨ̂ ànəa kàbɔ̀ŋ.”
Bòt bu bɔ ghɨ̂ mbù̧ù̧tè abot la, e ye àghɨa a ghɨ̀ la, ntsiꞋi chuŋke ètsə bɔb a si nkwà̧à̧te èbu bɔb ngwènè àpfəè.
Bòt bàgème bɔ̀ le ko a Yesò la eghǎ dzəâ ane bèzi bu bɔ̀ le lɔ̂Ꞌ a Galìlî nkùŋè atò la, e tɨ̧ɨ̧te a endɨ̌, me ye àghɨa ngɨ̀à la.

Wòt kǒ li ngu èlen tò wu Jòsêb, tà dzəa àpfəèa Bèjuê yu bɔ̀ɔ ntɔ̀ nê Àlimàtià la. Tà li ngu wòt lob èsaꞋa mè ngu wòt ntsɔ̧̀, mènəè tò è tɨ̧ɨ̧ ndɨŋndɨ̀ŋ la. Tà li ngua nchɨ̀Ꞌà kèfɔ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nàa kɨꞋɨ. Tà li mbàte ngu wòt kǒ ane bòt saꞋa bu ale, ka tà kà bɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀nè ànəa bɔ li ngɨ̀ la.
Tà li ngà abua Pȩlèt nê tà ŋa àpfəꞋte a Yesò abua zi.
Ale, tà shùke àpfəꞋte yu, ndèbte a èbem ndǐ kèfə, mbɔ̂ ngà ndzi a èbem èsî ko bɔ̀ le tu a èbem èwu kà bɔ li mè zǐ wòt a èbem la.
Àlia mbɔŋ li ngu àli yu bɔ̀ɔ ntàŋkâ ètsəꞋ aa tsi naa wu àliapfəèa Bèjuê la.
Bèzi bu bɔ ghɨ̂ ndzə a Galìlî nkùŋè a Yesò nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ la, e ghà bɔ̂ Jòsêb ba ndze èsî lu nè ndɨ tà zìà àpfəꞋte a Yesò a èbèm la.
Ale, bɔ gha àpfəè, ntàŋke èghɨ bɔ̀ɔ nɨ kɨꞋɨ eyɔꞋɔ àpfəꞋta tò la.
Àliapfəèa yɔb yu a kɨꞋɨ̀, bɔ yètè mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ mbɨ̧te Musì te nyɨꞋte la.
È me wu a ntɔtetsɔ̌Ꞌ ane àlia mbì ane nkàb, bèzi bu e ghà àtsəasì yu, nè èghɨbə bɔ taŋkè enɨ ghǎ eyɔꞋɔ àpfəꞋta Yesò la.
Ngà me ye bɔ pà èti lu bɔ li nɨŋ nkàba ètsəê èsî lu la.
Ale, bɔ tɔɔ nyi a èbèm, ka bɔ̀ ka tsi ndzè àpfəꞋta Yesò Lefɨ̀Ꞌ.
Bɔ tɨ̧ɨ̧ abot ànəê à tsè àwɔb ane àghɨa a ghɨ̀ la, bòt ko babe e bê saꞋ a ngèt yɔb, nkwà̧aã ndìte ko tèa nkàꞋtâ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ àtaãnyèm la.
Kèbɔɔ ke baãaã awɔb, bɔ baala a si. Bèŋût e biite awɔb nê, “Ghǎ ghɨ̂ ka bɨ kɨꞋɨ̀ me kɨ wòt tà wû yû̧ la ayɔɔ bèmpfəà? [
Tà ntsě adzìꞋ yaa.] Tà yu̧u̧mè. Bɨ̀ ku̧u̧te ànəa tà li shu abua yɨ̧ àfɨꞋa bɨ tò ba e li mbele a Galìlî la,
nê, bɔ li mbɔ̌ ndɨ bɔ̀ɔ zì Waã Wòt a tèkitebu bòt kàbɔ̀ŋ, bɔɔ wu̧u̧te atò a mbɨ̧̀ mbasa, ka naa me wu ane èlibȩ betat taa yu̧u̧me la.”
Bèzi bu e ku̧u̧te mèngà̧ maa,
mbɔ̂ ndɔꞋɔ àtsəasì və, ngà shuê mènəè ngaa abua bɔkatè Yesò bu bɔ tsiꞋi ntsɔ̀b wemɔ̀Ꞌ la, nè àbəèꞋ ako yu bàgème.
Bèzi mbɔŋ li ngu Màlià Màdàlin, bɔ̂ Jòanà, nè Màlià nyɨ̌ Jimsì, ndɔ̀Ꞌ nè, bèzi ko bu bɔ̂ tò ba la, bɔ ghà shuê ànəê yaa abua bɔntu̧ Yesò la.
Ka bɔntu̧ bu e mɨ̀ɨ̀tè nê wu mèyȩ̀ȩ̀tè, ntù̧u̧ ebɨ̧ɨ̧ne ànəa bɔ shu la.
Pità bê ndɔ̀Ꞌ a si ndùùlà ngà àtsəasì yu, ndȩ̀ me ye ndzè wuê ndàꞋà ndǐ tu bɔ̀ le nɨŋ ndèbte àpfəꞋta Yesò la. Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ tàa nga àpfəè la, ànəa a ghɨ̀ la a taꞋa tsě atò.
Wuê kwàꞋ ane àlia mbɔŋ, bɔkatè Yesò ko babe, e lɔ̀Ꞌ me ghǎ àpfəè ako bɔ̀ɔ ntɔ̀ nê wu Emayùs la. Elɔ̀Ꞌɔ a Jèlusalèm eghǎ abot wu mbɔ̀ŋè lèghȩ̀ȩ̀nè bèawa babe.
Bɔɔ ngȩ̀ȩ̀nà ale, mùà mènəè ane èghɨ e tsè la.
Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɔ̀ɔ mùà ngà la, Yesò zìambɔŋ ghȩ̀ȩ̀nè tè nkɔꞋ a ngèt yɔb, bɔ̂ tò ba e me ghȩ̀ȩ̀na ngà.
Bɔ ye atò ale, ka àghɨa ko a vəèəèlè àghɨ ayɔb, bɔ̀ ka ko wòt è wû wùà la.
Yesò bììte awɔb nê, “Bɨ̀ ghȩ̀ȩ̀nà ndàꞋà ka ànəê à?”
Bɔ ntsanè màꞋà tèsȩtsə ane yɔb.
Wòt kǒ ane yɔb bɔ̀ɔ ntɔ atò nê Klìopà la biite a Yesò nê, “À wu ndàꞋ wòt ane bòt baa bàgème a Jèlusalèm kà zə ànəa a ghɨ̀ ane èli baa e tsè la à?”
Yesò mè mbììte nê, “Ka ànəê à?”

Bɔ bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê, “Ànəa a ghɨ̀ ane Yesò wu, tà wu wòt Nazàlet la. Tà lè wu ndàꞋàtɔŋ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà, mbɔ̂ bɔbȩ e li nɨa tò mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ wòt tàa ngɨ̀à mènəè kà ye fɨ̀Ꞌ ane èghɨ ègème tàa shuà mè ngɨ̀à la.
Bètǎt bèntsìà mèpɨ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà ba, nè bɔɔjuŋ ba, aà lɔ̀Ꞌ ŋǎ atò abua bòt kàbɔ̀ŋ nê bɔ̀ bùŋe atò. Bɔ wu̧u̧te atò a mbɨ̧̀ mbasa.
Ka bàambɔŋ baa wua mɨ̀ɨ̀tà nê, wu tòà Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà tsa nê tà kɨꞋɨ nchùꞋù ètsə bòt Izəèlȩê la. Laane waa wu èli betat mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ ènəê baa e ghɨ̀ la.
È ndem ntsě wuê ndàꞋ àyaa, bèzi ko ayɔɔ ya e meè ndòòte wuê mèntɨ̧ɨ̧ ma. Bɔɔ bu nga àtsəasì yu,
bɔ̀ kà ye àpfəꞋte atò yu, bɔ kua akwèn nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ shu abua ya nê, bɔ ye àtsə, bɔntu̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà e shu abua yɔb nê, Yesò yu̧u̧mè.
ÀbəèꞋ àko ane ya a ghà àtsəasì yu me ye è wu nkûŋ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bèzi bu e shu la, ka è me wu a Yesò, bɔ̀ ka ye atò.”
ÀfɨꞋa mbɔŋ Yesò shuê abua yɔb nê, “Ye bòt èyì tentem ko, bɨ taꞋa wua nkua èlɔŋ a màmbɨ̧ɨ̧na mènəè bèndàꞋàtɔŋ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà e li shuê la.
Tè bɨ bakà ko laꞋ nê Fɔ̧̀ wu Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà li ndzɔꞋ etsàà la, li mbɔ̌ ndɨ tàa ye ngoꞋ ka bɔ tseke a ègwet àtɨ̧ Kèfɔ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la à?”
Yesò ghɨ̀ ale, ngàꞋte mènəè mu bɔ̀ le shɨ a èbem àkata Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà ane zi la, è shu awɔb, e buꞋa ane àghɨa Musì lè shɨ la, eghǎ dzəâ ane ayea bèndàꞋàtɔŋ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà bàgème e li shuê la.
Bɔ kɨꞋɨ tê me dzəâ àpfəè yu bɔ wua ngà la, Yesò ghɨ̀ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ tà tsèa tsě ngà nè mbì.
Bɔ shu̧u̧te atò nê, tà ka tsi ngà nè mbì, nê tà ghɨa bɔ̂ tò ba è li nkàà nê àfɨ̀Ꞌ a ghà te nyèm ntsiꞋa fèna fene. Ale, Yesò ghà bɔ̂ tò ba aa li.
Bɔ lɔ̀Ꞌ tê bɔ̀ tseke a si Yesò nɨ a bled ŋà mènkɔ̀ŋke abua Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà, mbɔ̂ mbòꞋtê ŋa abua yɔb,
àghɨ ayɔb a ghaꞋtè, bɔ lȩ atò. AfɨꞋa mbɔŋ tà bê nyɔ̂, bɔ̀ ka tsi ndze atò.
Bɔkatè bu e tsiꞋi me làꞋa a kètsìà wɔb shuà nê, “Tà ghɨ̂ me yààte èngǎ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà alu̧ shua wa ale bɨ̀ ka ye ndɨ mèntɨ̧ɨ̧ ma è kȩa la à?”
Bɔ ghɨ̀ ale, nkȩ a si kwàꞋ àfɨꞋa mbɔŋ ngwènè a Jèlusalèm, nkwène ane bɔkatè Yesò bu bɔ tsiꞋi èghem ntsɔ̀b wemɔ̀Ꞌ la, bɔ bu̧u̧te àdzìꞋ yeamɔꞋ bɔ̂ beko la.
È bu babe la e nyî, bɔ shuê abua yɔb nê, “KwàꞋ ane nkûŋ, Yesò Lefɨ̀Ꞌ yu̧u̧mè, tà saꞋa a mbì Simùn”
Bɔ̀ɔ mbɔŋ mɨ̧̂ e shu awɔb àghɨa a yaã ngɨ alu̧ la, mè shu ndɨ bɔ yaã ndȩ a Yesò afɨꞋa tà boꞋte a bled wu la.
Bɔ̀ bela ndàꞋà, Yesò zìambɔŋ bê saꞋa a kètsìà wɔb, shu abua yɔb nê “Àlàŋkè à wu ne nɨ̧̀.”
Tà làꞋ ale, ènyit yɔb e bentè, bɔ taꞋa bɔa ntsiꞋa mɨ̀ɨ̀ta nê, bɔ ye àlɨ̀ŋka mpfəà.
Tà bììte awɔb nê, “Bɨ̀ bɔa ghà à? Bɨ̀ màka gha a mèntɨ̧ɨ̧ mɨ̧ à?
Bɨ̀ lɨ̀ŋkè tèkitebu taã nè èka bɔ̧, ndzè na wu mmɔ̌ la. Bɨ̀ baãaãte am ndze. Àlɨ̀ŋkè à bakà bɔ nyaãte ènyit, à ka bɔ èkwȩ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ mâ bɔ la.”
[Tà shuê ale, nyɨ̀Ꞌte awɔb èbu bi nè èka bi.]
Ale a bê ntsè àwɔb, mèngùꞋte lu̧u̧ a mèntɨ̧ɨ̧ mɔb, tè bɔ tsiꞋa mbɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀na ànəa tà shua la kekaŋ. Tà bììte awɔb nê, “Bɨ bɔ àghɨa ko àdzìꞋ yaa betsiꞋa wòt jɨ la à?”
Bɔ ŋa àtem asəâ bɔ laã la abua tò,
tà nɨŋ ntɨ̧ɨ̧ a mbì lɔb nkwet.

ÀfɨꞋa mbɔŋ tà shu abua yɔb nê, “Eyaa wu mènəè mu e ndi ngua shuà wɨ̧ àfɨꞋa e ndi mbèle ba nɨ̧̀ ba la, nê, àghɨ àgème bɔ shɨ ane yaã a èbem àkatè mbɨ̧te Musì, nè mènəè bèndàꞋàtɔŋ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà, nè è mu a èbem Àkata Mèkù̧ la, a bɔ ndɨ àa te la.”
Tà ghɨ̀ ale, ngàꞋte ètsə bɔb ngɨ̀ bɔ ko ànəa èngǎ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà e shuà la.
Mbɔ̂ shuê abua yɔb nê, “Eyaa àghɨa bɔ shɨ la, nê, Fɔ̧̀ wu Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà li ndzɔꞋ etsàà la è bɔ ndɨ tàa ye ngoꞋ ebɔ epfə, ka naa me wu ane èlibȩ betat taa yu̧u̧me la.
Mè nê, bòt e bɔ̂ ndɨ bɔ̀ɔ bùꞋu a Jèlusalèm e tsɔ̀te abua bòt èlaꞋ ègème, ane èlen tò, nê bòt è kubte mènəè kàbɔ̀ŋ mɔb, mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà naa waꞋa bèkàbɔ̀ŋ bɔb la.
Bɨ wu bòt bɔ ye mè nko èghɨ bàa la.
Mmɔ̌ mbɔŋ, maa tsaa èlaamè wu Tǎt am li nkàꞋ àwɨ̧ la. Ka bɨ̀ tseke a Jèlusàlem tè ndɨ bɨ̀a bɔ mètàŋ mu è chu a ègwet la.”
Yesò ghɨ̀ ale, nɨ̀ àwɔb ndzə a èbem àpfəèà nɨ̧ yu, ngà tè ngu a Betanì, ndɔ̀kè èbu bi fà̧à̧te awɔb.
Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ tàa fà̧à̧te awɔb la, tà bê ŋèꞋe avi a si me kɔꞋɔ nga ègwet.
Bɔkatè tò bu e tɨ̧ɨ̧ abot me wùꞋte atò, tè ndɔ̀Ꞌ nkua akwèn ngwènè a Jèlusalèm, nè mèngùꞋte è lu̧u̧ a mèntɨ̧ɨ̧ mɔb la.
Bɔ ghà ale me tseka nga a èbem lob nɨ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà àfɨ̀Ꞌ àgème ngùꞋtè atò.
Ngɔ̀ŋ li me bùꞋu, Èngǎ̧ wu e yaŋe wu. Èngǎ̧ mbɔŋ e li ngu bɔ̂ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nɔ̂, Èngǎ̧ wu li ngu àzi Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà.
Ngɔ̀ŋ li me bùꞋu tà wu bɔ̂ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà.
Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà li ntsè ane tò ka ngɨ̀ èghɨ ègème. Àghɨa ko a mbê ntsě bɔ ghɨ̀ ka wu tòà tà li ngɨ̀ la.
Tà wu wòt tàa ŋǎ ngule mèntsèke abua bòt, è ghɨ̀à bɔ bɔ èkaꞋà la.
ÈkaꞋa mbɔŋ aà mbèꞋa a èbem ndzěm, ka ndzěm ka ko ndììmê.
Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà li ntsàà wantu̧ vi, èlen tò wu Jɔ̌n la,
tà kɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ shu bòt àghɨa ye ko ane ànəa wòt wu tà wu èkaꞋà la, mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bòt bàgème aa zə ezǐ mèntɨ̧ɨ̧ mɔb ane ŋut.
Tòà zìambɔŋ li tà kà wu èkaꞋà ngaa ka mbɔ̂ ngua nkɨ̀Ꞌa e shu bòt wòt tà wu èkaꞋà mbɔŋ la.
Ngule èkaꞋà wu àa mbaŋe waa waa la, wu wòt wu nkɨ̀Ꞌa a sitsǎꞋ la.
Tòà wu, tà wu èngǎ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la, li ngu a sitsǎꞋ ka bòt sitsǎꞋ è ka ko atò, Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà tsè ane tò ka ngɨ̀ sitsǎꞋ.
Tà kɨꞋɨ abua bòt àlaꞋ yu è wù àyea tò la, bɔ̀ ka sèè atò.
Ka bòt bàgème bɔ sèe atò, ndzì mèntɨ̧ɨ̧ mɔb ane èlen tò la, tà ghɨ̀ àwɔb bɔ tsiꞋi bɔ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà.
Ka bɔ me wu bɔ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà ale, è kà wu wɔ̀bȩ̂ tà bi awɔb bɔ tsiꞋi àlo̧ atò la, è kà mê ngu wɔ̀bȩ̂ ka tà ghɨ̀ a wu ale la. Wu Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà zìambɔŋ ka tà ghɨ̀à wɔb bɔ tsiꞋi bɔ̧ tò la.

Èngǎ̧ wu e li ntsìꞋi wɔ̀bȩ̂, nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ ntsèke ayɔɔ bòt, me nyɨꞋte èwuu ntsɔ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà bɔ ane bòt la, mè nyɨ̀Ꞌta nkûŋ ane àghɨa Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà wû yùà la. Ba ye ènɨ̧ tò. Eyaa wu ènɨ̧ wu Tǎt tò Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà li ŋǎ abua tò mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ ngule waã tà dzə abua tò la.

Jɔ̌n lɔ̀Ꞌ shuê ànəa ye ye, mè nko ane tò la. Tà li ŋȩ nê, “Eyaa tòà wu e ndi ngua shuà, àfɨꞋa e ndi nê, ‘Wòt nkɨ̀Ꞌa akwene yaã la è tsè am, nkàà nê tà li ndzaŋe wu ka bɔɔ li e bi am la’.”
Tà kɨꞋɨ ale me kɔ̀ŋkè bòt nyaŋ ngɨ̀à ba bɔ mèngùꞋte mu è dzə abua Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la a ngo̧ a ngò̧.
È wu nè ànəê mbɨ̧te Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà ko Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà li ndzi a tèkitebu Musì ka tà ŋǎ abua bɔbȩ, è me wu èkɔŋ nè nkûŋ, ta tsaa a Yesò Klistò ka tà kɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ nyɨ̀Ꞌte awa.
Wòt kǒ tà li mè yea Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la ntsě. Wu ndàꞋà tòà wu tà wu àzi Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà mè ngu a ngèt Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la ka tà ghɨ̂ bòt e ko atò la.
È li ngu àfɨ̀Ꞌ àko, bɔɔjuŋ Bèjuê a Jèlusalèm e tsàà bèntsìà mèpɨ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà, nè bòt àndǎ̧ Levì nê, bɔ̀ kɨꞋɨ mbììte a Jɔ̌n nê tà wu wà leꞋ.
Bɔ biite ale Jɔ̌n ka tu̧ làꞋa, tà bê ntsɔ̀Ꞌte shu awɔb nê, ye ntsě Fɔ̧̀ wu Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà li ndzɔꞋ etsàà la.
Tà làꞋ ale, bɔ mè mbììte nê, “Tè à wu wàà? À wu Èlȩjà?”
Jɔ̌n bɨ̀ɨ̀lè èngǎ̧ wɔb nê, “ÀwɔꞋ e ntsě tòà.”
Bɔ mè mbììte atò nê, “Tè à wu ndàꞋàtɔŋ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà wu bɔ̀ɔ nchɨ̀Ꞌà la à?”
Tà nê “ÀwɔꞋ.”
Bɔ mè nê, “Ale shua wa wòt à wu wùà la, mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ baa ghǎ ko eŋa àbɨ̀t abua bòt bu bɔ yaã ntsàà àwa la. Tè à wu wàà?”
Tà bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê, “E ngu àtɔŋ wòt kǒ ŋȩ̀a a èbem àbâ àlaꞋ àyuube shua nê bɨ̀ nèète alu̧ Lefɨ̀Ꞌ è tɨ̧ɨ̧ ndɨŋndɨ̀ŋ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ ndàꞋàtɔŋ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà, Àsayà li shu la.”
Bòt bu bɔ li ntsàà bɔntu̧ baa la li ngu Bèfalèsiì.
Bɔ mè mbììte a Jɔ̌n nê, “À bakà wu Fɔ̧̀ wu Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà li ndzɔꞋ etsàà la, mbakà wu Èlȩjà mè mbakà wu ndàꞋàtɔŋ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà, ghǎ a ghɨ̀ ka à me zǐ bòt a èdzî à?”
Jɔ̌n tsɔꞋɔ èngǎ̧ wɔb nê “Maà ndzìà bòt a èdzî, ka wòt kǒ nàà və tà tɨ̧ɨ̧ a kètsìà wɨ̧ ka bɨ̀ ka zîꞋ nko wòt tà wû wùà la.
Tà wu wòt wu nkɨ̀Ꞌa akwene yaã la. E mbakà lem nkùꞋ wòt tàa yàa mèliꞋ gubte tò la.”
Èghɨ baa ègème e li ngɨ a Betanì, agua èdzî Jodàn, adzìꞋ yu Jɔ̌n li ngua ndzìà bòt a èdzî la.
ÈtsəꞋ e tsi Jɔ̌n ye a Yesò nkɨ̀Ꞌa ekwene ane tò la, nê “Bɨ̀ ye Wanjɨ̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà wu tàa tsì mènəè kàbɔ̀ŋ bòt ngɔ̀ŋ la.
Eyaa wu tòà wu e ndi shu nê, wòt kǒ nàà kɨꞋɨ akwene yaã tà tsè am la, nkàà nê bɔ li me bi am tà yaŋe wu la.
E ndi me làꞋ ale, è nka ko atò mɨ̧̂, mbɔ̂ me kɨꞋɨ ezǐ bòt Izəèlȩê a èdzî ale ngua nkɨà mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɔɔ ko wòt tà wu wùà la.”
Jɔ̌n làꞋ ndɨ ye li ndze la nê, “E ndi ndzě Fo Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà e chu a ègwet mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ baba ntɨ̧ɨ̧ ane tò la.

E ndi e nka lem nko atò, tè Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà wu tà ntsàà am nê è nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ ndzì bòt a èdzî la shu abua am nê, ‘Wòt à ye Fo Kèfə èchua ègwet ntɨ̧ɨ̧ ane tò la, à ko nê wu tòà wu tàa tsiꞋi me ŋa bòt Fo Kèfə la’.
Mâ ye, mè me kɨ e shu awɨ̧ nê eyaa wu Waã Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà.”
ÈtsəꞋ e li ntsi, Jɔ̌n mè ntɨ̧ɨ̧ abot, bɔ̂ bɔkatè bi babe,
ndzě a Yesò ngȩ̀ȩ̀nà ntsèà la nê, “Bɨ̀ ye Wanjɨ̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà.”
Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɔkatè tò bu babe e zə ànəa mbɔŋ la, bɔ bê sa atò nkuŋa Yesò.
Yesò ghèble avi, ndzèà wɔb nkùŋà vi la, mbììte awɔb nê, Bɨ̀ kɨa ghàà? Bɔ bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê, “Labȩ̀”, (ngua shua nê, nyɨꞋtà) “Àa ntsèka nèŋàà?”
Tà nê, “Bɨ̀ kɨꞋɨ ndze.”
Ale, bɔ gha bɔ̂ tò ba, ndzè àdziꞋa tàa ntsèka la. È li me wu àfɨ̀Ꞌ yaa è tsìꞋa ngà mbɔ̀ŋè nyèm tekwì àfɨꞋa nèngû̧, ale bɔ ghà mpàâ àliabȩ a mbɔŋ ntsèke bɔ̂ tò ba.
Wòt kǒ ane bɔkatè bu babe tà li nkuŋa Yesò, àfɨꞋa tà zə ndɨ Jɔ̌n làꞋà la, li ngu Andùlù wanyɨ Simùn wu èlen tò ko wu Pità la.
Ale, tà bê ngà nkɨ wanyɨ vi Simùn shu abua tò nê, “Ba yea Klistò,
Tà nɨa Simùn nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ abua Yesò.
Yesò lɔ̀kè àvi ndzě atò nê, “Bɔɔ ntɔ awê ane Simùn waã Jɔ̌n. Èlen lê aa tsiꞋi Sefàs.” (Sefàs wua shua nê Pità. Lə Pità è wu èwu.)
ÈtsəꞋ e tsi Yesò me taŋke eghǎ a Galìlî, ndzě wòt kǒ èlen tò wu Filìb la shu abua tò nê “KɨꞋɨ nkùŋè am.”
Filìb li ndzə a Bèsedà, è wu àpfəè yu Andùlù bɔ̂ Pità e dzəè la.

Filìb ghà ndzea Nàtanìà shu abua tò nê, “Ba ye wòt wu Musì li shɨ ànəa tò a èbem àkatè mbɨ̧tsə la, ye wu bèndàꞋàtɔŋ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà è lè shɨ ayɔb mɨ̧̂ la. Tà wu Yesò, waã Jòsêb, wòt Nazàlet.”
Nàtanìà bììte atò nê. “Tè betsiꞋa ngule àghɨa ntsɔ̧̀ àko a dzə a Nazàlet?”
Filìb shu abua tò nê, “KɨꞋɨ ngà ndze àwɔ̀ mbɔŋ.”
ÀfɨꞋa Yesò yea Nàtanìà nkɨ̀Ꞌa la, tà nê, “Bɨ̀ ye ngule wòt Izəèlȩê, kà ye ànəa fɨte ane zi!”
Nàtanìà bììte atò nê “À ghɨ̀ na ka nko am à?”
Yesò bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê, “Filìb yaã me laꞋ nê yea ntɔ awê àfɨ̀Ꞌ yu à wu a èten àyɨt a fik la ale, e ndzaŋe ye awê.”
Nàtanìà nê, “NyɨꞋtà, à wu Waã Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà! À wu Fɔ̧̀ bòt Izəèlȩê!”
Yesò bɨ̀ɨ̀lè nê, “Tè à bê mbɨ̧̀ɨ̧̀na ànəê yaa na mâ laꞋnê mâ yaã ndzè àwê a èten àyɨt a fik la à? À bèle taꞋa eye èghɨ e tsè è baa la!”
Yesò mè shu abua tò nê “TsiꞋ è shua wê ane nkûŋ nê, àa ye ègwet e ghaꞋa bɔntu̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà e me ghȩ̀ȩ̀na nchua ndzea Waã Wòt mè nkɔ̀Ꞌa ngà la.”
Èlibȩ e li ntsè bebe, èpǎ̧ ndzɔꞋɔ ko e wu a Kanà a èbem àlaꞋ a Galìlî. Nyɨ̌ Yesò wu abot,
bɔ mè nkaꞋa Yesò bɔ̂ bɔkatè bi a èpǎ̧ ndzɔꞋɔ mbɔŋ mɨ̧̂.
MèlùꞋ tseke tè mì, nyɨ̌ Yesò shu abua tò nê, “Ko nê mèlùꞋ è mî.”
Yesò shu abua tò nê, “Mê à ka shu am àghɨa màa ghɨ̀ la, nkàà nê àfɨ̀Ꞌ am a bakà zìꞋ nkùꞋ.”
Nyɨ̌ tò shu abua bòt bu ngàbtà èghɨ abot la nê, “Bɨ̀ ghɨ̌ àghɨa àgème tà shu nê bɨ̀ ghɨa la.”

Bɔɔ ndàꞋà ale èliba ko yentuà e wu abot bɔ ghɨ ane àti la. Bèjuê e li ngua ndzìà mèleb a èbem èliba yàa nɨa shùà ènyit mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ ekùꞋu e mbì Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà. Àliba yeamɔꞋ a me nɨ bègalon mèleb mbɔ̀ŋè èghem yebe kò yetat leꞋ.
Yesò tsèkê tè shu abua bòt bu ngàbtà èghɨ la nê “Bɨ̀ lu̧u̧ne èliba yàa nè mèleb.” Ale, bɔ lu̧u̧ne èliba mbɔŋ nè mèleb tè è kɔꞋ ndzəa ètsəê.
Tà mè shu abua yɔb nê bɔ̀ tuꞋte me kǒ ngà ŋǎ abua wòt wu tà wua àtsəa bòt bu bɔ̀ɔ ngàbtà èghɨ la.
Bɔ ghɨ̀ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ tà shu la.
