Lob nɨ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà yu mè ndù̧u̧ ne ndiꞋ è dzə ane ènɨ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nè mètàŋ tò la. Wòt li tà kà wu eko nyi a èbem lob nɨ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà yu kà èbɨꞋte ngoꞋ tu tesà̧à̧mbe bɔntu̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà bu basà̧à̧mbe be nɨŋ nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ la, te tsè.

ÀfɨꞋa mbɔŋ e me zə àtɔŋ ko a me ŋȩ a èbem lob nɨ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà yu shua abua bɔntu̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà bu basà̧à̧mbe la nê, “Bɨ̀ ghǎ nɨ tèpfəꞋ tu tesà̧à̧mbe nè ntsǒ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà a tèbèm la ntsəè a sitsǎꞋ.”

A làꞋà ale wantu̧ mbì ghà ntsəè è li ne èpfəèꞋ a sitsǎꞋ. Tà tsəè ale, fɨŋtsə te bê ntu ane bòt bu bɔ bɔ àlȩê a nyà̧mɔ̀Ꞌ yu, mè me wùꞋte a wamâlem tò wu la. Fɨŋ te mbɔŋ te taꞋa wua sàa.
We babe ane bɔntu̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà bu tsəè è li ne èpfəèꞋ a èbem *èdzî. Tà tsəè ale, mèleb mu gheblè ntsìꞋi mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ àlo̧ a mpfəà. Àghɨa yu̧ àgème àa a èbem mèleb mbɔŋ la a pfə.
We betat ane bɔntu̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà bu tsəè è li ne èpfəèꞋ a èbem mèdzî nè badzì bàgème, be gheblè ntsìꞋi àlo̧ mɨ̧̂.
E me zə wantu̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà wu àtsəa àfàꞋ atò wu màndȩa mèleb la nê,
“Àwɔ̀ wu à wuê ndàꞋà Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la,
Àwɔ̀ wu àa və mè ndzaŋe wu tea mèmbùꞋu la,
Àà saꞋa mènəè mê wuê ndɨŋndɨ̀ŋ.
Bòt baa e li mbùŋè bòt bê
nè bèndàꞋàtɔŋ bê,
à ŋa àlo̧ bɔ nu.
Bɔ wua ndzèa ngoꞋ è kùꞋu
ane àfàꞋ àyɔb la.”
AfɨꞋa mbɔŋ e ndzə àtɔŋ ko a dzəâ adzìꞋ yu bɔ̀ɔ ntò̧à banyà̧ adù̧ ŋa abua Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la a nê,
“Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà Lefɨ̀Ꞌ Àtsèàngɔ̀ŋ leꞋ,
A wu wòt nkûŋ mè me
saꞋa mènəè mê wuê ndɨŋndɨ̀ŋ!”
We bakwì ane bɔntu̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà bu tsəè è li ne èpfəèꞋ ntsǒ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà adù̧ àtaãnyèm, ngɨ̀ a me tò̧ò̧te bòt mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ èwet.

Àtaãnyèm yu a tò̧ò̧tè àwɔb ale, bɔ tsiꞋi me tsàà tèntsɔ̧̀ɔ̧̀mètsə adù̧ èlen Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà wu tà bɔ mètàŋ a ègwet ngoꞋte mbɔŋ la. Ngɨ̀ ale ntu̧ kubte ane mènəè kàbɔ̀ŋ mɔb e ŋa mèngùꞋte abua Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà.

ÀfɨꞋa mbɔŋ we betà̧â̧ ane bɔntu̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà bu tsəè è li ne èpfəèꞋ adù̧ àtɨ̧a kèfɔ̧̀ nyà̧mɔ̀Ꞌ yu. KèbìꞋà bê nkwen a èbem kèfɔ̧̀ mbɔŋ, bòt e me kwele tèlɨ̧ tɔb nkàà ndɨ àa saa awɔb kwàꞋ ànyaꞋne la.
Bɔ me tsàà tèntsɔ̧̀ɔ̧̀mètsə adù̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà wu a ègwet la, nkàà ngoꞋ tɔb nè fɨŋ tu ane yɔb la. Ngɨ̀ ale bɔ̀ ka bɨ̧ɨ̧ne ekubte ane mènəè kàbɔ̀ŋ mɔb.

We bantùa ane bɔntu̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà bu tsəè è li ne èpfəèꞋ a èbem èdzî wu bɔ̀ɔ ntɔ ane Yuflètìs la. Èdzî wu e yu̧ nenkèm, mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bèfɔ̧̀ bu be dzəâ àbâ yu nyèm nàa saꞋa la aa ko etu̧ èdzî wu.
E me ye fote kàbɔ̀ŋ ko tetat tè nɔ̀ŋkè mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ èghɔɔbe la, te me dzəâ a ètsəê dlagɔ̀n wu, nè ètsəê nyà̧mɔ̀Ꞌ yu, mè nè ètsəê bèndàꞋàtɔŋ fɨte bu.
Fo tàa wu bɔntu̧ Satàn, mbɔ̀ mètàŋ a màngɨa ènəê kà ye àfəa, ngà abua bèfɔ̧̀ sitsǎꞋ bàgème e fèta wɔb bɔɔ taŋke enû a Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà Àtsèàngɔ̀ŋ ane àlia nɨ̧ yu tàa nyɨꞋte ntsǒ zi la.
“Bɨ̀ yute, maa kɨꞋɨ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ tsɔŋ. Ntsɔ̧̀ wu wòt wu tà tseke àtatsi me lȩ, nɔ̀ŋè ndǐ ti a ngèt zi mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ ye ghà kà kwaãaã ndǐ me bɔ àtsəa kɔꞋɔ la.”
Fo tu te ghɨ̀ ale, fete bèfɔ̧̀ bu àdziꞋa ko bɔɔ ntɔ ane ndɨ̧ Ebùlù nê Àmagedòn la.
We basà̧à̧mbe ane bɔntu̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà bu tsəè è li ne èpfəèꞋ a èbem fo. TaꞋà àtɔŋ ko a dzə a ègwet àtɨ̧a kèfɔ̧̀ a Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà a èbem lob nɨ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nê, “A mî!”
MèkàꞋà me kàꞋa, èfâŋ e mè gwet, sitsǎꞋ mè nyìꞋnè kwàꞋ ànyaꞋne. SitsǎꞋ bakà li mè nyìꞋne a èlɨ mbɔŋ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà li ngɨ̀ wɔ̀bȩ̂ la. MènyiꞋi sitsǎꞋ mbɔŋ li mbê ngɨ̀Ꞌnê.

TaꞋà àpfəèà nɨ̧ yu a li ngàbtè ane èbâ betat, èpfəè nɨ̧ a ngɔ̀ŋ ègème e kwèà. Ale, Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà kù̧ù̧te àpfəèà nɨ̧ yu bɔ̀ɔ ntɔ ane Babilɔ̀n la, ngɨ̀ ntsǒ zi nɔ̀ŋke a ègwet a yùà tè ngà ndìà. Ntsǒ mbɔŋ wu mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ ndɔŋ mèlùꞋ nàa ndìà, bɔ̀ɔ ŋɨꞋɨ wòt tàa nu la.
ÈdziꞋ si èyuube ègème a èbem èdzî e bê nyɔ̂, bɔ̀ ka tsi ndzè tèbȩtsə.
TaꞋà èwèt ko e chu nkwènte ègwet bɔbȩ. Kèmbèm èwèt kemɔꞋ ke me lèlè mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ mbe sìmen. NgoꞋ mbɔŋ li mbê nge tê bòt e tsiꞋa ntsàà tèntsɔ̧̀ɔ̧̀mètsə adù̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà.

ÀfɨꞋa mbɔŋ wekǒ ane bɔntu̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà bu basà̧à̧mbe bɔ li mbɔ̀ tèpfəèꞋ tu tesà̧à̧mbȩ la kɨꞋɨ̀ shu abua am nê, “KɨꞋɨ è nyɨꞋte awê ngoꞋ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nàa nɔ̀ŋe àtsəa àghɨꞋna ghȩ̀ȩ̀nè ghȩ̀ȩ̀nè wu, è wù taꞋa àpfəèà nɨ̧ yu a nget mèdzî nyaŋ la.
Bèfɔ̧̀ sitsǎꞋ e paꞋte atò, bòt bàgème a sitsǎꞋ e mè mbe mèlùꞋ àbɨ̧ atò yu tàa mpàꞋta la.”

Fo Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà kɨꞋɨ ane yaã, wantu̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà wu ŋeꞋe am nɨŋ ngà àbâ àlaꞋ àyuube, e ndze àvi kǒ tà tseke a ègwet nyà̧mɔ̀Ꞌ kǒ mèmbaŋ la. Bɔ shɨ tèlente tèa ntsɔ̧̀ɔ̧̀tà a Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la a èdziꞋ ègème a mbɨ̧̀ tò. Tà bɔ ètsə besà̧à̧mbe nè ndɔŋtsə èghem.
Àvi mbɔŋ kwaãaã ndìte membaŋ tèa mbɔ̀ la, mè nɨ èghɨ nyànga nɨŋ ngwèè àvi. Mbèà ndɔŋ bɔ ghɨ ane goêl la àbu azi. Ndɔŋ mbɔŋ lu̧u̧ nê èbɨꞋte èghɨ e dzəê ane àbɨ̧ yu tàa mpàꞋta la.
Bɔ shɨ èlen a èsi tò e bɔ lə ndò̧ la nê,
“TaꞋà àpfəèà nɨ̧ a Babilɔ̀n,
nyɨ̌ bèghȩ̀ȩ̀nè ghȩȩne,
nè èbɨꞋte èghɨ ègème àa ngɔ̀ŋ la.”
E mè me ye àvi ngaa be àlo̧ a bòt Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà tà nu la, nè àyea bòt bu bɔ bùŋè àwɔb nkàà ndɨ bɔ̀ɔ ndàꞋà èngǎ̧ Yesò la.
Mâ ye atò ale a taꞋa tsè am.
Ka wantu̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà wu biite am nê, “Ànəa mbɔŋ a ghɨ̀ na ka me tsè àwê à? Maa shu àwê lə ànəê ndò̧ ane àvi wu, nè nyà̧mɔ̀Ꞌ yu è ŋeꞋe atò mbɔ̀ ètsə besà̧à̧mbe nè ndɔŋtsə èghem la.

Nyà̧mɔ̀Ꞌ mbɔŋ à li ndze la li ndzaã ngu yu̧, ka nè àfɨ̀Ꞌ yaa tà te ntsě yu̧. È bele nyaŋe edzəâ a èbem ebɨ lu kà ye ndìa la, eghǎ bɔɔ bùŋè atò. AfɨꞋa bòt sitsǎꞋ bu bɔ̀ le kaꞋa shɨ tèlen tɔb a èbem àkata mèmpème a mèmbùꞋu ngɔ̀ŋ la àa ye nyà̧mɔ̀Ꞌ yu la, aa taꞋa tsè àwɔb, nkàà nê tà li ndzaã ngu yu̧, ka nè àfɨ̀Ꞌ yaa tà kà tsi ngu yu̧, mbɔ̂ ngu è li e mě kɨꞋɨ.
“Wòt bɔ ndɨ tàa bɔ èyì ka ko ànəê yaa la. Ètsə bu besà̧à̧mbe la e wua nyɨ̀Ꞌta tèbȩtsə tesà̧à̧mbe àvi wu è tseke adù̧ la.
E mè ngua nyɨ̀Ꞌta bèfɔ̧̀ basà̧à̧mbe. È be batà̧â̧ be te ntse bèfɔ̧̀, wemɔ̀Ꞌ bɔ̂ mbèle a ègwet atɨ̧, wekǒ ka ziꞋì nkɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂. Tà kɨ̀Ꞌa ka wu tseke a ègwet atɨ̧ ane àfɨ̀Ꞌ à seè.

È me wu nyà̧mɔ̀Ꞌ yu è li ndzaã ngu yu̧, ka è kà tsi ngu yu̧ la, ko wu we bafà̧aã ane bèfɔ̧̀ bu, mbɔ̂ ngu ayɔɔ bèfɔ̧̀ bu basà̧à̧mbe la, mbɔ̂ ngu ghǎ adzìꞋa bɔ̀ɔ bùŋè atò àyea tò aa mì la.
“Ndɔŋ tu èghem à li ndze la, wu bèfɔ̧̀ èghem bɔ̀ baka zìꞋì nɨ àtɨ̧a kèfɔ̧̀ àyɔb la. Ka bɔ̀ɔ ŋa awɔb mètàŋ bɔ̀ɔ me baãaã èlaꞋ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bèfɔ̧̀ bɔ̂ nyà̧mɔ̀Ꞌ ba yu ane nyèm yemɔ̀Ꞌ.
Bɔ̀ɔ wàa èghem la e wu ane ètsəê wemɔꞋ mè ŋa mètàŋ mɔb nè lèfɔ̧̀ wɔb abua nyà̧mɔ̀Ꞌ yu.

Bɔɔ nù èbet nè Wanjɨ̀ wu, ka Wanjɨ̀ wu bɔ̂ ngu tsè àwɔb, nkàà nê tà wu Tǎt bètǎt bàgème mè ngu Fɔ̧̀ bèfɔ̧̀ bàgème. Bòt tò bu tà làà àwɔb bɔ mèe me kùŋe atò nè èntɨ̧ɨ̧ wɔb wemɔꞋ la aa li wu bɔ̂ tò ba nɔ̂.”
Wantu̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà wu mè shu abua am nê, “Mèleb mu à li ndze ghȩ̀ȩ̀nè ghȩȩne wu tseke adù̧ la wua nyɨ̀Ꞌta èlaꞋ nyaŋ nè bòt nyaŋ bɔ̀ɔ ndàꞋà ndɨ̧tsə tsa tsa la, mè nè èndà̧ nyaŋ.

Ndɔŋ tu èghem à li ndze la, nè nyà̧mɔ̀Ꞌ yu, aa me pààbe a ghȩ̀ȩ̀nè ghȩȩne wu. Bɔ̀ɔ̀ba wàa aa nɨ èghɨ tà bɔ la ègème tè tàa tsiꞋi tseke ka kwaãaã ndǐ, e kwele nyaãte tò e mě tô̧ atò a èbem èwet.
Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà zi a mèntɨ̧ɨ̧ mɔb nê bɔ ghɨ̀ wuê àghɨa yèa nkɨ̀a nê à wu la, ngu ane ètsəê wemɔꞋ, ŋa lèfɔ̧̀ wɔb abua nyà̧mɔ̀Ꞌ yu, mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ àghɨ àgème aa ghɨ̀ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ ye li shu nê aa wu la.
Àvi wu à li ndze la, è wu taꞋa àpfəèà nɨ̧ yu a bɔ mètàŋ a ègwet bèfɔ̧̀ sitsǎꞋ bàgème la.”
Àyaa a tsè ale, e mè ndze wantu̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà kǒ nchua a ègwet la. Tà bɔ̀ mètàŋ kèkweelè, èkaꞋà tò e ghɨ̀ sitsǎꞋ fəə kwàꞋ ànyaꞋne.
Tà ŋȩ ane taꞋa àtɔŋ nɨ̧ nê,
“A kwen,
TaꞋà àpfəèà nɨ̧ a Babilɔ̀n yu a kwen.
È tsiꞋi àpfəa fote kàbɔ̀ŋ.
Tèwuute èbɨꞋte fotekàbɔ̀ŋ tègème te dzəâ abua Satàn la,
teà ntsèka abot.
Tèwuute banɨ̧̀ kàbɔ̀ŋ bàgème bòt aa mpààbà la,
be mè me bù̧ù̧te abot.
Tà ŋa mèlùꞋ àfàꞋa mànjɨa àbȩ,
tè bòt sitsǎꞋ e nu mbe,
bèfɔ̧̀ sitsǎꞋ e mè mpàꞋte atò.
Bòt tèwen e mè ntsìꞋi bòt èkab
nkàà èghɨ bu tàa nəèꞋa vi a èbèm la.”
E mè ndzəè àtɔŋ ko a ègwet a me shu nê,
“Bòt bɔ̧, bɨ̀ dzəa a èbem àpfəèà nɨ̧ yu,
mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɨ fɔtè atò me ghɨa kàbɔ̀ŋ,
mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɨ ye ngoꞋ yu nàa kɨꞋɨ ane tò la.
Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà ku̧u̧tè a kàbɔ̀ŋ tò,
nkàà nê bê bɔ̧ɔ̧ tê nkɔꞋ ngà ndzə a ègwet.
Bɨ̀ ghɨ àghɨa tà ghɨ ane bòt ko la ane tò mɨ̧̂.
Bɨ̀ ghɨa tà ye ngoꞋ tà ghɨ̂ bòt ko e ye la ngò̧ tebe.
Bɨ̀ nɨ ndɔŋ yu tà nɨŋ ndzì mèlùꞋ ŋa bòt e nu la,
ndzì mèlùꞋ kèkweelè
è tse me tò mu la ngò̧ tebe ŋa tà nu.
Bɨ̀ ŋa tò ngoꞋ mè ngɨ̀ tà me tseke
ane tèsȩ tè è wu mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ ènɨ̧
nè èghɨ bu tàa ntòòlà àvi a èbèm la.
Bɨ̀ ghɨ̀à ale ndɨ̀ wu
tàa ngù̧a nkùꞋ zi è shua nê,
ye tseke mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ fɔ̧̀ àvi,
yè ka wu nempfə,
yè ka meè ngu li lɔꞋɔ edɨ̀ mèsi la.
Eyaa bê ngu ndɨ ngoꞋ kèkeelè
nàà kwene a ègwet tò àli yeamɔꞋ la.
NgoꞋ mbɔŋ nàa ghɨ̌ àghɔ̧ aa baãaã atò,
tàa tseke ane tèsȩ,
ndzìtsə tea me kua tò,
èwet aa mě tô̧ atò.
Tàa li ye ngoꞋ nkàà nê
wu Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà Lefɨ̀Ꞌ wu tà bɔ mètàŋ la
ka tà saꞋa atò la.”
Bèfɔ̧̀ sitsǎꞋ bu bɔ li ngua nɔ̀ŋkà nè tò mè ntòòlà àwɔb a èbem èghɨ bɔ̂ tò ba la, aa me shùà mèsi àfɨꞋa bɔ̀ɔ ye ndiꞋ àpfəèà mbɔŋ bɔ tò̧ la nkɔ̀Ꞌɔ nga a ègwet la.
Bɔɔ etɨ̧ɨ̧ a endɨ̌ nè kèbɔɔ ngoꞋ kèkweelè yu è baãaã atò la e me shu nê,
“Èe e! Èe e! TaꞋà àpfəa yu,
TaꞋà àwɔ̀ àpfəèà nɨ̧a Babilɔ̀n yaa à ghɨꞋne la,
bɔ bê nɨ wuê nyèm yemɔ̀Ꞌ ndììme awê.”
Bòt tèwen a sitsǎꞋ e me dɨa atò shùà mèsi, nkàà nê wòt tàa mě yu̧ èghɨ èwen bɔb la te ntsě.

Wu èghɨ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ goêl nè silbà, nè èghɨ ngwȩ̀, nè ndìte èkab te bɔ bèkolɔ̀ tsa tsa la, ndìte membaŋ nè tèwuute èyɨt e bɔ èghaa tsa tsa la, nè èghɨ bɔ nɨ àsɔŋ èso̧ ngɨ̀ la, nè èghɨ ègème bɔ nɨ èyɨt àà ntsòa ètsəê la ngɨ̀ la, mè nè èghɨ bɔ nɨ ngule ètɨ̧ɨ̧na nè ngule àti ngɨ̀ la.

Nè èghɨ e bɔ èghaa ntsɔ̧̀ la, mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ àyɨt ko bɔ̀ɔ ntɔ ane sinamɔ̀n la, nè tènùꞋatsə, nè mèwet kǒ bɔ̀ɔ nto̧a la, nè məə, nè èwuu èlȩê ko, nè mèlùꞋ nè mèwet, nè flawà ntsɔ̧̀ nè èwuu ntsəètè ko nè mpɔ̀ŋtsə nè njɨ̀tsə, nè bèloà, nè bèmatùà ko bèloà àa səèà la, ndɔ̀Ꞌ nè èbùꞋ, è wu bɔbȩ la.
Bòt tèwen bu e shu abua tò nê, “Èghɨ bu ègème à zi èntɨ̧ɨ̧ wê adù̧ la e te ntsě, èghɨ bu à li ngua nəèꞋà àwê a èbèm la, e ghà tè à ka wu li tsi ye bùà.”
Bòt tèwen bu bɔ li ngua nta èwen bɔ̂ tò ba tè ntsìꞋi bòt èkab la, aa tɨ̧ɨ̧ a èndɨ̌ bɔ̀ɔ mbɔ̀ɔ ngoꞋ yu ndzea tò la. Bɔɔ me dɨ̀a shùà mèsi shua nê,
“Èe e! Èe e! A bɨa àpfəèà nɨ̧ yu ɔɔ̀!
Àpfəèa nɨ̧ yu a li ngwèà àvi
mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ àvi nè ngule ndìte kèfə,
nè ète membaŋ, nè èghɨ bɔ ghɨ ane goêl,
nè àti àa nkàꞋtà la, ndɔ̀Ꞌ nè pel, è wu èghɨ ngwȩ̀ la.
Èghɨ tò bu ègème e bê mbɨ̌ ane nyèm yemɔ̀Ꞌ.”
Bòt bu àtsə ènkànuꞋ la, nè bòt bu ngȩ̀ȩ̀nà a èbem ènkànuꞋ la, mè nè bòt bu àfàꞋ àyɔb à wu a èbem *èdzî la, e tɨ̧ɨ̧tè a endɨ̌ mɨ̧̂,
me ŋȩ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ àpfəèà nɨ̧ yu àa shɨa ndiꞋtsə te kɔꞋɔ ngà a ègwet la. Bɔ li ngua ŋȩa shua nê, “Àpfəè àko a te bakà wu mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ àpfəèà nɨ̧ yàa.”
Bɔ ghɨ̀ ale, me pfəèꞋə àbeb a ètsə bɔb ndɨ̀à shùà mèsi ŋȩ̀a shua nê,
“Èe e! Èe e! A bɨa àpfəèà nɨ̧ yu ɔɔ̀!
Àpfəèa mbɔŋ a li ngɨ̀
bòt bɔ bɔ taꞋa ènkànuꞋ
àa ngȩȩna a èbem *èdzî la,
e tsiꞋi bòt èkab nkàà èghɨ tò.
Èghɨ bu ègème e bê ntɨ̧ɨ̧ ane nyèm yemɔ̀Ꞌ mbɨ.
Ègwet, wùꞋtè àwê nkàà ndɨ tà kwen la.
Bòt Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nè bɔntu̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà,
nè bèndàꞋàtɔŋ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà leꞋ,
bɨ̀ wùꞋtè àwɨ̧, Babilɔ̀n è kwen.
Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nɔ̀ŋe ngoꞋ a ègwet tò
nkàà àghɨa tà li ngɨ̀ ane yɨ̧ la.”
ÀfɨꞋa mbɔŋ àghɨꞋna wantu̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà kǒ a vi èti ko àa mbɨꞋɨ̀ taꞋa èti màngɔꞋɔ èghɨ la, màꞋa a èbem *èdzî me shu nê,
“Eyaa wu ndɨ bɔ̀ɔ màꞋa
àpfəèà nɨ̧ a Babilɔ̀n a si ane ètɨ̧̂,
tè wòt kà wu li tsi e ye yùà la.
Àtɔŋ bèlèkɨŋ, nè bènduꞋa àben,
nè bòt màntɔ bafɨ̀,
mè nè èbe màntɔ tèsɔnkendɨk,
è ka li tsi ŋwȩ a èbem àpfəa mbɔŋ a.
Bɔ̀ kà li tsi ye ka wuê wòt wemɔ̀Ꞌ
ane bòt bɔ̀ɔ nkɔ̧̀a èghɨ
kò mbàꞋa èghɨ la abot a.
Bɔ̀ ka meè ngu tsi e zə ndɨ èti
màngɔꞋɔ èghɨ àa ndàꞋà la.
ÈkaꞋà è ka li tsi e beꞋe abot a,
bɔ̀ ka wu tsi e li zə àtɔŋ ndzà bɔ̂ lu̧ vi.
Bòt bɔ li ngua nta èwen bɨ tò ba la
li ngu bòt kekweelè a sitsǎꞋ,
à mè nɨ tèkàŋ tê nɨŋ
fɨ̀te bòt ngɔ̀ŋ bàgème.
Àlo̧ a bèndàꞋàtɔŋ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà,
nè àyea bòt Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà,
ndɔ̀Ꞌ nè àyea waa waa bɔ li mbùŋe a sitsǎꞋ la,
à le wu a èbem àpfəèa mbɔŋ.”
Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ àyaa a tsè la, e ndzə àghɨa ko a nɔ̀ŋkè mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ àtɔŋ ènɔ̧̂ bòt a ègwet, ŋȩ̀a shua nê,
“Alèluyà!
Mèmpème nè ènɨ̧ nè mètàŋ
wu abua Tǎt wa Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà.
Tà wu wòt nkûŋ,
mè me saꞋa mènəè wuê ndɨŋndɨ̀ŋ.
Tà saꞋa àghɨꞋna ghȩ̀ȩ̀nè ghȩȩne wu
ane àbɨ̧ tà nɨŋ ndiꞋi ngɔ̀ŋ la.
Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nɔ̀ŋe ngoꞋ àtsə atò
nkàà àlo̧ bɔfàꞋ bi bu
tà ghɨ̀ a chɨ̧ɨ̧te a si la.”
Bɔ ghɨ̀ ale, me ŋȩa shua nê,
“Àlèluyà! NdiꞋte èwet wu e tò̧a atò la,
tea me gha a ègwet ane àlia nè àlia.”
Bɔɔjuŋ bu èghem yebe ntsɔ̀b bakwì la, nè èghɨ bu bekwì è wu yu̧ la è bɔte a si ngùꞋtè a Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà wu tà tseke a ègwet àtɨ̧a kèfɔ̧̀ yu la. Bɔ bɔ̀te ale me shu nê:
“Àmèn, Alèluyà!”
Àtɔŋ ako a dzəè adù̧ àtɨ̧a kèfɔ̧̀ yu me shu nê,
“Bɨ̀a wu bɨ̀ wu bɔfàꞋ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la,
mè nè bɨ̀a bɔɔjuŋ nè
bɔ̀techɨɨle bu bɨ̀a mbɔɔ atò la,
bɨ̀agème bɨ̀ wùꞋta Tǎt wa Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà.”
ÀfɨꞋa mbɔŋ e ndzə àghɨ ko a nɔ̀ŋkè mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ àtɔŋ ènɔ̧̂ bòt, me jùꞋù mbɨꞋɨ̀ mèdzî nàa nchua a ègwet èbȩ la, mè me jùꞋù mbɨꞋɨ̀ èfâŋ nkwàta la è shua nê,
“Alèluyà!
Lèfɔ̧̀ tsiꞋi abua
Tǎt wa Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà Àtsèàngɔ̀ŋ.
Bà me tà̧à̧tè àwa ngùꞋtè àwa,
nkùkta Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà,
nkàà nê àfɨꞋa Wanjɨ̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà
nàa nɨ ndzà zi la a kuêꞋ.
Ndzà tò mbɔŋ mè ntàŋke avi tè nkùꞋ.
Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà ŋa ndìte ntsɔ̧̀ tèa fəèəèta mbɔ̀ la abua tò taa kwaãaã.”
Ndìte ntsɔ̧̀ mbɔŋ wu mènəè ntsɔ̧̀ mu bòt Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà e ghɨ̀ la.

Wantu̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà wu shu abua am nê “Shɨ ayaa a si: Ntsɔ̧̀ wu bòt bu bɔ tɔ awɔb nê bɔ̀ kɨꞋɨ njɨ èpǎ̧ ndzɔꞋɔ Wanjɨ̀ wu la.” Tà mè shu abua am nê, “Eyaa wu mèngǎ̧ nkûŋ è dzəè abua Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la.”

E mbê mbɔ̀te a si a tèkate tò e wùꞋte atò. Tà shu abua am nê, “Ka ngɨ̀ ale. E ngu wuê wafàꞋ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ àwɔb nè bɔnyɨ bè bu bɔ bɨ̧ɨ̧ne èngǎ̧ Yesò la. WùꞋte wuê a Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà.” Èngà̧ wu Yesò làꞋà la, wu àdziꞋa bèndàꞋàtɔŋ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà e nɨ mèngǎ̧ mɔb la.

ÀfɨꞋa mbɔŋ e me ye ègwet e ghaꞋà, e me ye ndzèa loà kèfə. Bɔ me tɔ wòt wu ta tseke a ègwet la nê wòt nkûŋ, betsiꞋa wòt lɨ̀Ꞌà àvi ane tò la. Tàà nɨ̀a nkûŋ ka sàꞋa mènəè mè nùà èbet.
Àghɨ a tò a me beꞋe mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ èwet nkòòlâ la, tà mè kwà̧aã ntaãte tèa nyɨ̀Ꞌta mètàŋ tò la nyaŋ àtsə azi. Mè mbɔ̀ èlen ko bɔ shɨ ane tò, wòt kǒ tsa bakà ko ka nè tòà la.
Ndǐ tà li nkwaã la bɔ li ndzì a èbem àlo̧. Bɔ me tɔ èlen tò nê Èngǎ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà.
Bèshujà ègwet e kwaãaã ndìte kèfə tèa mbɔ̀ la, nkɔ̀Ꞌa ègwet bèloà kèfə me kùŋe atò.

Nyi dzəè a ètsəê tò, tàa nɨ nù èlaꞋ la. Taa me baãaã èlaꞋ mbɔŋ kà ku tèsȩ, ngɔ̀Ꞌɔ̀ àwɔb, e mě tɔ̀Ꞌtè àwɔb mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɔ̀ɔ ntsəèꞋa tètaãaãte àyɨt a èbem àdziꞋ yu bɔ̀ɔ ntsəèꞋa ntsìà mèlùꞋ, à wua nyɨ̀Ꞌta ntsǒ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà Àtsèàngɔ̀ŋ la.
Bɔ shɨ èlen ko a ègwet ndǐ tò nè ègwet ètaã tò nê, “Fɔ̧̀ bèfɔ̧̀, nè Tǎt bètàt.”

ÀfɨꞋa mbɔŋ e ndze wantu̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà kǒ tà tɨ̧ɨ̧ adù̧ àtaãnyèm la. Tà ŋȩ ane taꞋà àtɔŋ ntɔ banɨ̧̀ bu bèa ndèa a ègwet la bàgème nê, “Bɨ̀ kɨꞋɨ mbù̧ù̧tè njɨ taꞋa èpà̧ wu Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà taŋke la.

Bɨ̀ kɨꞋɨ nkwet nyaãte bèfɔ̧̀, nè ète bètǎt bèshujà, nè ète bòt kekweelè, nè ète bèloà bɔ̂ bòt bu bɔ̀ɔ nkɔ̀Ꞌa ègwet la, nè ète bòt bàgème, èbùꞋ nè bòt kà wu èbùꞋ, ebùꞋu ane bɔ̀techɨɨle eghǎ wu ane bɔɔjuŋ.”
E mè ndze nyà̧mɔ̀Ꞌ yu bɔ̂ bèfɔ̧̀ sitsǎꞋ nè bèshujà bɔb bɔ taŋkè e màꞋà èbet adù̧ wòt wu tà tseke a ègwet loà wu la bɔ̂ èbi nê bèshujà.

Bɔ nù ale mbà̧aã nyà̧mɔ̀Ꞌ yu mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ àbùꞋ a èbet, mè baãaã ndàꞋàtɔŋ fɨ̀te wu tà li ngua ngɨ̀à mènəè ngɨŋa a mbì tò fɨ̀ta bòt la. Tà li ngua fɨ̀ta bòt bu bɔ bɔ àlȩê nyà̧mɔ̀Ꞌ yu ane yɔb, mè me kukte a wamâlem tò wu la. Bɔ ghɨ̀ ale, màꞋà nyà̧mɔ̀Ꞌ yu bɔ̂ ndàꞋàtɔŋ fɨ̀te wu èyu̧ a èbem èwet ko àa mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ èlemè nkòòla nè èkem adù̧ la.
Wòt wu tà tseke a ègwet loà wu la nɨ nyi tètɔ yu, è dzəâ a ètsəê vi la mbùŋè bòt ko bu bàgème. Banɨ̧̀ bu bàgème e kɨꞋɨ̀ nkwet èpfəꞋte bɔb tè e tsè àwɔb.
ÀfɨꞋa mbɔŋ e ndze wantu̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà kǒ nchua a ègwet, tà bèà nkȩ̀ȩ̀te èbɨ lu kà ye ndìa la àbu azi, mè mbèà taꞋa èkuê.
Tà ghà mbà̧à̧ taꞋa dlagɔ̀n wu è fəə nyà̧kàbɔ̀ŋ la nkùùle atò ndzì a tèfȩ ane mèngùꞋebȩ tɔsì. Nyà̧kàbɔ̀ŋ mbɔŋ li ndzaŋe wu, è wu fɔ̧̀ fote kàbɔ̀ŋ tu bɔ̀ɔ ntɔ ane Satàn la.

Wantu̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà wu è ghɨ̀ ale, màꞋa atò a èbem èbɨ lu kà ye ndìa la, mbɔ ntsènè nkȩ̀ ane ndɨ tà kà ko etsi dzəâ e fɨte bòt èlaꞋ ngɔ̀ŋ la, tè mèngùꞋebȩ mu tɔsì la è tsè. MèngùꞋ mbɔŋ nàa tsě bɔ tsɔꞋɔ atò ane kètem àfɨ̀Ꞌ àko.

E mè ndzè ètɨ̧ kèfɔ̧̀ bɔ ŋa mètàŋ abua bòt bɔ tsekte a ègwet la, bɔɔ me saꞋa mènəè. Mè ndzě èlɨ̀ŋkè bòt bu bɔ li ndòòte ètsə bɔb nkàà ndɨ bɔ̀ɔ shua nê bɔ bɨ̧ɨ̧ne ane Yesò Klistò, mè me làꞋa èngǎ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la. Eyaa wu bòt bu bɔ li bɔ̀ kà wuꞋtè nyà̧mɔ̀Ꞌ yu bɔ̂ wamâlem tò wu la, mè ntu̧ enɨ àlȩê tò yu a mèsi mɔb nè èbu bɔb la. Bòt mbɔŋ e li njù̧ù̧me me baãaã èlaꞋ bɔ̂ Yesò Klistò ba mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bèfɔ̧̀ ane mèngùꞋebȩ tɔsì.
Èbeko nè bèmpfəà be li bè ka yu̧u̧mè tè mèngùꞋebȩ mu tɔsì la è tsè. Eyaa wu ngo̧ mbì bòt àa yu̧u̧me la.

Ntsɔ̧̀ wu bòt bu bɔ̀ɔ li yu̧u̧me ayɔɔ bòt mbì bàa la. Bɔ wu bòt Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà. Èvə lu wòt nàa mpfəa mè mpfəa la è ka li tsi e bɔ mètàŋ a ègwet lɔb a. Bɔɔ li wu bèntsìà mèpɨ̧̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà bɔ̂ Yesò Klistò ba, e mě me baãaã èlaꞋ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bèfɔ̧̀ nè Yesò ane mèngùꞋebȩ tɔsì.
ÀfɨꞋa mèngùꞋebȩ mu tɔsì nàa lìà la, bɔɔ tsǐ a Satàn a èbem tèfȩ tu.
Tàa dzəâ e ghǎ bètɔ̀Ꞌa ngɔ̀ŋ bàgème è wu Gog bɔ̂ Magòg la, e fɨte bòt. Satàn nàa li fete bòt mbɔŋ bɔ̀ɔ ndzǎ̧ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ těsɔnke *èdzî la, nê bɔ̀ màꞋà èbet adù̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà.

Bɔ ghɨ̀ ale, saŋe a sitsǎꞋ ègème, ngà ngààle àdziꞋa bòt Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà àa ntsèke la, nè àpfəèà nɨ̧ a Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà yu tàa nkɔ̀ŋkà la. Bɔ ghaale ale, èwet e dzəè a ègwet nchu a si ndììme awɔb bàgème.

Bɔ ghɨ̀ ale, maꞋa Satàn wu tà fɨte awɔb la a èwet ko àa mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ èlemè nkòòla nè èkem adù̧, bɔ zǐ màꞋa nyà̧mɔ̀Ꞌ yu bɔ̂ ndàꞋàtɔŋ fɨ̀te wu a èbèm la. Bɔ̀ɔ me ye ngoꞋ a èbèm, ètsəꞋ nè nèngû̧ ane àlia nè àlia.
ÀfɨꞋa mbɔŋ e ndze taꞋa àtɨ̧a kèfə. Wòt kǒ wu a ègwet tà tseke la. SitsǎꞋ bɔ̂ ègwet e nyɔ̂ a mbì ŋut tè bɔ̀ ka tsi ndze.

E mè ndze bòt bɔ li mpfəèꞋtê la, bɔjûŋ nè bɔ̀techɨɨle, bɔ tɨ̧ɨ̧te a mbì àtɨ̧a kèfɔ̧̀ yu. Bɔ ghaꞋa èkatè ko. Bɔ ghɨ̀ ale, mè ngaꞋa àyea ko nè àkatè, è wù àkatè mèmpème la. Bɔ ghaꞋte èkatè bu saꞋa bòt bu bɔ li mpfəèꞋtê la ane mènəè bɔ li ngɨ̀ la.
ÀfɨꞋa mbɔŋ *èdzî e ŋa bòt bu bɔ li mpfəèꞋtê a èbèm la, èvə nè àlaꞋ a bèmpfəà a mèè ŋa è bu nè bòt abot la, bɔ saꞋa awɔb bàgème ane àghɨa waa waa li ngɨ̀ la.
Bɔ ghɨ̀ ale, màꞋà èvə nè àlaꞋ a bèmpfəà a èbem èwet ko àa mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ èlemè nkòòla nè èkem adù̧ la. Èlemè waa èwet àa nkòòla adù̧ la wu èvə lu wòt nàa mpfəa mè mpfəa la.
Bɔ nɨ a waa waa èlen tò è le kaꞋa wu a èbem àkata mèmpème yu la, maꞋa a èbem èlemè wu nkòòla la.
ÀfɨꞋa mbɔŋ e ndze ègwet fi nè sitsǎꞋ fi, nkàà nê ègwet mbì nè sitsǎꞋ mbì e nyɔ̂, *èdzî nyɔ̂ àzi mɨ̧̂.
E ndze àpfəèà nɨ̧ a Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà yu, è wu Jèlusalèm fi la, a lɔ̀Ꞌa abua Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà a ègwet me chu a si. Bɔ nèètè yùà a tsiꞋi mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ ndzà bɔ wèa tò tà me chɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ lu̧ vi la.

E me zə àtɔŋ ko a dzəê adù̧ àtɨ̧a kèfɔ̧̀ yu è shuê nê, “Bɨ̀ ye, àpfəèà Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà a kɨꞋɨ tê ntsìꞋi a kètsìà bɔbȩ. Taa me tseke bɔ̂ tò ba, bɔ̀ɔ wu bòt tò, Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà wu zìambɔŋ naa mě wu Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà wɔb.
Tàa yòò mèsi ègème àghɨ ayɔb, èvə è ka wu li tsi wu, wòt kà wu li tsi edɨ̌ ko me shùù mèsi leꞋ, àdziꞋa wòt à kà wu li tsi saa, nkàà nê èghɨ nyaꞋ e tsě ègème.”

Wòt wu tà tseke a gwet àtɨ̧a kèfɔ̧̀ yu la nê, “Bɨ̀ ye, maa ghɨ̌ èghɨ ègème aa tsiꞋi be fi.” Tà mè shu abua am nê, “Shɨ àghɨ yaa, nkàà nê mèngà̧ maa wu mèngǎ̧ nkûŋ, è kùꞋu me wòt nàa bɨ̧ɨ̧ne la.”
Tà ghɨ̀ ale, mè shu abua am nê, “A mî, E ngu mbì nè kwèn, MèmbùꞋu nè Mèndìa. Maa ŋa mèleb è dzəâ a èbem adzì wu nàa ŋa mèmpème la, àku, abua waa waa àtɔŋ tò a yu̧ la.
Wòt tà nù tê ntsè la naa bɔ èghɨ bàagème, maa wu Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà tò, tàa mě wu waã am.

Ka è me wu bòt bu kà bɔ èntɨ̧ɨ̧ kekweelè la, nè bòt bu kà zi mèntɨ̧ɨ̧ mɔb ane Yesò la, nè bòt bu bɔ̀ɔ ngɨ̀à èbɨꞋte mènəè la, nè bòt bu bɔ̀ɔ mbùŋà bòt la, nè bòt bu bɔɔ njɨ̀a ngò̧ò̧tètsə la, nè bɔtebə, nè bòt bu bɔ̀ɔ ngùꞋtà bènàmbəa la, ndɔ̀Ꞌ nè bòt mèfà̧ bàgème, ko bɔɔ li màꞋà àwɔb a èbem èlemè wu èwet àa nkòòla adù̧ nè èkem la. Eyaa wu èvə lu wòt nàa mpfəa mè mpfəa la.”

Wantu̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà kǒ ane bɔntu̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà bu basà̧à̧mbe tà bèà tèpfəèꞋ tu tesà̧à̧mbe, te lu̧u̧ nè ngoꞋte Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà tu tesà̧à̧mbe tê lìà la, kɨꞋɨ shu abua am nê, “KɨꞋɨ, maa nyɨꞋte awê ndzà yu Wanjɨ̀ wu yɔꞋɔ la.”

Fo Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà kɨ̀Ꞌɨ̂ ane yaã, wantu̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà wu ŋeꞋe am ngà a ègwet taꞋa èbȩ seè kǒ, nyɨ̀Ꞌte am àpfəèà nɨ̧ a Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà yu bɔ̀ɔ tɔ nè Jèlusalèm, a dzə a ègwet abua Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà me chu a si la.
Ènɨ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà e me kàꞋte adù̧ àpfəèà mbɔŋ mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ ngule àti a ko àa nkàꞋtà bɔ̀ɔ ntɔ ane Jaspà la, mè me kàꞋtè mbɨꞋɨ̀ àlùgɨ̀lâ.

Àpfəèa mbɔŋ a bɔ tàꞋà àkaã a ko bɔ̂ bɔ̧ a kɔꞋ ngà tea ègwet la. Àkaã mbɔŋ a li mbɔ̀ mètsəê ntsɔ̀b yebe. Bɔntu̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà ntsɔ̀b bebe e tɨ̧ɨ̧tè me baabe mètsəêkaã mbɔŋ. Bɔ mè shɨ̀ tèlente èndǎ̧ bòt Izəèlȩê bu ntsɔ̀b bebe la adù̧ mètsəêkaã mbɔŋ.

Àpfəèa mbɔŋ a li mbɔ ètsəêkaã yetat a èbâ ègème. Àbâ kɔꞋɔ a bɔ ètsəêkaã yetat, àyea tsɔꞋɔ a bɔ ètsəêkaã yetat, àbâ àbualu̧ a bɔ ètsəêkaã yetat, àyea àbuatoŋ a bɔ ètsəêkaã yetat.
Bɔ bɔ̧ àkaã yu bɔ nɨŋ ngààle àpfəèa mbɔŋ la a ègwet àti àtetsialob ntsɔ̀b yeabe, è shɨ tèlente bòt bu ntsɔ̀b babe, bɔ li ngu bɔntu̧ Wanjɨ̀ la adù̧.
Wantu̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà wu ndàꞋà abua am la bɔ ayɨ̌t kǒ bɔ ghɨ ane goêl la àbu azi, tàa nɨ fɨ̀Ꞌte àpfəèà nɨ̧ yu, nè mètsəêkaã mu, mè nè àkaã yu la.

Èbâ ègème ane àpfəèà nɨ̧ a mbɔŋ e li ngu ndɨŋndɨ̀ŋ. Wantu̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà wu fɨ̀Ꞌtè àpfəèà nɨ̧ a mbɔŋ ane ayɨ̌t wu àbu azi la. Tà fɨ̀Ꞌte ale àbâ takɨꞋ a wu bèmȩl tɔsì nè e ènkɨ̀ yetà̧â̧, mè me fa mè sàà wu a èlɨ mbɔŋ.
Wantu̧ wu fɨꞋtè mbɨ̧̀ àkaã yu a wu èka ènkɨ̀ yebe ntsɔ̀b bentùa, mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ bɔbȩ àa fɨ̀Ꞌtà èghɨ la. Eyaa wu àghɨa wantu̧ wu li ngua nɨa fɨ̀Ꞌtà la.
Bɔ li bɔ̧ àkaã mbɔŋ ane àti ko àa nkàꞋtà bɔ̀ɔ ntɔ ane jaspà la, mè bɔ̧ àpfəèà nɨ̧ a mbɔŋ ane ndaŋa goêl bɔ tò̧ tê è tsìꞋa fəèəèta mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ àlùgɨ̀lâ la.

Bɔ li mbùùle àti àtetsi yu ntsɔ̀b yeabe bɔ bɔ̧ àkaã àpfəèà nɨ̧ yu a ègwet la ane èwuu àti a ntsɔ̧̀ àko. È le mbì bɔ nɨŋ mbùùlè la wu jaspà, è le yeabe wu safayà, è le yeatat wu agatè, è le yeakwì wu emelà,

è le yeatà̧â̧ wu olìk, è le yeantùa wu kàniliyàn, è le yeasà̧à̧mbe wu kwɔts, è le yeafà̧aã wu belì, è le yeabəèꞋa wu topàs, è le èghem wu klisopàlàs, è le ntsɔ̀b lemɔꞋ wu jasìn è le ntsɔ̀b yeabe wu ametìs.

Bɔ li nɨ àti a ntsɔ̧̀ àko bɔ̀ɔ ntɔ ane pêl la ntsɔ̀b yeabe ka nɨŋ ngɨ̀ ètsəêkaã yu ntsɔ̀b yebe la. Nɨa pêl wemɔ̀Ꞌ ka nɨŋ ngɨ̀ ètsəêkaã ègème. Bɔ mè nɨa ndaŋa goêl nàa mbɨꞋɨ̀ glasì betsiꞋa bɔ ye wòt àbâ ako adù̧ la ka nɨŋ ngɨ̀ èlu̧ nɨ̧ wu a èbem àpfəèa mbɔŋ la.
E ndi è ka ye lob nɨ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà a èbem àpfəèa mbɔŋ, nkàà nê Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà Lefɨ̀Ꞌ Àtsèàngɔ̀ŋ bɔ̂ Wanjɨ̀ wu ka bɔ wu lob mbɔŋ la.
Àpfəèa mbɔŋ a li à ka tsi ngua nkɨà nyèm kò èŋu leꞋ ea me bàŋe yùà, nkàà nê ènɨ̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà è le wua mbàŋà àyùà mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ èkaꞋà, Wanjɨ̀ wu mè ngu èkaꞋà àpfəèa mbɔŋ.
Bòt èlaꞋ ègème aa li me ghȩ̀ȩ̀ne èbem èkaꞋà àpfəèa mbɔŋ, bèfɔ̧̀ sitsǎꞋ e mè ngu nɨ ènɨ̧ wɔb enyi a èbèm ekukta Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà bɔ̂ Wanjɨ̀ wu.
Mètsəêkaã àpfəèa mbɔŋ naa li wu jìa àfɨ̀Ꞌ àgème, nkàà nê àfɨꞋa ko ndzěm nàa kwene abot la a ntsě.
Bɔɔ li nɨ ènɨ̧, nè kènùka èlaꞋ ègème a sitsǎꞋ e kɨꞋɨ a èbèm.

Ka àghɨa kàbɔ̀ŋ ko àa li nyi a èbèm la à ka wuê, fɔɔle nê bòt bɔ̀ɔ ngɨ̀à èbɨꞋte mènəè, kò fɨ̀ta la leꞋ. Bòt bu bɔ li shɨ tèlen tɔb a èbem àkatè mèmpème Wanjɨ̀ wu la, ka bɔ̀ɔ li e nyi a èbem àpfəèà nɨ̧ a mbɔŋ la.
Wantu̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà wu è ghɨ̀ ale, mè nyɨ̀Ꞌte am èdzî ko àa ŋa mèmpème la, e me kàꞋtè mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ àlùgɨ̀lâ. Èdzî mbɔŋ e dzə adù̧ àtɨ̧a kèfɔ̧̀ a Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà bɔ̂ Wanjɨ̀ wu,

me chua ntsèà a kètsìà èlu̧ wu a èbem àpfəèà nɨ̧ yu la. Àyɨt yu àa ŋa mèmpème la, a tɨ̧ɨ̧ àbâ èdzî mbɔŋ bebe, me kɔɔle tètaãaãtsə tsa tsa ane èŋu ègème ane èngùꞋebȩ. TèfəꞋte àyɨt a mbɔŋ wu èghɨbə àa mbəa bòt èlaꞋ ègème la.
Àghɨa ko ndɔ̀ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nɔ̀ŋke a ègwet la, à ka wu ewu a èbem àpfəèà nɨ̧ a mbɔŋ. Àtɨ̧a kèfɔ̧̀ a Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà bɔ̂ Wanjɨ̀ wu aa wu abot, bɔfàꞋ tò e mè ngu me wùꞋte atò abot.
Bɔɔ li e ye èsi Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà, èlen tò e mè ngu wu a mèsi mɔb.
Ndzěm ka li tsi wua, bòt è ka wu li tsi e me kɨ mèkàꞋà kò nyèm leꞋ, nkàà nê Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà Lefɨ̀Ꞌ naa li wu èkaꞋà wɔb, bɔ mè ngu li e me baãaã ngɔ̀ŋ ane àlia nè àlia.

Wantu̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà wu mè shu abua am nê, “Eyaa wu mèngǎ̧ nkûŋ, è kùꞋu me wòt nàa bɨ̧ɨ̧ne la. Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà Lefɨ̀Ꞌ wu tàa ndzìà Fo zi ane bèndàꞋàtɔŋ bi, bɔ làꞋà èngǎ̧ tò la, è tsàà wantu̧ vi nê tà kɨꞋɨ nyɨ̀Ꞌte bɔfàꞋ bi àghɨa à bele nyàŋe e ghɨ̀ la.”
Yesò nê, “Bɨ̀ zə, e mbele yàŋe kɨꞋɨ. Ntsɔ̧̀ wu wòt wu tàa nɔ̀ŋà èghɨ bu bɔ li shu bɔ shɨ a èbem àkatè yaa la.”
Wu mmɔ̌ Jɔ̌n e ndi ndzə, mè ndze èghɨ bàa la. Mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ mâ zə mè ndze bùà la, e mbɔ̀te a si a mbì wantu̧ Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà wu tà nyɨꞋte am èghɨ bàa la, nê e nkɨ wùꞋte atò,

tà shu abua am nê, “Ka ngɨ̀ ale. E ngu wafàꞋ wuê mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ àwɔ̀ nè bɔnyɨ bè bu è wù bèndàꞋàtɔŋ la, mè nè bòt bu bàgème bɔ̀ɔ ngɨ̀à àghɨa bɔ shɨ a èbem àkatè yaa la. WùꞋte wuê a Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà.”
Tà mè shu abua am nê, “À ka ndò̧ mèngà̧ mu bɔ li shu bɔ shɨ a èbem àkatè yaa la, nkàà nê àfɨꞋa èghɨ mbɔŋ àa ghɨ̀ la a tsiꞋa nkùꞋà.

Waa waa tàa ngɨa kàbɔ̀ŋ la, me ghɨ̀à ngà wuê nè mbì, we tàa ngɨ̀à èbɨꞋte ènəê la, me ghɨ̀à ngà wuê nè mbì. Wòt tàa ngɨ̀à mènəè ntsɔ̧̀ la, me ghɨ̀à ngà wuê nè mbì. Wòt tà wu wòt Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà la, mě me ŋa avi wuê abua Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà.”
Yesò nê, “Bɨ̀ zə, e mbele yàŋe kɨꞋɨ nè àbȩ̀, e tsɔꞋɔ àfàꞋa wòt ègème ane àghɨa tà ghɨ̀ la.
E ngu mbì nè kwèn, àtsə nè lə, MèmbùꞋu nè Mèndìa.”
Ntsɔ̧̀ wu bòt bu bɔ shùu ndǐ tɔb tè te fəətè la. Wu àdziꞋa yɔb bɔ̀ɔ jɨ tètaãaãte àyɨt yu àa ŋa mèmpème la, e mě tse a ètsəêkaã àpfəèà nɨ̧ yu enyi a èbèm.

Bòt bu kà wu li nyi a èbem àpfəèà nɨ̧ yu la, wu bòt bu bɔ̀ɔ ngɨ̀à mbɨ̀Ꞌɨ̀ babə la, nè bɔtebə, nè bòt bɔ̀ɔ njɨ̀a ngò̧ò̧tètsə la, nè bòt bu bɔ̀ɔ mbùŋà bòt la, nè bòt bɔ̀ɔ ngùꞋtà bènàmbəa la, ndɔ̀Ꞌ nè bòt bu bàgème bɔ̀ɔ nkɔ̀ŋkà àfɨte mè ndàꞋà àyùà la.
“Mmɔ̌ Yesò mâ tsàà wantu̧ am abua yɨ̧ nê tà kɨꞋɨ shu awɨ̧ mènəè maa, bɨ̀ shu abua bèchɔsì. E ngu èntaãaã e tu a àndǎ̧ Fɔ̧̀ Dàbid la, kěnto̧ ntɔtetsɔ̌Ꞌ kèa nkàꞋtà la.”

Fo Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà bɔ̂ ndzà Wanjɨ̀ wu e nê, “KɨꞋɨ.” Wòt ègème tà zə èngà̧ waa la è bɔ ndɨ tàa shu azi mɨ̧̂ nê, “KɨꞋɨ” la. Wòt àtɔŋ tò a yu̧u̧ la kɨꞋɨ, we tàa nkɨà la kɨꞋɨ nɨ mèleb mu nàa ŋa mèmpème la àku.

Maà səèŋkà àtû̧ a waa waa tà zə mèngà̧ maa bɔ li shu bɔ shɨ a èbem àkatè yaa, la nê, wòt kwèꞋnà àghɨ adù̧, ko Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nàa kwèꞋne ngoꞋ tu tègème bɔ shɨ a èbem àkatè yaa la adù̧ ngoꞋte tò.

Wòt mè ntsì àghɨ ane mèngà̧ maa bɔ li shu bɔ shɨ a èbem àkatè yaa la, ko Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà nàa tsì èwe tò nè èghàb ane tètaãaãte àyɨt yu àa ŋa mèmpème la, e mě tu̧u̧ nê tà ka nyi a èbem àpfəèà nɨ̧ yu. Eyaa wu èghɨ bɔ shɨ a èbem àkatè yaa la.
Wòt wu tà shu nê èghɨ bàa wu nkûŋ la, è laꞋnê, “Ane nkûŋ, e mbele yàŋe kɨꞋɨ.”
Àmèn, Yesò Lefɨ̀Ꞌ, kɨꞋɨ.
Maà shù̧ù̧ta nê Yesò Lefɨ̀Ꞌ nyɨꞋte a ntsɔ̧̀ vi abua bòt Mbɔ̧ɔ̧mà bàgème. Àmèn.
